name: AccountingProfit
description: The amount of profit (loss) for a period before deducting tax expense. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: Accruals
description: The amount of liabilities to pay for goods or services that have been received or supplied but have not been paid, invoiced or formally agreed with the supplier, including amounts due to employees.

name: AccrualsAndDeferredIncome
description: #N/A

name: AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeClassifiedAsCurrent
description: #N/A

name: AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeClassifiedAsNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: AccrualsClassifiedAsCurrent
description: The amount of accruals classified as current. [Refer: Accruals]

name: AccrualsClassifiedAsNoncurrent
description: The amount of accruals classified as non-current. [Refer: Accruals]

name: AccruedIncome
description: #N/A

name: AccruedIncomeIncludingContractAssets
description: The amount of assets representing income that has been earned but is not yet a receivable, including contract assets. [Refer: Contract assets]

name: AccruedIncomeOtherThanContractAssets
description: The amount of assets representing income that has been earned but is not yet a receivable, other than contract assets. [Refer: Contract assets]

name: AccumulatedAllowanceForUncollectibleMinimumLeasePaymentsReceivable
description: #N/A

name: AccumulatedChangesInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
description: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the assets determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that gave rise to market risk; or (b) using an alternative method that the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets]

name: AccumulatedChangesInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfLiability
description: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of financial liabilities that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial liability, attributable to changes in credit risk of liability]

name: AccumulatedChangesInFairValueOfLoanOrReceivableAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
description: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of loans or receivables that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the assets determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in the market conditions that gave rise to the market risk; or (b) using an alternative method the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Market risk [member]]

name: AccumulatedFairValueHedgeAdjustmentOnHedgedItemIncludedInCarryingAmountAssets
description: The accumulated amount of fair value hedge adjustment on a hedged item that is included in the carrying amount of the hedged item, recognised in the statement of financial position as an asset. [Refer: Hedged items [member]]

name: AccumulatedFairValueHedgeAdjustmentOnHedgedItemIncludedInCarryingAmountLiabilities
description: The accumulated amount of fair value hedge adjustment on a hedged item that is included in the carrying amount of the hedged item, recognised in the statement of financial position as a liability. [Refer: Hedged items [member]]

name: AccumulatedFairValueHedgeAdjustmentRemainingInStatementOfFinancialPositionForHedgedItemThatCeasedToBeAdjustedForHedgingGainsAndLossesAssets
description: The accumulated amount of fair value hedge adjustment remaining in the statement of financial position for a hedged item that is a financial asset measured at amortised cost and has ceased to be adjusted for hedging gains and losses. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost; Hedged items [member]]

name: AccumulatedFairValueHedgeAdjustmentRemainingInStatementOfFinancialPositionForHedgedItemThatCeasedToBeAdjustedForHedgingGainsAndLossesLiabilities
description: The accumulated amount of fair value hedge adjustment remaining in the statement of financial position for a hedged item that is a financial liability measured at amortised cost and has ceased to be adjusted for hedging gains and losses. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost; Hedged items [member]]

name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of accumulated items of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that are not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by other IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: AcquisitionAndAdministrationExpenseRelatedToInsuranceContracts
description: The amount of acquisition and administration expense relating to insurance contracts. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: AcquisitiondateFairValueOfEquityInterestInAcquireeHeldByAcquirerImmediatelyBeforeAcquisitionDate
description: The acquisition-date fair value of equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date in a business combination achieved in stages. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: AcquisitiondateFairValueOfTotalConsiderationTransferred
description: The fair value, at acquisition date, of the consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: AcquisitionrelatedCostsForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of acquisition-related costs for transactions recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and the assumption of liabilities in business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: AcquisitionrelatedCostsRecognisedAsExpenseForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of acquisition-related costs recognised as an expense for transactions that are recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and the assumption of liabilities in business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsBiologicalAssets
description: The increase in biological assets resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Biological assets]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsDeferredAcquisitionCostsArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The increase in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The increase in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The increase in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsInvestmentProperty
description: The increase in investment property resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Investment property]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsLiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
description: The increase in liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsOtherProvisions
description: The increase in other provisions resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Other provisions]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase in property, plant and equipment resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsReinsuranceAssets
description: The increase in reinsurance assets resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Reinsurance assets]

name: ActuarialAssumptionOfDiscountRates
description: The discount rate used as the significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

name: ActuarialAssumptionOfExpectedRatesOfInflation
description: The expected rate of inflation that is used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

name: ActuarialAssumptionOfExpectedRatesOfPensionIncreases
description: The expected rate of increases in pension that is used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

name: ActuarialAssumptionOfExpectedRatesOfSalaryIncreases
description: The expected rate of salary increases used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

name: ActuarialAssumptionOfLifeExpectancyAfterRetirement
description: #N/A

name: ActuarialAssumptionOfMedicalCostTrendRates
description: Medical cost trend rate used as significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

name: ActuarialAssumptionOfMortalityRates
description: The mortality rate used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

name: ActuarialAssumptionOfRetirementAge
description: #N/A

name: ActuarialGainsLossesArisingFromChangesInDemographicAssumptionsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in a net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from actuarial gains (losses) arising from changes in demographic assumptions that result in remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset). Demographic assumptions deal with matters such as: (a) mortality; (b) rates of employee turnover, disability and early retirement; (c) the proportion of plan members with dependants who will be eligible for benefits; (d) the proportion of plan members who will select each form of payment option available under the plan terms; and (e) claim rates under medical plans. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: ActuarialGainsLossesArisingFromChangesInFinancialAssumptionsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in a net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from actuarial gains (losses) arising from changes in financial assumptions that result in remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset). Financial assumptions deal with items such as: (a) the discount rate; (b) benefit levels, excluding any cost of the benefits to be met by employees, and future salary; (c) in the case of medical benefits, future medical costs, including claim handling costs (ie the costs that will be incurred in processing and resolving claims, including legal and adjuster's fees); and (d) taxes payable by the plan on contributions relating to service before the reporting date or on benefits resulting from that service. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: ActuarialGainsLossesArisingFromExperienceAdjustmentsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in a net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from actuarial gains (losses) arising from experience adjustments that result in remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset). Experience adjustments deal with the effects of differences between the previous actuarial assumptions and what has actually occurred. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: ActuarialPresentValueOfPromisedRetirementBenefits
description: The present value of the expected payments by a retirement benefit plan to existing and past employees, attributable to the service already rendered.

name: AdditionalAllowanceRecognisedInProfitOrLossAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
description: The amount of additional allowance for credit losses of financial assets recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

name: AdditionalLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of additional contingent liabilities recognised in business combinations. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Business combinations [member]; Contingent liabilities [member]]

name: AdditionalPaidinCapital
description: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders.

name: AdditionalProvisionsOtherProvisions
description: The amount of additional other provisions made. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: AdditionalRecognitionGoodwill
description: The amount of additional goodwill recognised, except goodwill included in a disposal group that, on acquisition, meets the criteria to be classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5. [Refer: Goodwill; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: AdditionsFromAcquisitionsInvestmentProperty
description: The amount of additions to investment property resulting from acquisitions. [Refer: Investment property]

name: AdditionsFromPurchasesBiologicalAssets
description: The amount of additions to biological assets resulting from purchases. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: AdditionsFromSubsequentExpenditureRecognisedAsAssetBiologicalAssets
description: The amount of additions to biological assets resulting from subsequent expenditure recognised as an asset. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: AdditionsFromSubsequentExpenditureRecognisedAsAssetInvestmentProperty
description: The amount of additions to investment property resulting from subsequent expenditure recognised as an asset. [Refer: Investment property]

name: AdditionsLiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
description: The increase in liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued, resulting from additions other than through business combinations. [Refer: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued; Business combinations [member]]

name: AdditionsOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationsBiologicalAssets
description: The amount of additions to biological assets, other than those acquired through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Biological assets]

name: AdditionsOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationsIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The amount of additions to intangible assets other than goodwill, other than those acquired through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: AdditionsOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationsInvestmentProperty
description: The amount of additions to investment property other than those acquired through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Investment property]

name: AdditionsOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationsPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount of additions to property, plant and equipment other than those acquired through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

name: AdditionsOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationsReinsuranceAssets
description: The amount of additions to reinsurance assets, other than those acquired through business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Reinsurance assets]

name: AdditionsToNoncurrentAssets
description: The amount of additions to non-current assets other than financial instruments, deferred tax assets, net defined benefit assets and rights arising under insurance contracts. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Financial instruments, class [member]; Non-current assets; Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: AdditionsToRightofuseAssets
description: The amount of additions to right-of-use assets. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

name: AdjustedWeightedAverageShares
description: The weighted average number of ordinary shares outstanding plus the weighted average number of ordinary shares that would be issued on the conversion of all the dilutive potential ordinary shares into ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]; Weighted average [member]]

name: AdjustmentToCarryingAmountsReportedUnderPreviousGAAP
description: The amount of aggregate adjustments to the carrying amounts reported under previous GAAP of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures or associates in the entity's first IFRS financial statements. [Refer: Associates [member]; Carrying amount [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Previous GAAP [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates reported in separate financial statements; IFRSs [member]]

name: AdjustmentToMidmarketConsensusPriceSignificantUnobservableInputsAssets
description: #N/A

name: AdjustmentToMidmarketConsensusPriceSignificantUnobservableInputsLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: AdjustmentToProfitLossForPreferenceShareDividends

name: AdjustmentsForAmortisationExpense
description: Adjustments for amortisation expense to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Profit (loss); Depreciation and amortisation expense]

name: AdjustmentsForAmountsTransferredToInitialCarryingAmountOfHedgedItems
description: The amounts removed from equity and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) whose acquisition or incurrence was a hedged, highly probable forecast transaction, net of tax. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

name: AdjustmentsForCurrentTaxOfPriorPeriod
description: Adjustments of tax expense (income) recognised in the period for current tax of prior periods.

name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInBiologicalAssets
description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in biological assets to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Biological assets; Profit (loss)]

description: Adjustments for increases in other provisions arising from the passage of time to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Profit (loss); Other provisions [member]]

name: AdjustmentsForInterestExpense
description: Adjustments for interest expense to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Interest expense; Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsForInterestIncome
description: Adjustments for interest income expense to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Interest income; Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsForLossesGainsOnDisposalOfNoncurrentAssets
description: Adjustments for losses (gains) on disposal of non-current assets to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Non-current assets; Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsForProvisions
description: Adjustments for provisions to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Provisions; Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsForReconcileProfitLoss
description: Adjustments to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsForSharebasedPayments
description: Adjustments for share-based payments to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsForUndistributedProfitsOfAssociates
description: Adjustments for undistributed profits of associates to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Associates [member]; Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsForUndistributedProfitsOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: Adjustments for undistributed profits of investments accounted for using the equity method to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsForUnrealisedForeignExchangeLossesGains
description: Adjustments for unrealised foreign exchange losses (gains) to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: AdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLossOtherThanChangesInWorkingCapital
description: Adjustments, other than changes in working capital, to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: AdministrativeExpense
description: The amount of expenses that the entity classifies as being administrative.

name: Advances
description: The amount of advances received representing contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at a point in time. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Performance obligations satisfied at point in time [member]]

name: AdvancesReceivedForContractsInProgress
description: #N/A

name: AdvertisingExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from advertising.

name: AggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
description: The aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price for financial instruments that is yet to be recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: AllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
description: The amount of an allowance account used to record impairments to financial assets due to credit losses. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: AmortisationAssetsRecognisedFromCostsIncurredToObtainOrFulfilContractsWithCustomers
description: The amount of amortisation for assets recognised from the costs incurred to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers. [Refer: Assets recognised from costs to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers; Amortisation expense]

name: AmortisationDeferredAcquisitionCostsArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The amount of amortisation of deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts; Depreciation and amortisation expense; Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: AmortisationExpense
description: The amount of amortisation expense. Amortisation is the systematic allocation of depreciable amounts of intangible assets over their useful lives.

name: AmortisationIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The amount of amortisation of intangible assets other than goodwill. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: AmortisationOfGainsAndLossesArisingOnBuyingReinsurance
description: The amount of amortisation of deferred losses (gains) arising from the purchase of reinsurance. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss on buying reinsurance]

name: AmountByWhichFinancialAssetsRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstrumentsMitigateMaximumExposureToCreditRisk
description: The amount by which credit derivatives or similar instruments related to financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss mitigate maximum exposure to credit risk. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Credit risk [member]; Derivatives [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk; Financial assets]

name: AmountByWhichLoansOrReceivablesRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstrumentsMitigateMaximumExposureToCreditRisk
description: The amount by which credit derivatives or similar instruments related to loans or receivables mitigate maximum exposure to credit risk. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk; Derivatives [member]]

name: AmountByWhichUnitsRecoverableAmountExceedsItsCarryingAmount
description: The amount by which a cash-generating unit's (group of units') recoverable amount exceeds its carrying amount. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Cash-generating units [member]]

name: AmountByWhichValueAssignedToKeyAssumptionMustChangeInOrderForUnitsRecoverableAmountToBeEqualToCarryingAmount
description: The amount by which value that has been assigned to a key assumption must change in order for a unit's recoverable amount to be equal to its carrying amount. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

name: AmountIncurredByEntityForProvisionOfKeyManagementPersonnelServicesProvidedBySeparateManagementEntity
description: The amount incurred by the entity for provision of key management personnel services that are provided by a separate management entity. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]; Separate management entities [member]]

name: AmountOfReclassificationsOrChangesInPresentation
description: The amount that is reclassified when the entity changes classification or presentation in its financial statements.

name: AmountPresentedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeRealisedAtDerecognition
description: The amount presented in other comprehensive income that was realised at derecognition of financial liabilities designated at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: AmountReclassifiedFromProfitOrLossToOtherComprehensiveIncomeApplyingOverlayApproachNewlyDesignatedFinancialAssets
description: The amount reclassified from profit or loss to other comprehensive income relating to newly designated financial assets applying the overlay approach.

name: AmountReclassifiedToOtherComprehensiveIncomeFromProfitOrLossApplyingOverlayApproachBeforeTax
description: The amount recognised in other comprehensive income on reclassification from profit or loss when applying the overlay approach, before tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: AmountRecognisedAsIncomeFromArrangementInvolvingLegalFormOfLease
description: #N/A

name: AmountRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeAndAccumulatedInEquityRelatingToNoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsHeldForSale
description: The amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity, relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Other reserves; Other comprehensive income; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: AmountRemovedFromReserveOfCashFlowHedgesAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied
description: The amount removed from reserve of cash flow hedges and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) or a firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied. [Refer: Reserve of cash flow hedges]

name: AmountRemovedFromReserveOfChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreadsAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied
description: The amount removed from reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) or a firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied. [Refer: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads]

name: AmountRemovedFromReserveOfChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContractsAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied
description: The amount removed from reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) or a firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied. [Refer: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts]

name: AmountRemovedFromReserveOfChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptionsAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied
description: The amount removed from reserve of change in value of time value of options and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) or a firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied. [Refer: Reserve of change in value of time value of options]

name: AmountReportedInProfitOrLossApplyingIFRS9FinancialAssetsToWhichOverlayApproachIsApplied
description: The amount reported in profit or loss applying IFRS 9 for financial assets to which the overlay approach is applied.

name: AmountThatWouldHaveBeenReportedInProfitOrLossIfIAS39HadBeenAppliedFinancialAssetsToWhichOverlayApproachIsApplied
description: The amount that would have been reported in profit or loss for financial assets to which the overlay approach is applied if IAS 39 had been applied.

name: AmountsIncurredDeferredAcquisitionCostsArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The increase in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts resulting from amounts of those costs incurred. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts]

name: AmountsPayableRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amounts payable resulting from related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: AmountsPayableToTransfereeInRespectOfTransferredAssets
description: The amounts payable to the transferee in respect of transferred financial assets other than the undiscounted cash outflows that would or may be required to repurchase derecognised financial assets (for example, the strike price in an option agreement). [Refer: Financial assets]

name: AmountsReceivableRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amounts receivable resulting from related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: AmountsRecognisedForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
description: The amounts recognised for transaction recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and the assumption of liabilities in business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: AmountsRemovedFromEquityAndAdjustedAgainstFairValueOfFinancialAssetsOnReclassificationOutOfFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeMeasurementCategoryBeforeTax
description: The amounts removed from equity and adjusted against the fair value of financial assets on reclassification out of the fair value through other comprehensive income measurement category, before tax. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: AmountsRemovedFromEquityAndAdjustedAgainstFairValueOfFinancialAssetsOnReclassificationOutOfFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeMeasurementCategoryNetOfTax
description: The amounts removed from equity and adjusted against the fair value of financial assets on reclassification out of the fair value through other comprehensive income measurement category, net of tax. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: AmountsRemovedFromEquityAndIncludedInCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityWhoseAcquisitionOrIncurrenceWasHedgedHighlyProbableForecastTransactionBeforeTax
description: The amounts removed from equity and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) whose acquisition or incurrence was a hedged, highly probable forecast transaction, before tax. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

name: AmountsSubjectToEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementOrSimilarAgreementNotSetOffAgainstFinancialAssets
description: The amounts that are subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement and that are not set off against financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: AmountsSubjectToEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementOrSimilarAgreementNotSetOffAgainstFinancialLiabilities
description: The amounts that are subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement and that are not set off against financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: ApplicableTaxRate
description: The applicable income tax rate.

name: AreaOfLandUsedForAgriculture
description: The area of land used for agriculture by the entity.

name: AssetRecognisedForExpectedReimbursementContingentLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of assets that have been recognised for the expected reimbursement of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Expected reimbursement, contingent liabilities in business combination; Business combinations [member]]

name: AssetRecognisedForExpectedReimbursementOtherProvisions
description: The amount of assets that have been recognised for the expected reimbursement of other provisions. [Refer: Expected reimbursement, other provisions; Other provisions]

name: AssetbackedDebtInstrumentsHeld
description: The amount of debt instruments held that are backed by underlying assets. [Refer: Debt instruments held]

name: AssetbackedSecuritiesAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount securities that are backed by underlying assets contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: Assets
description: The amount of a present economic resource controlled by the entity as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

name: AssetsArisingFromExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResources
description: The amount of assets arising from the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource.

name: AssetsArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The amount of recognised assets arising from insurance contracts. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: AssetsHeldAsCollateralPermittedToBeSoldOrRepledgedAtFairValue
description: The fair value of collateral held that is permitted to be sold or repledged in the absence of default by the owner of the collateral. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: AssetsLessCurrentLiabilities
description: The amount of assets less the amount of current liabilities.

name: AssetsLiabilitiesOfBenefitPlan
description: The amount of assets of a retirement benefit plan less liabilities other than the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits.

name: AssetsObtained
description: The amount of assets obtained by the entity taking possession of the collateral it holds as security or calling on other credit enhancements (for example, guarantees). [Refer: Guarantees [member]]

name: AssetsOfBenefitPlan
description: The amount of assets held by retirement benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: AssetsOtherThanCashOrCashEquivalentsInSubsidiaryOrBusinessesAcquiredOrDisposed2013
description: The amount of assets, other than cash or cash equivalents, in subsidiaries or other businesses over which control is obtained or lost. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: AssetsRecognisedFromCostsToObtainOrFulfilContractsWithCustomers
description: The amount of assets recognised from the costs to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers. The costs to obtain a contract with a customer are the incremental costs of obtaining the contract that the entity would not have incurred if the contract had not been obtained. The costs to fulfil a contract with a customer are the costs that relate directly to a contract or to an anticipated contract that the entity can specifically identify.

name: AssetsRecognisedInEntitysFinancialStatementsInRelationToStructuredEntities
description: The amount of assets recognised in the entity's financial statements relating to its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Assets; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

name: AssetsSoldOrRepledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
description: The fair value of collateral sold or repledged that was permitted to be sold or repledged in the absence of default by the owner of the collateral. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: AssetsThatEntityContinuesToRecognise
description: The amount of transferred financial assets that the entity continues to recognise in full. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: AssetsThatEntityContinuesToRecogniseToExtentOfContinuingInvolvement
description: The amount of transferred financial assets that the entity continues to recognise to the extent of its continuing involvement. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: AssetsToWhichSignificantRestrictionsApply
description: The amount in the consolidated financial statements of the assets of the group to which significant restrictions (for example, statutory, contractual and regulatory restrictions) apply on the entity's ability to access or use the assets.

name: AssetsTransferredToStructuredEntitiesAtTimeOfTransfer
description: The amount, at the time of transfer, of all assets transferred to structured entities. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

name: AssetsUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
description: The amount of assets under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: AssetsUnderReinsuranceCeded
description: The amount of assets under reinsurance contracts in which the entity is the policyholder.

name: AssetsWithSignificantRiskOfMaterialAdjustmentsWithinNextFinancialYear
description: The amount of assets subject to assumptions that have a significant risk of resulting in a material adjustment to the amounts of those assets within the next financial year.

name: AssociatedLiabilitiesThatEntityContinuesToRecognise
description: The amount of liabilities associated with transferred financial assets that the entity continues to recognise in full. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: AuditorsRemuneration
description: The amount of fees paid or payable to the entity's auditors.

name: AuditorsRemunerationForAuditServices
description: The amount of fees paid or payable to the entity's auditors for auditing services.

name: AuditorsRemunerationForOtherServices
description: The amount of fees paid or payable to the entity's auditors for services that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: AuditorsRemunerationForTaxServices
description: The amount of fees paid or payable to the entity's auditors for tax services.

name: AuthorisedCapitalCommitmentsButNotContractedFor
description: The amount of capital commitments that have been authorised by the entity, but for which the entity has not entered into a contract. [Refer: Capital commitments]

name: AverageEffectiveTaxRate
description: The tax expense (income) divided by the accounting profit. [Refer: Accounting profit]

name: AverageForeignExchangeRate
description: The average exchange rate used by the entity. Exchange rate is the ratio of exchange for two currencies.

name: AverageNumberOfEmployees
description: The average number of personnel employed by the entity during a period.

name: AveragePriceOfHedgingInstrument
description: The average price of a hedging instrument. [Refer: Hedging instruments [member]]

name: AverageRateOfHedgingInstrument
description: The average rate of a hedging instrument. [Refer: Hedging instruments [member]]

name: BalancesOnCurrentAccountsFromCustomers
description: The amount of balances in customers' current accounts held by the entity.

name: BalancesOnDemandDepositsFromCustomers
description: The amount of balances in customers' demand deposits held by the entity.

name: BalancesOnOtherDepositsFromCustomers
description: The amount of balances in customers' deposit accounts held by the entity that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: BalancesOnTermDepositsFromCustomers
description: The amount of balances in customers' term deposits held by the entity.

name: BalancesWithBanks
description: The amount of cash balances held at banks.

name: BankAcceptanceAssets
description: The amount of bank acceptances recognised as assets.

name: BankAcceptanceLiabilities
description: The amount of bank acceptances recognised as liabilities.

name: BankAndSimilarCharges
description: The amount of bank and similar charges recognised by the entity as an expense.

name: BankBalancesAtCentralBanksOtherThanMandatoryReserveDeposits
description: The amount of bank balances held at central banks other than mandatory reserve deposits. [Refer: Mandatory reserve deposits at central banks]

name: BankBorrowingsUndiscountedCashFlows
description: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to bank borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: BankDebtInstrumentsHeld
description: The amount of debt instruments held by the entity that were issued by a bank. [Refer: Debt instruments held]

name: BankOverdraftsClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
description: The amount that has been withdrawn from an account in excess of existing cash balances. This is considered a short-term extension of credit by the bank. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

name: BankingArrangementsClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
description: A classification of cash equivalents representing banking arrangements that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Cash equivalents]

name: BasicAndDilutedEarningsLossPerShare
description: #N/A

name: BasicAndDilutedEarningsLossPerShareFromContinuingOperations
description: #N/A

name: BasicAndDilutedEarningsLossPerShareFromDiscontinuedOperations
description: #N/A

name: BasicEarningsLossPerShare
description: The amount of profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity (the numerator) divided by the weighted average number of ordinary shares outstanding during the period (the denominator).

name: BasicEarningsLossPerShareFromContinuingOperations
description: Basic earnings (loss) per share from continuing operations. [Refer: Basic earnings (loss) per share; Continuing operations [member]]

name: BasicEarningsLossPerShareFromDiscontinuedOperations
description: Basic earnings (loss) per share from discontinued operations. [Refer: Basic earnings (loss) per share; Discontinued operations [member]]

name: BearerPlants
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing bearer plants. Bearer plant is a living plant that (a) is used in the production or supply of agricultural produce; (b) is expected to bear produce for more than one period; and (c) has a remote likelihood of being sold as agricultural produce, except for incidental scrap sales. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: BenefitsPaidOrPayable
description: The amount of benefits paid or payable for retirement benefit plans.

name: BestEstimateAtAcquisitionDateOfContractualCashFlowsNotExpectedToBeCollectedForAcquiredReceivables
description: The best estimate at acquisition date of contractual cash flows not expected to be collected for receivables acquired in business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: BiologicalAssets
description: The amount of living animals or plants recognised as assets.

name: BiologicalAssetsPledgedAsSecurityForLiabilities
description: The amount of biological assets pledged as security for liabilities. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: BondsIssued
description: The amount of bonds issued by the entity.

name: BondsIssuedUndiscountedCashFlows
description: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to bonds issued. [Refer: Bonds issued]

name: BorrowingCostsCapitalised
description: The amount of interest and other costs that an entity incurs in connection with the borrowing of funds that are directly attributable to the acquisition, construction or production of a qualifying asset and which form part of the cost of that asset.

name: BorrowingCostsIncurred
description: The amount of interest and other costs that an entity incurs in connection with the borrowing of funds.

name: BorrowingCostsRecognisedAsExpense
description: The amount of interest and other costs that an entity incurs in connection with the borrowing of funds that are recognised as an expense.

name: Borrowings
description: The amount of outstanding funds that the entity is obligated to repay.

name: BorrowingsAdjustmentToInterestRateBasis
description: The adjustment to the basis (reference rate) used for calculation of the interest rate on borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: BorrowingsInterestRate
description: The interest rate on borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: BorrowingsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for borrowings assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Borrowings; Business combinations [member]]

name: BrandNames
description: The amount of intangible assets representing rights to a group of complementary assets such as a trademark (or service mark) and its related trade name, formulas, recipes and technological expertise. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: BrokerageFeeExpense
description: The amount of expense recognised for brokerage fees charged to the entity.

name: BrokerageFeeIncome
description: The amount of income recognised for brokerage fees charged by the entity.

name: Buildings
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing depreciable buildings and similar structures for use in operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: CancellationOfTreasuryShares
description: The amount of treasury stock cancelled during the period. [Refer: Treasury shares]

name: CapitalCommitments
description: The amount of future capital expenditures that the entity is committed to make.

name: CapitalRedemptionReserve
description: A component of equity representing the reserve for the redemption of the entity's own shares.

name: CapitalReserve
description: A component of equity representing the capital reserves.

name: CapitalisationRateOfBorrowingCostsEligibleForCapitalisation
description: The weighted average of interest and other costs that an entity incurs in connection with the borrowing of funds applicable to the borrowings of the entity that are outstanding during the period, other than borrowings made specifically for the purpose of obtaining a qualifying asset. [Refer: Weighted average [member]; Borrowings]

name: CarryingAmountAtTimeOfSaleOfInvestmentPropertyCarriedAtCostWithinFairValueModel
description: #N/A

name: Cash
description: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits. [Refer: Cash on hand]

name: CashAdvancesAndLoansFromRelatedParties
description: The cash inflow from advances and loans from related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: CashAdvancesAndLoansMadeToOtherPartiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The amount of cash advances and loans made to other parties (other than advances and loans made by a financial institution), classified as investing activities.

name: CashAdvancesAndLoansMadeToRelatedParties
description: The cash outflow for loans and advances made to related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: CashAndBankBalancesAtCentralBanks
description: The amount of cash and bank balances held at central banks.

name: CashAndCashEquivalents
description: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

name: CashAndCashEquivalentsAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount cash and cash equivalents contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents; Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: CashAndCashEquivalentsClassifiedAsPartOfDisposalGroupHeldForSale
description: The amount of cash and cash equivalents that are classified as a part of a disposal group held for sale. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: CashAndCashEquivalentsHeldByEntityUnavailableForUseByGroup
description: The amount of significant cash and cash equivalent balances held by the entity that are not available for use by the group. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

name: CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPosition
description: The amount of cash and cash equivalents in the statement of cash flows when different from the amount of cash and cash equivalents in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

name: CashAndCashEquivalentsInSubsidiaryOrBusinessesAcquiredOrDisposed2013
description: The amount of cash and cash equivalents in subsidiaries or other businesses over which control is obtained or lost. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Cash and cash equivalents]

name: CashAndCashEquivalentsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for cash and cash equivalents acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents; Business combinations [member]]

name: CashCollateralPledgedSubjectToEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementOrSimilarAgreementNotSetOffAgainstFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of cash collateral pledged that is subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement and that is not set off against financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: CashCollateralReceivedSubjectToEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementOrSimilarAgreementNotSetOffAgainstFinancialAssets
description: The amount of cash collateral received that is subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement and that is not set off against financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: CashEquivalents
description: The amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value.

name: CashFlowsFromLosingControlOfSubsidiariesOrOtherBusinessesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The aggregate cash flows arising from losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInDecreaseIncreaseInRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents
description: The cash inflow (outflow) due to a decrease (increase) in restricted cash and cash equivalents. [Refer: Restricted cash and cash equivalents]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInDecreaseIncreaseInShorttermDepositsAndInvestments
description: The cash inflow (outflow) due to a decrease (increase) in short-term deposits and investments.

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResourcesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash flows from (used in) the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource, classified as investing activities.

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResourcesClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
description: The cash flows from (used in) the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource, classified as operating activities.

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities
description: The cash flows from (used in) financing activities, which are activities that result in changes in the size and composition of the contributed equity and borrowings of the entity.

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivitiesContinuingOperations
description: The cash flows from (used in) the entity's financing activities, related to continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Cash flows from (used in) financing activities]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations
description: The cash flows from (used in) the entity's financing activities, related to discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Cash flows from (used in) financing activities]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInIncreaseDecreaseInCurrentBorrowings
description: The cash inflow (outflow) due to an increase (decrease) in current borrowings. [Refer: Current borrowings]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInIncreasesInOperatingCapacity
description: The aggregate amount of cash flows that represent increases in the entity's ability to execute operating activities (for example, measured by units of output per day).

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities
description: The cash flows from (used in) investing activities, which are the acquisition and disposal of long-term assets and other investments not included in cash equivalents.

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivitiesContinuingOperations
description: The cash flows from (used in) the entity's investing activities, related to continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Cash flows from (used in) investing activities]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations
description: The cash flows from (used in) the entity's investing activities, related to discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Cash flows from (used in) investing activities]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities
description: The cash flows from (used in) operating activities, which are the principal revenue-producing activities of the entity and other activities that are not investing or financing activities. [Refer: Revenue]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivitiesContinuingOperations
description: The cash flows from (used in) the entity's operating activities, related to continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Cash flows from (used in) operating activities]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations
description: The cash flows from (used in) the entity's operating activities, related to discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Cash flows from (used in) operating activities]

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations
description: The cash from (used in) the entity's operations.

name: CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital
description: The cash inflow (outflow) from the entity's operations before changes in working capital.

name: CashFlowsUsedInExplorationAndDevelopmentActivities
description: The cash outflow for exploration and development activities.

name: CashFlowsUsedInObtainingControlOfSubsidiariesOrOtherBusinessesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The aggregate cash flows used in obtaining control of subsidiaries or other businesses, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: CashOnHand
description: The amount of cash held by the entity. This does not include demand deposits.

name: CashOutflowForLeases
description: The cash outflow for leases.

name: CashPaidLiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
description: The decrease in liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued resulting from cash paid. [Refer: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued]

name: CashPaymentsForFutureContractsForwardContractsOptionContractsAndSwapContractsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow for futures contracts, forward contracts, option contracts and swap contracts except when the contracts are held for dealing or trading purposes or the payments are classified as financing activities.

name: CashReceiptsFromFutureContractsForwardContractsOptionContractsAndSwapContractsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from futures contracts, forward contracts, option contracts and swap contracts except when the contracts are held for dealing or trading purposes or the receipts are classified as financing activities.

name: CashReceiptsFromRepaymentOfAdvancesAndLoansMadeToOtherPartiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from the repayment of advances and loans made to other parties (other than advances and loans of a financial institution), classified as investing activities.

name: CashReceiptsFromRepaymentOfAdvancesAndLoansMadeToRelatedParties
description: The cash inflow from repayment to the entity of loans and advances made to related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: CashRepaymentsOfAdvancesAndLoansFromRelatedParties
description: The cash outflow for repayments of advances and loans from related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: CashTransferred
description: The fair value, at acquisition date, of cash transferred as consideration in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: ChangeInAmountRecognisedForPreacquisitionDeferredTaxAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in a pre-acquisition deferred tax asset of the acquirer as a result of a business combination that changes the probability of realising the asset by the acquirer. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Business combinations [member]]

name: ChangesInBiologicalAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: ChangesInEquity
description: The increase (decrease) in equity. [Refer: Equity]

name: ChangesInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of a financial asset (or group of financial assets) designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of that asset determined either: (a) as the amount of change in its fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that give rise to market risk ; or (b) using an alternative method the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial assets]

name: ChangesInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstruments
description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Financial assets]

name: ChangesInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfLiability
description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of a financial liability that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of that liability. [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

name: ChangesInFairValueOfLoansOrReceivablesAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of loans or receivables that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the loans and receivables determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that gave rise to market risk; or (b) using an alternative method that the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]]

name: ChangesInGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in goodwill. [Refer: Goodwill]

name: ChangesInIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets other than goodwill. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: ChangesInInventoriesOfFinishedGoodsAndWorkInProgress
description: The decrease (increase) in inventories of finished goods and work in progress. [Refer: Inventories; Current finished goods; Current work in progress]

name: ChangesInInvestmentProperty
description: The increase (decrease) in investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

name: ChangesInOtherProvisions
description: The increase (decrease) in other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: ChangesInPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: ChangesInReimbursementRightsAtFairValue
description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, at fair value]

name: ClaimsAndBenefitsPaidNetOfReinsuranceRecoveries
description: The amount of claims and benefits paid to policyholders, net of reinsurance recoveries.

name: ClaimsIncurredButNotReported
description: The amount of liability for insured events that have occurred but for which claims have yet not been reported by policyholders.

name: ClaimsReportedByPolicyholders
description: The amount of liability for claims reported by policyholders as the result of the occurrence of insured events. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: ClosingForeignExchangeRate
description: The spot exchange rate at the end of the reporting period. Exchange rate is the ratio of exchange for two currencies. Spot exchange rate is the exchange rate for immediate delivery.

name: CommercialPapersIssued
description: The amount of commercial paper issued by the entity.

name: CommitmentsInRelationToJointVentures
description: The commitments that the entity has relating to its joint ventures as specified in paragraphs B18-B20 of IFRS 12. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: CommitmentsMadeByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of related-party commitments made by the entity to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised). [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: CommitmentsMadeOnBehalfOfEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of related-party commitments made on behalf of the entity to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised). [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: CommunicationExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from communication.

name: CompensationFromThirdPartiesForItemsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount of compensation from third parties for items of property, plant and equipment that were impaired, lost or given up that is included in profit or loss. [Refer: Profit (loss); Property, plant and equipment]

name: ComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
description: The amount of comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Comprehensive income; Non-controlling interests]

name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent
description: The amount of comprehensive income attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Comprehensive income]

name: ComputerSoftware
description: The amount of intangible assets representing computer software. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: ConfidenceLevelCorrespondingToResultsOfTechniqueOtherThanConfidenceLevelTechniqueUsedForDeterminingRiskAdjustmentForNonfinancialRisk
description: The confidence level corresponding to the results of a technique other than the confidence level technique used for determining the risk adjustment for non-financial risk. [Refer: Risk adjustment for non-financial risk [member]]

name: ConfidenceLevelUsedToDetermineRiskAdjustmentForNonfinancialRisk
description: The confidence level used to determine the risk adjustment for non-financial risk. [Refer: Risk adjustment for non-financial risk [member]]

name: ConsiderationPaidReceived
description: The amount of consideration paid or received in respect of both obtaining and losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: ConstructionInProgress
description: The amount of expenditure capitalised during the construction of non-current assets that are not yet available for use. [Refer: Non-current assets]

name: ConsumerLoans
description: The amount of consumer loans made by the entity. [Refer: Loans to consumers [member]]

name: ContingentConsiderationArrangementsAndIndemnificationAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: #N/A

name: ContingentConsiderationRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount, at acquisition date, of contingent consideration arrangements recognised as consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: ContingentLiabilitiesIncurredByVenturerInRelationToInterestsInJointVentures
description: The amount of contingent liabilities incurred in relation to interests in joint ventures. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

name: ContingentLiabilitiesIncurredInRelationToInterestsInAssociates
description: The amount of contingent liabilities incurred relating to the entity's interests in associates. [Refer: Associates [member]; Contingent liabilities [member]]

name: ContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised as of the acquisition date in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Business combinations [member]]

name: ContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Business combinations [member]]

name: ContingentRentsRecognisedAsExpense
description: #N/A

name: ContingentRentsRecognisedAsExpenseClassifiedAsFinanceLease
description: #N/A

name: ContingentRentsRecognisedAsExpenseClassifiedAsOperatingLease
description: #N/A

name: ContingentRentsRecognisedAsIncome
description: #N/A

name: ContingentRentsRecognisedAsIncomeClassifiedAsOperatingLease
description: #N/A

name: ContractAssets
description: The amount of an entitys right to consideration in exchange for goods or services that the entity has transferred to a customer, when that right is conditioned on something other than the passage of time (for example, the entitys future performance).

name: ContractLiabilities
description: The amount of an entitys obligation to transfer goods or services to a customer for which the entity has received consideration (or the amount is due) from the customer.

name: ContractualAmountsToBeExchangedInDerivativeFinancialInstrumentForWhichGrossCashFlowsAreExchanged
description: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to contractual amounts to be exchanged in a derivative financial instrument for which gross cash flows are exchanged. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

name: ContractualCapitalCommitments
description: The amount of capital commitments for which the entity has entered into a contract. [Refer: Capital commitments]

name: ContractualCommitmentsForAcquisitionOfIntangibleAssets
description: The amount of contractual commitments for the acquisition of intangible assets.

name: ContractualCommitmentsForAcquisitionOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount of contractual commitments for the acquisition of property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: ContributionsToPlanByEmployerNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from contributions to a defined benefit plan by the employer. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: ContributionsToPlanByPlanParticipantsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from contributions to a defined benefit plan by plan participants. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: ContributionsToPlanNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from contributions to a defined benefit plan. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: CopyrightsPatentsAndOtherIndustrialPropertyRightsServiceAndOperatingRights
description: The amount of intangible assets representing copyrights, patents and other industrial property rights, service and operating rights. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: CorporateDebtInstrumentsHeld
description: The amount of debt instruments held by the entity that were issued by a corporate entity. [Refer: Debt instruments held]

name: CorporateLoans
description: The amount of corporate loans made by the entity. [Refer: Loans to corporate entities [member]]

name: CostOfInventoriesRecognisedAsExpenseDuringPeriod
description: The amount of inventories recognised as an expense during the period. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CostOfMerchandiseSold
description: The amount of merchandise that was sold during the period and recognised as an expense.

name: CostOfPurchasedEnergySold
description: The amount of purchased energy that was sold during the period and recognised as an expense.

name: CostOfSales
description: The amount of all expenses directly or indirectly attributed to the goods or services sold. Attributed expenses include, but are not limited to, costs previously included in the measurement of inventory that has now been sold, such as depreciation and maintenance of factory buildings and equipment used in the production process, unallocated production overheads, and abnormal amounts of production costs of inventories.

name: CostOfSalesFoodAndBeverage
description: The amount of cost of sales attributed to food and beverage. [Refer: Cost of sales]

name: CostsIncurredAndRecognisedProfitsLessRecognisedLosses
description: #N/A

name: CreditDerivativeFairValue
description: The fair value of a credit derivative. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Derivatives [member]]

name: CreditDerivativeNominalAmount
description: The nominal amount of a credit derivative. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

name: CreditExposure
description: The amount of exposure to loss resulting from credit risk. [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

name: CreditrelatedFeeAndCommissionIncome
description: The amount of income recognised from credit-related fees and commissions. [Refer: Fee and commission income]

name: CumulativeGainLossOnDisposalOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The cumulative gain (loss) on disposal of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: CumulativeGainLossPreviouslyRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeArisingFromReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsOutOfFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeIntoFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasurementCategory
description: The cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from the reclassification of financial assets out of the fair value through other comprehensive income into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Other comprehensive income]

name: CumulativePreferenceDividendsNotRecognised
description: The amount of cumulative preference dividends not recognised.

name: CumulativeUnrecognisedShareOfLossesOfAssociates
description: The cumulative amount of the unrecognised share of losses of associates if the entity has stopped recognising its share of losses when applying the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Unrecognised share of losses of associates]

name: CumulativeUnrecognisedShareOfLossesOfJointVentures
description: The cumulative amount of the unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures if the entity has stopped recognising its share of losses when applying the equity method. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures]

name: CurrentAccruedExpensesAndOtherCurrentLiabilities
description: The amount of current accrued expenses and other current liabilities. [Refer: Accruals; Other current liabilities]

name: CurrentAccruedIncome
description: #N/A

name: CurrentAccruedIncomeIncludingCurrentContractAssets
description: The amount of current accrued income including current contract assets. [Refer: Accrued income including contract assets]

name: CurrentAdvances
description: The amount of current advances received representing current contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at a point in time. [Refer: Advances received, representing contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at point in time]

name: CurrentAdvancesToSuppliers
description: The amount of current advances made to suppliers before goods or services are received.

name: CurrentAgriculturalProduce
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of harvested produce of the entity's biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets; Inventories]

name: CurrentAndDeferredTaxRelatingToItemsChargedOrCreditedDirectlyToEquity
description: The aggregate current and deferred tax relating to particular items that are charged or credited directly to equity, for example: (a) an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings resulting from either a change in accounting policy that is applied retrospectively or the correction of an error; and (b) amounts arising on initial recognition of the equity component of a compound financial instrument. [Refer: Deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity; Retained earnings; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: CurrentAssets
description: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

name: CurrentAssetsLiabilities
description: The amount of current assets less the amount of current liabilities.

name: CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners
description: The amount of current assets other than non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Current assets; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners]

name: CurrentAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description:
Expiry date 2022-01-01: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for current assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]
Effective 2022-01-01: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for current assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Current assets; Business combinations [member]]

name: CurrentBiologicalAssets
description: The amount of current biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: CurrentBondsIssuedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentBondsIssued
description: The amount of current bonds issued and the current portion of non-current bonds issued. [Refer: Bonds issued]

name: CurrentBorrowingsAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentBorrowings
description: The amount of current borrowings and current portion of non-current borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: CurrentCommercialPapersIssuedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentCommercialPapersIssued
description: The amount of current commercial paper issued and the current portion of non-current commercial paper issued. [Refer: Commercial papers issued]

name: CurrentContractAssets
description: The amount of current contract assets. [Refer: Contract assets]

name: CurrentContractLiabilities
description: The amount of current contract liabilities. [Refer: Contract liabilities]

name: CurrentCrudeOil
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of unrefined, unprocessed oil. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CurrentDebtInstrumentsIssued
description: The amount of current debt instruments issued. [Refer: Debt instruments issued]

name: CurrentDeferredIncomeIncludingCurrentContractLiabilities
description: The amount of current deferred income including current contract liabilities. [Refer: Deferred income including contract liabilities]

name: CurrentDepositsFromCustomers
description: The amount of current deposits from customers. [Refer: Deposits from customers]

name: CurrentDerivativeFinancialAssets
description: The amount of current derivative financial assets. [Refer: Derivative financial assets]

name: CurrentDerivativeFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of current derivative financial liabilities. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities]

name: CurrentDividendPayables
description: The amount of current dividend payables. [Refer: Dividend payables]

name: CurrentEstimateOfFutureCashOutflowsToBePaidToFulfilObligationSignificantUnobservableInputsLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: CurrentExciseTaxPayables
description: The amount of current excise tax payables. [Refer: Excise tax payables]
