name: CurrentFinanceLeaseLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: CurrentFinanceLeaseReceivables
description: The amount of current finance lease receivables. [Refer: Finance lease receivables]

name: CurrentFinancialAssets
description: The amount of current financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of current financial assets measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of current financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of current financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
description: The amount of current financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss classified as held for trading. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognition
description: The amount of current financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMandatorilyMeasuredAtFairValue
description: The amount of current financial assets mandatorily measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, mandatorily measured at fair value]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasuredAsSuchInAccordanceWithExemptionForRepurchaseOfOwnFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss measured as such in accordance with the exemption for repurchase of own financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, measured as such in accordance with exemption for repurchase of own financial liabilities]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAvailableforsale
description: The amount of current financial assets available-for-sale. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Current financial assets]

name: CurrentFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of current financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income]

name: CurrentFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of current financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
description: The amount of current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. [Refer: Current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognition
description: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

name: CurrentFuel
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of fuel. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CurrentGovernmentGrants
description: The amount of current government grants recognised in the statement of financial position as deferred income. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

name: CurrentHeldtomaturityInvestments
description: The amount of current held-to-maturity investments. [Refer: Held-to-maturity investments]

name: CurrentInterestPayable
description: The amount of current interest payable. [Refer: Interest payable]

name: CurrentInterestReceivable
description: The amount of current interest receivable. [Refer: Interest receivable]

name: CurrentInventoriesHeldForSale
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of inventories held for sale in the ordinary course of business. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CurrentInventoriesInTransit
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of inventories in transit. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CurrentInvestments
description: The amount of current investments.

name: CurrentInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of current investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income]

name: CurrentLeaseLiabilities
description: The amount of current lease liabilities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

name: CurrentLiabilities
description:
Expiry date 2023-01-01: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have an unconditional right to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.
Effective 2023-01-01: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have the right at the end of the reporting period to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

name: CurrentLiabilitiesOtherThanLiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale
description: The amount of current liabilities other than liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Current liabilities; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale]

name: CurrentLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description:
Expiry date 2022-01-01: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for current liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]
Effective 2022-01-01: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for current liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Current liabilities; Business combinations [member]]

name: CurrentLoansAndReceivables
description: The amount of current loans and receivables. [Refer: Loans and receivables]

name: CurrentLoansReceivedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentLoansReceived
description: The amount of current loans received and the current portion of non-current loans received. [Refer: Loans received]

name: CurrentMaterialsAndSuppliesToBeConsumedInProductionProcessOrRenderingServices
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of materials and supplies to be consumed in a production process or while rendering services. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CurrentNaturalGas
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CurrentNoncashAssetsPledgedAsCollateralForWhichTransfereeHasRightByContractOrCustomToSellOrRepledgeCollateral
description: The amount of current non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

name: CurrentNotesAndDebenturesIssuedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentNotesAndDebenturesIssued
description: The amount of current notes and debentures issued and the current portion of non-current notes and debentures issued. [Refer: Notes and debentures issued]

name: CurrentOreStockpiles
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of ore stockpiles. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CurrentPackagingAndStorageMaterials
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of packaging and storage materials. [Refer: Inventories]

name: CurrentPayablesForPurchaseOfEnergy
description: The amount of current payables for the purchase of energy. [Refer: Payables for purchase of energy]

name: CurrentPayablesForPurchaseOfNoncurrentAssets
description: The amount of current payables for the purchase of non-current assets. [Refer: Payables for purchase of non-current assets]

name: CurrentPayablesOnSocialSecurityAndTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
description: The amount of current payables on social security and taxes other than incomes tax. [Refer: Payables on social security and taxes other than income tax]

name: CurrentPetroleumAndPetrochemicalProducts
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of products derived from crude oil and natural gas. [Refer: Current crude oil; Current natural gas]

name: CurrentPortionOfLongtermBorrowings
description: The current portion of non-current borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: CurrentPrepaidExpenses
description: The amount recognised as a current asset for expenditures made prior to the period when the economic benefit will be realised.

name: CurrentPrepayments
description: The amount of current prepayments. [Refer: Prepayments]

name: CurrentPrepaymentsAndCurrentAccruedIncome
description: #N/A

name: CurrentPrepaymentsAndOtherCurrentAssets
description: The amount of current prepayments and other current assets. [Refer: Other current assets; Current prepayments]

name: CurrentProvisions
description: The amount of current provisions, including provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

name: CurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits
description: The amount of current provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions for employee benefits]

name: CurrentRawMaterialsAndCurrentProductionSupplies
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of current raw materials and current production supplies. [Refer: Current production supplies; Current raw materials]

name: CurrentReceivablesDueFromAssociates
description: The amount of current receivables due from associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: CurrentReceivablesDueFromJointVentures
description: The amount of current receivables due from joint ventures. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: CurrentReceivablesFromContractsWithCustomers
description: The amount of current receivables from contracts with customers. [Refer: Receivables from contracts with customers]

name: CurrentReceivablesFromRentalOfProperties
description: The amount of current receivables from rental of properties. [Refer: Receivables from rental of properties]

name: CurrentReceivablesFromSaleOfProperties
description: The amount of current receivables from sale of properties. [Refer: Receivables from sale of properties]

name: CurrentReceivablesFromTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
description: The amount of current receivables from taxes other than income tax. [Refer: Receivables from taxes other than income tax]

name: CurrentRecognisedAssetsDefinedBenefitPlan
description: The amount of current net defined benefit asset. [Refer: Net defined benefit asset]

name: CurrentRecognisedLiabilitiesDefinedBenefitPlan
description: The amount of current net defined benefit liability. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability]

name: CurrentRefundsProvision
description: The amount of current provision for refunds. [Refer: Refunds provision]

name: CurrentRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents
description: The amount of current restricted cash and cash equivalents. [Refer: Restricted cash and cash equivalents]

name: CurrentRetentionPayables
description: The amount of current retention payables. [Refer: Retention payables]

name: CurrentSecuredBankLoansReceivedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentSecuredBankLoansReceived
description: The amount of current secured bank loans received and the current portion of non-current secured bank loans received. [Refer: Secured bank loans received]

name: CurrentServiceCostNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from employee service in the current period. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: CurrentTaxAssets
description: The excess of amount paid for current tax in respect of current and prior periods over the amount due for those periods. Current tax is the amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

name: CurrentTaxAssetsCurrent
description: The current amount of current tax assets. [Refer: Current tax assets]

name: CurrentTaxAssetsNoncurrent
description: The non-current amount of current tax assets. [Refer: Current tax assets]

name: CurrentTaxExpenseIncome
description: The amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

name: CurrentTaxExpenseIncomeAndAdjustmentsForCurrentTaxOfPriorPeriods
description: The amount of current tax expense (income) and adjustments for the current tax of prior periods. [Refer: Current tax expense (income); Adjustments for current tax of prior periods]

name: CurrentTaxLiabilities
description: The amount of current tax for current and prior periods to the extent unpaid. Current tax is the amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

name: CurrentTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
description: The current amount of current tax liabilities. [Refer: Current tax liabilities]

name: CurrentTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
description: The non-current amount of current tax liabilities. [Refer: Current tax liabilities]

name: CurrentTaxRelatingToItemsChargedOrCreditedDirectlyToEquity
description: The amount of current tax relating to particular items that are charged or credited directly to equity, for example: (a) an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings resulting from either a change in accounting policy that is applied retrospectively or the correction of an error; and (b) amounts arising on initial recognition of the equity component of a compound financial instrument. [Refer: Retained earnings; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: CurrentTradeReceivables
description: The amount of current trade receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables]

name: CurrentUnsecuredBankLoansReceivedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentUnsecuredBankLoansReceived
description: The amount of current unsecured bank loans received and the current portion of non-current unsecured bank loans received. [Refer: Unsecured bank loans received]

name: CurrentValueAddedTaxPayables
description: The amount of current value added tax payables. [Refer: Value added tax payables]

name: CurrentValueAddedTaxReceivables
description: The amount of current value added tax receivables. [Refer: Value added tax receivables]

name: CurrentWarrantLiability
description: The amount of current warrant liabilities. [Refer: Warrant liability]

name: CustomerrelatedIntangibleAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for customer-related intangible assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Customer-related intangible assets [member]; Business combinations [member]]

name: DatedSubordinatedLiabilities
description: The amount of subordinated liabilities that have a specified repayment date. [Refer: Subordinated liabilities]

name: DebtInstrumentsAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount instruments representing debt (rather than equity) contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: DebtInstrumentsHeld
description: The amount of instruments representing indebtedness held by the entity.

name: DebtSecurities
description: The amount of instruments issued by the entity that represent indebtedness.

name: DecreaseDueToHarvestBiologicalAssets
description: The decrease in biological assets due to the detachment of produce from the assets or the cessation of the assets' life processes. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: DecreaseInFairValueMeasurementDueToChangeInMultipleUnobservableInputsToReflectReasonablyPossibleAlternativeAssumptionsAssets
description: The amount of decrease in the fair value measurement of assets due to a change in multiple unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions.

name: DecreaseInFairValueMeasurementDueToChangeInOneOrMoreUnobservableInputsToReflectReasonablyPossibleAlternativeAssumptionsAssets
description: #N/A

name: DecreaseInFairValueMeasurementDueToChangeInOneOrMoreUnobservableInputsToReflectReasonablyPossibleAlternativeAssumptionsLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: DecreaseIncreaseThroughTaxOnSharebasedPaymentTransactions
description: The decrease (increase) in equity resulting from tax on transactions in which the entity: (a) receives goods or services from the supplier of those goods or services (including an employee) in a share-based payment arrangement; or (b) incurs an obligation to settle the transaction with the supplier in a share-based payment arrangement when another group entity receives those goods or services. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSaleBiologicalAssets
description: The decrease in biological assets through classification as held for sale or inclusion in a disposal group classified as held for sale. [Refer: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Biological assets]

name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSaleGoodwill
description: The decrease in goodwill due to classification as held for sale. [Refer: Goodwill; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSaleIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from classification as held for sale or inclusion in a disposal group classified as held for sale. [Refer: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSaleIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from classification as held for sale or inclusion in a disposal group classified as held for sale. [Refer: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSaleInvestmentProperty
description: The decrease in investment property through classification as held for sale or inclusion in a disposal group classified as held for sale. [Refer: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Property, plant and equipment; Investment property; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSalePropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment through classification as held for sale or inclusion in a disposal group classified as held for sale. [Refer: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Property, plant and equipment; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: DecreaseThroughDerecognitionExposureToCreditRiskOnLoanCommitmentsAndFinancialGuaranteeContracts
description: The decrease in exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts resulting from derecognition. [Refer: Exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts]

name: DecreaseThroughDerecognitionFinancialAssets
description: The decrease in financial assets resulting from derecognition. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: DecreaseThroughImpairmentContractAssets
description: The decrease in contract assets resulting from impairment. [Refer: Contract assets; Impairment loss]

name: DecreaseThroughImpairmentsRegulatoryDeferralAccountDebitBalances
description: The decrease in regulatory deferral account debit balances resulting from impairments. [Refer: Impairment loss; Regulatory deferral account debit balances]

name: DecreaseThroughLossOfControlOfSubsidiaryIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from the loss of control of a subsidiary. [Refer: Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: DecreaseThroughLossOfControlOfSubsidiaryIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from the loss of control of a subsidiary. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: DecreaseThroughLossOfControlOfSubsidiaryOtherProvisions
description: The decrease in other provisions resulting from the loss of control of a subsidiary. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: DecreaseThroughLossOfControlOfSubsidiaryPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment resulting from the loss of control of a subsidiary. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: DecreaseThroughPerformanceObligationBeingSatisfiedContractLiabilities
description: The decrease in contract liabilities resulting from the performance obligation being satisfied. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Performance obligations [member]]

name: DecreaseThroughRightToConsiderationBecomingUnconditionalContractAssets
description: The decrease in contract assets resulting from the right to consideration becoming unconditional. [Refer: Contract assets]

name: DecreaseThroughTransferToLiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOtherProvisions
description: The decrease in other provisions resulting from the transfer of those provisions to liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Other provisions; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: DecreaseThroughWriteoffFinancialAssets
description: The decrease in financial assets resulting from write-off. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: DeductibleTemporaryDifferencesForWhichNoDeferredTaxAssetIsRecognised
description: The amount of deductible temporary differences for which no deferred tax asset is recognised in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

name: DeemedCostOfInvestmentsForWhichDeemedCostIsPreviousGAAPCarryingAmount
description: The amount of aggregate deemed cost of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures or associates for which deemed cost is their previous GAAP carrying amount in the entity's first IFRS financial statements. [Refer: Associates [member]; Carrying amount [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Previous GAAP [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates reported in separate financial statements; IFRSs [member]]

name: DeferredAcquisitionCostsArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The amount of costs that an insurer incurs to sell, underwrite and initiate a new insurance contract whose recognition as an expense has been deferred. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: DeferredIncome
description: #N/A

name: DeferredIncomeClassifiedAsCurrent
description: #N/A

name: DeferredIncomeClassifiedAsNoncurrent
description: #N/A

name: DeferredIncomeIncludingContractLiabilities
description: The amount of liabilities representing income that has been received (or the amount is due) but is not yet earned, including contract liabilities. [Refer: Contract liabilities]

name: DeferredIncomeIncludingContractLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for deferred income including contract liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Deferred income including contract liabilities; Business combinations [member]]

name: DeferredIncomeRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: #N/A

name: DeferredTaxAssetWhenUtilisationIsDependentOnFutureTaxableProfitsInExcessOfProfitsFromReversalOfTaxableTemporaryDifferencesAndEntityHasSufferedLossInJurisdictionToWhichDeferredTaxAssetRelates
description: The amount of deferred tax asset when: (a) the utilisation of the deferred tax asset is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of the profits arising from the reversal of existing taxable temporary differences; and (b) the entity has suffered a loss in either the current or preceding period in the tax jurisdiction to which the deferred tax asset relates. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

name: DeferredTaxAssets
description: The amounts of income taxes recoverable in future periods in respect of: (a) deductible temporary differences; (b) the carryforward of unused tax losses; and (c) the carryforward of unused tax credits. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax credits [member]; Unused tax losses [member]]

name: DeferredTaxAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for deferred tax assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Business combinations [member]]

name: DeferredTaxExpenseArisingFromWritedownOrReversalOfWritedownOfDeferredTaxAsset
description: The amount of deferred tax expense arising from the write-down, or reversal of a previous write-down, of a deferred tax asset. [Refer: Deferred tax assets]

name: DeferredTaxExpenseIncome
description: The amount of tax expense (income) relating to changes in deferred tax liabilities and deferred tax assets. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax liabilities]

name: DeferredTaxExpenseIncomeRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of tax expense or income relating to changes in deferred tax liabilities and deferred tax assets, recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax expense (income); Deferred tax liabilities]

name: DeferredTaxExpenseIncomeRelatingToOriginationAndReversalOfTemporaryDifferences
description: The amount of deferred tax expense or income relating to the creation or reversal of temporary differences. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Deferred tax expense (income)]

name: DeferredTaxExpenseIncomeRelatingToTaxRateChangesOrImpositionOfNewTaxes
description: The amount of deferred tax expense or income relating to tax rate changes or the imposition of new taxes. [Refer: Deferred tax expense (income)]

name: DeferredTaxLiabilities
description: The amounts of income taxes payable in future periods in respect of taxable temporary differences. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOnLiabilitiesArisingFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS4AndNonderivativeInvestmentContracts
description: The amount of deferred tax liabilities on liabilities arising from the contracts within the scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities]

name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for deferred tax liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities; Business combinations [member]]

name: DeferredTaxLiabilityAsset
description: The amount of deferred tax liabilities or assets. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities; Deferred tax assets]

name: DeferredTaxRelatingToItemsChargedOrCreditedDirectlyToEquity
description: The amount of deferred tax related to items credited (charged) directly to equity. [Refer: Deferred tax expense (income)]

name: DefinedBenefitObligationAtPresentValue
description: The present value, without deducting any plan assets, of expected future payments required to settle the obligation resulting from employee service in the current and prior periods. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value]

name: DepositsFromBanks
description: The amount of deposit liabilities from banks held by the entity.

name: DepositsFromCustomers
description: The amount of deposit liabilities from customers held by the entity.

name: DepreciationAmortisationAndImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of depreciation expense, amortisation expense and impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) recognised in profit or loss]

name: DepreciationAndAmortisationExpense
description: The amount of depreciation and amortisation expense. Depreciation and amortisation are the systematic allocations of depreciable amounts of assets over their useful lives.

name: DepreciationBiologicalAssets
description: The amount of depreciation recognised on biological assets. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Biological assets]

name: DepreciationExpense
description: The amount of depreciation expense. Depreciation is the systematic allocation of depreciable amounts of tangible assets over their useful lives.

name: DepreciationInvestmentProperty
description: The amount of depreciation recognised on investment property. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Investment property]

name: DepreciationPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount of depreciation of property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Property, plant and equipment]

name: DepreciationRateBiologicalAssetsAtCost
description: The depreciation rate used for biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: DepreciationRatePropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The depreciation rate used for property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: DepreciationRightofuseAssets
description: The amount of depreciation of right-of-use assets. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Right-of-use assets]

name: DerivativeFinancialAssets
description: The amount of financial assets classified as derivative instruments. [Refer: Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

name: DerivativeFinancialAssetsHeldForHedging
description: The amount of derivative financial assets held for hedging. [Refer: Derivative financial assets]

name: DerivativeFinancialAssetsHeldForTrading
description: The amount of derivative financial assets held for trading. [Refer: Derivative financial assets; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading]

name: DerivativeFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of financial liabilities classified as derivative instruments. [Refer: Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

name: DerivativeFinancialLiabilitiesHeldForHedging
description: The amount of derivative financial liabilities held for hedging. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities]

name: DerivativeFinancialLiabilitiesHeldForTrading
description: The amount of derivative financial liabilities held for trading. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading]

name: DerivativeFinancialLiabilitiesUndiscountedCashFlows
description: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to derivative financial liabilities. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities]

name: DerivativesAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount derivatives contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]; Derivatives [member]]

name: DescriptionOfAmountsOfEntitysOwnFinancialInstrumentsIncludedInFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The fair value of the entity's own transferable financial instruments that are included in the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Financial instruments, class [member]; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: DescriptionOfAmountsOfOtherAssetsUsedByEntityIncludedInFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The fair value of other assets used by the entity that are included in the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: DescriptionOfAmountsOfPropertyOccupiedByEntityIncludedInFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The fair value of property occupied by the entity that are included in the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: DescriptionOfDiscountRatesAppliedToCashFlowProjections
description: The discount rate applied to cash flow projections for a cash-generating unit (group of units). [Refer: Cash-generating units [member]]

name: DescriptionOfDiscountRatesUsedInCurrentEstimateOfValueInUse
description: The discount rate used in the current estimate of the present value of the future cash flows expected to be derived from an asset or cash-generating unit.

name: DescriptionOfDiscountRatesUsedInPreviousEstimateOfValueInUse
description: The discount rate used in the previous estimate of the present value of the future cash flows expected to be derived from an asset or cash-generating unit.

name: DescriptionOfExpectedVolatilityShareOptionsGranted
description: The expected volatility of the share price used to calculate the fair value of the share options granted. Expected volatility is a measure of the amount by which a price is expected to fluctuate during a period. The measure of volatility used in option pricing models is the annualised standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a period of time.

name: DescriptionOfGrowthRateUsedToExtrapolateCashFlowProjections
description: The growth rate used to extrapolate cash flow projections beyond the period covered by the most recent budgets/forecasts for a cash-generating unit (group of units). [Refer: Cash-generating units [member]]

name: DescriptionOfOptionLifeShareOptionsGranted
description: The option life of share options granted.

name: DescriptionOfRiskFreeInterestRateShareOptionsGranted
description: The implied yield currently available on zero-coupon government issues of the country in whose currency the exercise price for share options granted is expressed, with a remaining term equal to the expected term of the option being valued (based on the option's remaining contractual life and taking into account the effects of expected early exercise). [Refer: Government [member]]

name: DifferenceBetweenCarryingAmountOfDividendsPayableAndCarryingAmountOfNoncashAssetsDistributed
description: The amount of difference between the carrying amount of dividends payable and the carrying amount of non-cash assets distributed when settling the dividends payable. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

name: DifferenceBetweenCarryingAmountOfFinancialLiabilityAndAmountContractuallyRequiredToPayAtMaturityToHolderOfObligation
description: The amount by which the carrying amount of a financial liability is more (less) than the amount that the entity would be contractually required to pay at maturity to the holder of the obligation. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

name: DilutedEarningsLossPerShare
description: The amount of profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity (the numerator), divided by the weighted average number of ordinary shares outstanding during the period (the denominator), both adjusted for the effects of all dilutive potential ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]; Weighted average [member]]

name: DilutedEarningsLossPerShareFromContinuingOperations
description: Diluted earnings (loss) per share from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Diluted earnings (loss) per share]

name: DilutedEarningsLossPerShareFromDiscontinuedOperations
description: Diluted earnings (loss) per share from discontinued operations. [Refer: Diluted earnings (loss) per share; Discontinued operations [member]]

name: DilutiveEffectOfConvertibleInstrumentsOnNumberOfOrdinaryShares
description: The number of dilutive potential ordinary shares that relate to the assumed conversion of the entity's convertible instruments.

name: DilutiveEffectOfShareOptionsOnNumberOfOrdinaryShares
description: The number of dilutive potential ordinary shares that relate to the assumed exercise of the entity's share options.

name: DirectOperatingExpenseFromInvestmentProperty
description: The amount of direct operating expenses (including repairs and maintenance) arising from investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

name: DirectOperatingExpenseFromInvestmentPropertyGeneratingRentalIncome
description: The amount of direct operating expenses (including repairs and maintenance) arising from investment property that generated rental income during the period recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Investment property]

name: DirectOperatingExpenseFromInvestmentPropertyNotGeneratingRentalIncome
description: The amount of direct operating expenses (including repairs and maintenance) arising from investment property that did not generate rental income during the period recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Investment property]

name: DirectorsRemunerationExpense
description: The amount of remuneration paid or payable to the entity's directors.

name: DiscountRateUsedInCurrentMeasurementOfFairValueLessCostsOfDisposal
description: The discount rate used in the current measurement of fair value less costs of disposal.

name: DiscountedUnguaranteedResidualValueOfAssetsSubjectToFinanceLease
description: The amount of the discounted unguaranteed residual value of assets subject to finance leases. Unguaranteed residual value is the portion of the residual value of the underlying asset, the realisation of which by a lessor is not assured or is guaranteed solely by a party related to the lessor. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

name: DisposalsAndRetirementsIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from disposals and retirements. [Refer: Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: DisposalsAndRetirementsIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from disposals and retirements. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: DisposalsAndRetirementsPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment resulting from disposals and retirements. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: DisposalsBiologicalAssets
description: The decrease in biological assets resulting from disposals. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: DisposalsIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from disposals. [Refer: Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: DisposalsIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from disposals. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: DisposalsInvestmentProperty
description: The decrease in investment property resulting from disposals. [Refer: Investment property]

name: DisposalsPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment resulting from disposals. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: DistributionAndAdministrativeExpense
description: The amount of expense relating to distribution costs and administrative expenses. [Refer: Administrative expenses; Distribution costs]

name: DistributionCosts
description: The amount of costs relating to the distribution of goods and services.

name: DividendPayables
description: The amount of dividends that the company has declared but not yet paid.

name: DividendsClassifiedAsExpense
description: The amount of dividends classified as an expense.

name: DividendsPaid
description: The amount of dividends recognised as distributions to owners.

name: DividendsPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow for dividends paid by the entity, classified as financing activities.

name: DividendsPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
description: The cash outflow for dividends paid by the entity, classified as operating activities.

name: DividendsPaidOrdinaryShares
description: The amount of dividends paid by the entity on ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

name: DividendsPaidOrdinarySharesPerShare
description: The amount of dividends paid per ordinary share.

name: DividendsPaidOtherShares
description: The amount of dividends paid by the entity on shares other than ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

name: DividendsPaidOtherSharesPerShare
description: The amount of dividends paid per other share.

name: DividendsPaidToEquityHoldersOfParentClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow for dividends paid to equity holders of the parent, classified as financing activities.

name: DividendsPaidToNoncontrollingInterests
description: The amount of dividends paid to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Non-controlling interests]

name: DividendsPaidToNoncontrollingInterestsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow for dividends paid to non-controlling interests, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Dividends paid to non-controlling interests]

name: DividendsPayable
description: The amount of dividends payable by means of the distribution of non-cash assets to owners.

name: DividendsProposedOrDeclaredBeforeFinancialStatementsAuthorisedForIssueButNotRecognisedAsDistributionToOwners
description: The amount of dividends proposed or declared after the reporting period but before financial statements are authorised for issue. Such dividends are not recognised as a liability at the end of the reporting period because no obligation exists at that time.

name: DividendsProposedOrDeclaredBeforeFinancialStatementsAuthorisedForIssueButNotRecognisedAsDistributionToOwnersPerShare
description: The amount, per share, of dividends proposed or declared before financial statements were authorised for issue but not recognised as distribution to owners.

name: DividendsReceived
description: The amount of dividends received.

name: DividendsReceivedClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from dividends received, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Dividends received]

name: DividendsReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
description: The cash inflow from dividends received, classified as operating activities. [Refer: Dividends received]

name: DividendsReceivedFromAssociatesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow representing dividends received from associates, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Associates [member]; Dividends received]

name: DividendsReceivedFromInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethodClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow representing dividends received from investments that are accounted for using the equity method, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Dividends received]

name: DividendsReceivedFromJointVenturesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow representing dividends received from joint ventures, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Dividends received]

name: DividendsRecognisedAsDistributionsToNoncontrollingInterests
description: The amount of dividends recognised as distributions to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Non-controlling interests]

name: DividendsRecognisedAsDistributionsToOwnersOfParent
description: The amount of dividends recognised as distributions to owners of the parent. [Refer: Parent [member]]

name: DividendsRecognisedAsDistributionsToOwnersOfParentRelatingToCurrentYear
description: The amount of dividends relating to the current year, recognised as distributions to owners of the parent. [Refer: Parent [member]]

name: DividendsRecognisedAsDistributionsToOwnersOfParentRelatingToPriorYears
description: The amount of dividends relating to prior years, recognised as distributions to owners of the parent. [Refer: Parent [member]]

name: DividendsRecognisedAsDistributionsToOwnersPerShare
description: The amount, per share, of dividends recognised as distributions to owners.

name: DividendsRecognisedForInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeDerecognisedDuringPeriod
description: The amount of dividends related to investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, derecognised during the reporting period. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

name: DividendsRecognisedForInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeHeldAtEndOfReportingPeriod
description: The amount of dividends related to investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

name: DonationsAndSubsidiesExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from donations and subsidies.

name: EffectOfExchangeRateChangesOnCashAndCashEquivalents
description: The effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents held or due in a foreign currency. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

name: EffectiveInterestRateDeterminedOnDateOfReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The effective interest rate determined on the date that the entity reclassifies its financial assets out of fair value through profit or loss category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: EffectiveInterestRateDeterminedOnDateOfReclassificationOfFinancialLiabilitiesFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The effective interest rate determined on the date that the entity reclassifies its financial liabilities out of fair value through profit or loss category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: EmployeeBenefitsExpense
description: The expense of all forms of consideration given by an entity in exchange for a service rendered by employees or for the termination of employment.

name: EmployeeContributions
description: The amount of employee contributions to retirement benefit plans.

name: EmployerContributions
description: The amount of employer contributions to retirement benefit plans.

name: EnergyExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from the consumption of energy.

name: EnergyTransmissionCharges
description: The amount of charges related to transmission of energy.

name: Equity
description: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

name: EquityAndLiabilities
description: The amount of the entity's equity and liabilities. [Refer: Equity; Liabilities]

name: EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent
description: The amount of equity attributable to the owners of the parent. This specifically excludes non-controlling interest.

name: EquityInstrumentsAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount instruments representing equity (rather than debt) contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: EquityInstrumentsHeld
description: The amount of instruments held by the entity that provide evidence of a residual interest in the assets of another entity after deducting all of its liabilities.

name: EquityInterestsOfAcquirer
description: The fair value, at the acquisition date, of equity interests of the acquirer transferred as consideration in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: EquityReclassifiedIntoFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of equity reclassified into financial liabilities. [Refer: Equity; Financial liabilities]

name: EstimateOfContributionsExpectedToBePaidToPlan
description: The estimate of the expected contributions to be made to a defined benefit plan for the next annual reporting period. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: EstimatedCashFlowsOfFinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The estimated cash flows of financial assets reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: EstimatedFinancialEffectContingentLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of the estimated financial effect of contingent liabilities in a business combination that were not recognised because their fair value cannot be measured reliably. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

name: EstimatedFinancialEffectOfContingentAssets
description: The amount of the estimated financial effect of possible assets that arise from past events and whose existence will be confirmed only by the occurrence or non-occurrence of one or more uncertain future events not wholly within control of the entity.

name: EstimatedFinancialEffectOfContingentLiabilities
description: The amount of the estimated financial effect of contingent liabilities. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

name: ExciseTaxPayables
description: The amount of payables related to excise tax.

name: ExercisePriceOfOutstandingShareOptions
description: #N/A

name: ExercisePriceOfOutstandingShareOptions2019
description: The exercise price of outstanding share options.

name: ExercisePriceShareOptionsGranted
description: #N/A

name: ExercisePriceShareOptionsGranted2019
description: The exercise price of share options granted.

name: ExpectedCashOutflowOnRedemptionOrRepurchaseOfPuttableFinancialInstruments
description: The expected cash outflow on the redemption or repurchase of puttable financial instruments classified as equity. [Refer: Liquidity risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: ExpectedCreditLossRate
description: The rate of expected credit losses, calculated as percentage of the gross carrying amount. Expected credit losses are the weighted average of credit losses with the respective risks of a default occurring as the weights.

name: ExpectedDividendAsPercentageShareOptionsGranted
description: The percentage of an expected dividend used to calculate the fair value of share options granted.

name: ExpectedDividendShareOptionsGranted
description: The amount of an expected dividend used to calculate the fair value of share options granted.

name: ExpectedFutureMinimumSubleasePaymentsReceivableUnderNoncancellableSubleasesClassifiedAsOperatingLease
description: #N/A

name: ExpectedFutureMinimumSubleasePaymentsReceivableUnderNoncancellableSubleasesClassifiedFinanceLease
description: #N/A

name: ExpectedReimbursementOtherProvisions
description: The amount expected to be reimbursed by another party on expenditures to settle other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: ExpenseArisingFromExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResources
description: The amount of expense arising from the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource.

name: ExpenseArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The amount of expense arising from insurance contracts. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: ExpenseByNature
description: The amount of expenses aggregated according to their nature (for example, depreciation, purchases of materials, transport costs, employee benefits and advertising costs), and not reallocated among functions within the entity.

name: ExpenseDueToUnwindingOfDiscountOnProvisions
description: The amount of expense recognised due to the unwinding of the discount on provisions other than provisions from employee benefits, resulting from the effect of the passage of time. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: ExpenseForPolicyholderClaimsAndBenefitsWithoutReductionForReinsuranceHeld
description: The amount of expense for policyholder claims and benefits, without any reduction for reinsurance held.

name: ExpenseFromCashsettledSharebasedPaymentTransactionsInWhichGoodsOrServicesReceivedDidNotQualifyForRecognitionAsAssets
description: The amount of expense arising from cash-settled share-based payment transactions in which the goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets. [Refer: Expense from share-based payment transactions]

name: ExpenseFromEquitysettledSharebasedPaymentTransactionsInWhichGoodsOrServicesReceivedDidNotQualifyForRecognitionAsAssets
description: The amount of expense arising from equity-settled share-based payment transactions in which the goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets. [Refer: Expense from share-based payment transactions]

name: ExpenseFromSharebasedPaymentTransactionsInWhichGoodsOrServicesReceivedDidNotQualifyForRecognitionAsAssets
description: The amount of expense arising from share-based payment transactions in which the goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets.

name: ExpenseFromSharebasedPaymentTransactionsWithEmployees
description: The amount of expense from share-based payment transactions with employees. [Refer: Expense from share-based payment transactions]

name: ExpenseIncomeIncludedInProfitOrLossLiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
description: The increase (decrease) in liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued resulting from expense or income included in profit or loss. [Refer: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued]

name: ExpenseIncomeOnDiscontinuedOperations
description: #N/A

name: ExpenseOfRestructuringActivities
description: The amount of expense relating to restructuring. Restructuring is a programme that is planned and controlled by management and materially changes either the scope of a business undertaken by an entity or the manner in which that business is conducted. Such programmes include: (a) the sale or termination of a line of business; (b) closure of business locations in a country or region or the relocation of activities from one country or region to another; (c) changes in management structure; and (d) fundamental reorganisations that have a material effect on the nature and focus of the entity's operations.

name: ExpenseRecognisedDuringPeriodForBadAndDoubtfulDebtsForRelatedPartyTransaction
description: The amount of expense recognised during the period in respect of bad or doubtful debts due from related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: ExpenseRelatingToLeasesOfLowvalueAssetsForWhichRecognitionExemptionHasBeenUsed
description: The amount of the expense relating to leases of low-value assets accounted for applying paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. This expense shall not include the expense relating to short-term leases of low-value assets.

name: ExpenseRelatingToShorttermLeasesForWhichRecognitionExemptionHasBeenUsed
description: The amount of the expense relating to short-term leases accounted for applying paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. This expense need not include the expense relating to leases with a lease term of one month or less. Short-term lease is a lease that, at the commencement date, has a lease term of 12 months or less. A lease that contains a purchase option is not a short-term lease.

name: ExpenseRelatingToVariableLeasePaymentsNotIncludedInMeasurementOfLeaseLiabilities
description: The amount of the expense relating to variable lease payments not included in the measurement of lease liabilities. Variable lease payments are the portion of payments made by a lessee to a lessor for the right to use an underlying asset during the lease term that varies because of changes in facts or circumstances occurring after the commencement date, other than the passage of time. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

name: ExpensesArisingFromReinsuranceHeld
description: The amount of expenses relating to reinsurance contracts held.

name: ExpensesDiscontinuedOperations
description: #N/A

name: ExpensesFromAllocationOfPremiumsPaidToReinsurer
description: The amount of expenses from an allocation of the premiums paid to the reinsurer. [Refer: Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

name: ExpensesOnFinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of expenses recognised in profit or loss on financial assets reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: ExposureToCreditRiskOnLoanCommitmentsAndFinancialGuaranteeContracts
description: The amount of the exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts. [Refer: Loan commitments [member]; Financial guarantee contracts [member]; Credit risk [member]]

name: FairValueGainLossThatWouldHaveBeenRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeIfFinancialAssetsHadNotBeenReclassified
description: The fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in other comprehensive income if financial assets had not been reclassified. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueGainLossThatWouldHaveBeenRecognisedInProfitOrLossIfFinancialAssetsHadNotBeenReclassifiedOutOfFairValueThroughProfitOrLossAndIntoFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeInitialApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss if financial assets had not been reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss and into the fair value through other comprehensive income as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueGainLossThatWouldHaveBeenRecognisedInProfitOrLossOrOtherComprehensiveIncomeIfFinancialAssetsHadNotBeenReclassifiedFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income if financial assets had not been reclassified so that they are measured at amortised cost as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueGainLossThatWouldHaveBeenRecognisedInProfitOrLossOrOtherComprehensiveIncomeIfFinancialLiabilitiesHadNotBeenReclassifiedFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income if financial liabilities had not been reclassified so that they are measured at amortised cost as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: FairValueGainsLossesOnFinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssetsNotRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The fair value gains (losses) that would have been recognised in other comprehensive income if financial assets had not been reclassified out of the available-for-sale category. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income]

name: FairValueGainsLossesOnFinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssetsRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The fair value gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on financial assets reclassified out of the available-for-sale category. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income]

name: FairValueGainsLossesOnFinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossNotRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
description: The fair value gains (losses) that would have been recognised in profit or loss if financial assets had not been reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FairValueGainsLossesOnFinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
description: The fair value gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss on financial assets reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FairValueGainsOrLossThatWouldHaveBeenRecognisedInProfitOrLossIfFinancialAssetsHadNotBeenReclassified
description: The fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss if financial assets had not been reclassified. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueOfAcquiredReceivables
description: The fair value of receivables acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: FairValueOfAssetsRepresentingContinuingInvolvementInDerecognisedFinancialAssets
description: The fair value of assets representing the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueOfAssociatedFinancialLiabilities
description: The fair value of financial liabilities associated with transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueOfFinancialAssetsReclassifiedAsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
description: The fair value of financial assets reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss category into amortised cost or fair value through other comprehensive income category. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueOfFinancialAssetsReclassifiedAsMeasuredAtAmortisedCostFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The fair value of financial assets that have been reclassified so that they are measured at amortised cost as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueOfFinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeCategoryIntoAmortisedCostCategory
description: The fair value of financial assets reclassified out of the fair value other comprehensive income category so that they are measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueOfFinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfFairValueThroughProfitOrLossAndIntoFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeInitialApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The fair value of financial assets that have been reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss and into the fair value through other comprehensive income as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueOfFinancialInstrumentOnDiscontinuationOfMeasurementAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossBecauseCreditDerivativeIsUsedToManageCreditRiskLiabilities
description: The fair value of a financial instrument, recognised as a liability, on discontinuation of its measurement at fair value through profit or loss, because a credit derivative is used to manage the credit risk of that financial instrument. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Derivatives [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: FairValueOfInvestmentInJointVenturesWherePriceQuotationsPublished
description: The fair value of investments in joint ventures if there are quoted market prices for the investment. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Investments in joint ventures reported in separate financial statements]

name: FairValueOfInvestmentsInAssociatesWherePriceQuotationsPublished
description: The fair value of investments in associates if there are quoted market prices for the investment. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments in associates reported in separate financial statements]

name: FairValueOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: FairValueOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeAtDateOfDerecognition
description: The fair value at the date of the derecognition of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

name: FairValueOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentMateriallyDifferentFromCarryingAmount
description: The fair value of property, plant and equipment when the fair value is materially different from the carrying amount. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

name: FairValueOfTransferredFinancialAssetsAssociatedFinancialLiabilitiesThatAreNotDerecognisedInTheirEntirety
description: The difference between the fair value of transferred financial assets that have not been derecognised in their entirety and their associated liabilities. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FairValueOfTransferredFinancialAssetsThatAreNotDerecognisedInTheirEntirety
description: The fair value of transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FeeAndCommissionExpense
description: The amount of expense relating to fees and commissions.

name: FeeAndCommissionIncome
description: The amount of income relating to fees and commissions.

name: FeeAndCommissionIncomeExpense
description: The amount of income or expense relating to fees and commissions.

name: FeeExpenseArisingFromFinancialLiabilitiesNotAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of fee expense (other than the amounts included when determining the effective interest rate) arising from financial liabilities that are not at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial liabilities]

name: FeeIncomeArisingFromFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of fee income (other than the amounts included when determining the effective interest rate) arising from financial assets that are not at fair value through profit or loss.

name: FeeIncomeExpenseArisingFromFinancialAssetsOrFinancialLiabilitiesNotAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of fee income or expense (other than the amounts included when determining the effective interest rate) arising from financial assets or financial liabilities that are not at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial liabilities]

name: FeeIncomeExpenseArisingFromTrustAndFiduciaryActivities
description: The amount of fee income and expense (other than the amounts included when determining the effective interest rate) arising from trust and other fiduciary activities that result in the holding or investing of assets on behalf of individuals, trusts, retirement benefit plans and other institutions.

name: FinanceCosts
description: The amount of costs associated with financing activities of the entity.

name: FinanceCostsPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
description: The cash outflow for finance costs paid, classified as operating activities. [Refer: Finance costs]

name: FinanceIncome
description: The amount of income associated with interest and other financing activities of the entity.

name: FinanceIncomeCost
description: The amount of income or cost associated with interest and other financing activities of the entity.

name: FinanceIncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held that is recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

name: FinanceIncomeOnNetInvestmentInFinanceLease
description: The amount of finance income on the net investment in the finance lease. [Refer: Finance income; Net investment in finance lease]

name: FinanceIncomeReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
description: The cash inflow from finance income received, classified as operating activities. [Refer: Finance income]

name: FinanceLeaseLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: FinanceLeaseReceivables
description: The amount of receivables related to finance leases.

name: FinancialAssets
description: The amount of assets that are: (a) cash; (b) an equity instrument of another entity; (c) a contractual right: (i) to receive cash or another financial asset from another entity; or (ii) to exchange financial assets or financial liabilities with another entity under conditions that are potentially favourable to the entity; or (d) a contract that will, or may be, settled in the entitys own equity instruments and is: (i) a non-derivative for which the entity is, or may be, obliged to receive a variable number of the entitys own equity instruments; or (ii) a derivative that will, or may be, settled other than by the exchange of a fixed amount of cash or another financial asset for a fixed number of the entitys own equity instruments. For this purpose the entitys own equity instruments do not include puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16A-16B of IAS 32, instruments that impose on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation and are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32, or instruments that are contracts for the future receipt or delivery of the entitys own equity instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]; Financial liabilities]

name: FinancialAssetsAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of financial assets at amortised cost. The amortised cost is the amount at which financial assets are measured at initial recognition minus principal repayments, plus or minus the cumulative amortisation using the effective interest method of any difference between that initial amount and the maturity amount, and adjusted for any impairment. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsAtFairValue
description: The fair value of financial assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets; Other comprehensive income]

name: FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of financial assets that are measured at fair value and for which gains (losses) are recognised in profit or loss. A financial asset shall be measured at fair value through profit or loss unless it is measured at amortised cost or at fair value through other comprehensive income. A gain (loss) on a financial asset measured at fair value shall be recognised in profit or loss unless it is part of a hedging relationship, it is an investment in an equity instrument for which the entity has elected to present gains and losses in other comprehensive income or it is a financial asset measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
description: The amount of financial assets at fair value through profit or loss classified as held for trading. A financial asset is classified as held for trading if: (a) it is acquired principally for the purpose of selling it in the near term; (b) on initial recognition it is part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking; or (c) it is a derivative (except for a derivative that is a financial guarantee contract or a designated and effective hedging instrument). [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedAsUponInitialRecognition
description: The amount of financial assets at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMandatorilyMeasuredAtFairValue
description: The amount of financial assets mandatorily measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasuredAsSuchInAccordanceWithExemptionForRepurchaseOfOwnFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of financial assets at fair value through profit or loss measured as such in accordance with the exemption for repurchase of own financial liabilities, as described in paragraph 3.3.5 of IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FinancialAssetsAvailableforsale
description: The amount of non-derivative financial assets that are designated as available for sale or are not classified as (a) loans and receivables; (b) held-to-maturity investments; or (c) financial assets at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Derivative financial assets; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Held-to-maturity investments]

name: FinancialAssetsCarryingAmountImmediatelyAfterInitialApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The carrying amount of financial assets immediately after the initial application of IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsCarryingAmountImmediatelyBeforeInitialApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The carrying amount of financial assets at the date of initial application of IFRS 9, determined in accordance with IAS 39 or in accordance with a previous version of IFRS 9 (if the entitys chosen approach to applying IFRS 9 involves more than one date of initial application for different requirements). [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4CarryingAmountApplyingIAS39
description: The carrying amount applying IAS 39 of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4. In case of financial assets measured at amortised cost, the amount should be before adjusting for any impairment allowances. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

name: FinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4FairValue
description: The fair value of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, ie financial assets with contractual terms that give rise on specified dates to cash flows that are solely payments of principal and interest on the principal amount outstanding (ie financial assets that meet the condition in paragraphs 4.1.2(b) and 4.1.2A(b) of IFRS 9), excluding any financial asset that meets the definition of held for trading in IFRS 9, or that is managed and whose performance is evaluated on a fair value basis (paragraph B4.1.6 of IFRS 9). [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4ThatDoNotHaveLowCreditRiskCarryingAmountApplyingIAS39
description: The carrying amount applying IAS 39 of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4 that do not have low credit risk. In case of financial assets measured at amortised cost, the amount should be before adjusting for any impairment allowances. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

name: FinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4ThatDoNotHaveLowCreditRiskFairValue
description: The fair value of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4 that do not have low credit risk. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

name: FinancialAssetsHeldForManagingLiquidityRisk
description: The amount of financial assets held for managing liquidity risk (for example, financial assets that are readily saleable or expected to generate cash inflows to meet cash outflows on financial liabilities). [Refer: Liquidity risk [member]; Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

name: FinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of financial assets that are measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. A financial asset shall be measured at fair value through other comprehensive income if both of the following conditions are met: (a) the financial asset is held within a business model whose objective is achieved by both collecting contractual cash flows and selling financial assets and (b) the contractual terms of the financial asset give rise on specified dates to cash flows that are solely payments of principal and interest on the principal amount outstanding. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsPledgedAsCollateralForLiabilitiesOrContingentLiabilities
description: The amount of financial assets that the entity has pledged as collateral for liabilities or contingent liabilities, including amounts that have been reclassified in accordance with paragraph 3.2.23(a) of IFRS 9. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsPreviouslyDesignatedAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossButNoLongerSoDesignatedFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The amount of financial assets in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated when the entity initially applies IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FinancialAssetsPreviouslyDesignatedAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossReclassifiedDueToRequirementsOfIFRS9FirstApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The amount of financial assets in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated, and that were reclassified due to requirements of IFRS 9 when the entity initially applies IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssetsAtFairValue
description: The fair value of financial assets that have been reclassified out of the available-for-sale category. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets, at fair value]

name: FinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssetsCarryingAmount
description: The carrying amount of financial assets that have been reclassified out of the available-for-sale category. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: FinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossAtFairValue
description: The fair value of financial assets that have been reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: FinancialAssetsReclassifiedOutOfFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossCarryingAmount
