description: The increase (decrease) in liabilities under issued insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts resulting from adjustments arising from the passage of time. [Refer: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued]

description: The increase (decrease) in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss resulting from amounts recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughAppropriationOfRetainedEarnings
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from the appropriation of retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughBusinessCombinationsAndDisposalsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from business combinations and disposals. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughBusinessCombinationsDeferredTaxLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in deferred tax liability (asset) resulting from business combinations. [Refer: Deferred tax liability (asset)]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangeInDiscountRateContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
description: The increase (decrease) in contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination due to changes in the discount rate. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Business combinations [member]]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangeInDiscountRateOtherProvisions
description: The increase (decrease) in other provisions resulting from a change in discount rate. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangeInEquityOfSubsidiaries
description: The increase (decrease) in the entity's equity resulting from the change in the equity of subsidiaries. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInDiscountRatesRegulatoryDeferralAccountDebitBalances
description: The increase (decrease) in regulatory deferral account debit balances resulting from changes in discount rates. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account debit balances]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInFairValuesLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivities
description: The increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities resulting from changes in fair values. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInForeignExchangeRatesNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInForeignExchangeRatesRegulatoryDeferralAccountCreditBalances
description: The increase (decrease) in regulatory deferral account credit balances resulting from changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account credit balances]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInForeignExchangeRatesRegulatoryDeferralAccountDebitBalances
description: The increase (decrease) in regulatory deferral account debit balances resulting from changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account debit balances]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInModelsOrRiskParametersExposureToCreditRiskOnLoanCommitmentsAndFinancialGuaranteeContracts
description: The increase (decrease) in exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts resulting from changes in models or risk parameters. [Refer: Exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInModelsOrRiskParametersFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in financial assets resulting from changes in models or risk parameters. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiariesThatDoNotResultInLossOfControl
description: The increase (decrease) in equity through changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiariesThatDoNotResultInLossOfControlEquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent
description: The increase (decrease) in equity attributable to owners of the parent through changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Equity attributable to owners of parent]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughConversionOfConvertibleInstruments
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from the conversion of convertible instruments.

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughCumulativeCatchupAdjustmentsToRevenueArisingFromChangeInEstimateOfTransactionPriceContractAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in contract assets resulting from cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue arising from a change in an estimate of the transaction price. The transaction price is the amount of consideration to which an entity expects to be entitled in exchange for transferring promised goods or services to a customer, excluding amounts collected on behalf of third parties (for example, some sales taxes). [Refer: Increase (decrease) through cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue, contract assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughCumulativeCatchupAdjustmentsToRevenueArisingFromChangeInEstimateOfTransactionPriceContractLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) in contract liabilities resulting from cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue arising from a change in an estimate of the transaction price. The transaction price is the amount of consideration to which an entity expects to be entitled in exchange for transferring promised goods or services to a customer, excluding amounts collected on behalf of third parties (for example, some sales taxes). [Refer: Increase (decrease) through cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue, contract liabilities]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughCumulativeCatchupAdjustmentsToRevenueArisingFromChangeInMeasureOfProgressContractAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in contract assets resulting from cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue arising from a change in the measure of progress. [Refer: Increase (decrease) through cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue, contract assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughCumulativeCatchupAdjustmentsToRevenueArisingFromChangeInMeasureOfProgressContractLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) in contract liabilities resulting from cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue arising from a change in the measure of progress. [Refer: Increase (decrease) through cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue, contract liabilities]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughCumulativeCatchupAdjustmentsToRevenueArisingFromContractModificationContractAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in contract assets resulting from cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue arising from a contract modification. A contract modification is a change in the scope or price (or both) of a contract that is approved by the parties to the contract. [Refer: Increase (decrease) through cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue, contract assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughCumulativeCatchupAdjustmentsToRevenueArisingFromContractModificationContractLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) in contract liabilities resulting from cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue arising from a contract modification. A contract modification is a change in the scope or price (or both) of a contract that is approved by the parties to the contract. [Refer: Increase (decrease) through cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue, contract liabilities]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughCumulativeCatchupAdjustmentsToRevenueContractAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in contract assets resulting from cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue. [Refer: Contract assets; Revenue from contracts with customers]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughCumulativeCatchupAdjustmentsToRevenueContractLiabilities
description: The increase (decrease) in contract liabilities resulting from cumulative catch-up adjustments to revenue. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Revenue from contracts with customers]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughDisposalOfSubsidiary
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from the disposal of subsidiaries. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughEffectOfChangesInForeignExchangeRatesLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivities
description: The increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities resulting from the effect of changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughExerciseOfOptions
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from the exercise of options.

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughExerciseOfWarrantsEquity
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from the exercise of warrants.

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughFinancingCashFlowsLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivities
description: The increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities resulting from financing cash flows. [Refer: Cash flows from (used in) financing activities; Liabilities arising from financing activities]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughForeignExchangeAndOtherMovementsExposureToCreditRiskOnLoanCommitmentsAndFinancialGuaranteeContracts
description: The increase (decrease) in exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts resulting from foreign exchange and other movements. [Refer: Exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughForeignExchangeAndOtherMovementsFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in financial assets resulting from foreign exchange and other movements. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughForeignExchangeExposureToCreditRiskOnLoanCommitmentsAndFinancialGuaranteeContracts
description: The increase (decrease) in exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts resulting from foreign exchange. [Refer: Exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughForeignExchangeFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in financial assets resulting from foreign exchange. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughLossOfControlOfSubsidiaryDeferredTaxLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease in deferred tax liability (asset) resulting from the loss of control of a subsidiary. [Refer: Deferred tax liability (asset)]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughModificationOfContractualCashFlowsExposureToCreditRiskOnLoanCommitmentsAndFinancialGuaranteeContracts
description: The increase (decrease) in exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts resulting from the modification of contractual cash flows. [Refer: Exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughModificationOfContractualCashFlowsFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in financial assets resulting from the modification of contractual cash flows. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesBiologicalAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in biological assets resulting from net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesDeferredAcquisitionCostsArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The increase (decrease) in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesDeferredTaxLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in deferred tax liability (asset) resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Deferred tax liability (asset)]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in goodwill resulting from net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesInvestmentProperty
description: The increase (decrease) in investment property resulting from net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Investment property]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesLiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
description: The change in insurance liabilities resulting from the net exchange differences that arise on the translation of the financial statements into a different presentation currency, and on the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency. [Refer: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesOtherProvisions
description: The increase (decrease) in other provisions resulting from foreign currency exchange rate changes on provisions measured in a currency different from the entity's presentation currency. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment resulting from net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesReimbursementRightsAtFairValue
description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, resulting from foreign currency exchange rate changes on plans measured in a currency that is different from the entity's presentation currency. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, at fair value]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesReinsuranceAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in reinsurance assets resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Reinsurance assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNewTransactionsAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
description: The increase (decrease) in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss resulting from new transactions. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughObtainingOrLosingControlOfSubsidiariesOrOtherBusinessesLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivities
description: The increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities resulting from obtaining or losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities; Subsidiaries [member]]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesInvestmentProperty
description: The increase (decrease) in investment property resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Investment property]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivities
description: The increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesLiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
description: The increase (decrease) in liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesReinsuranceAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in reinsurance assets resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Reinsurance assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherContributionsByOwners
description: The increase in equity through other contributions by owners that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherDistributionsToOwners
description: The decrease in equity through distributions to owners that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherMovementsFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in financial assets resulting from other movements. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughPremiumsPaidForReinsuranceContractsHeldInsuranceContractsLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in insurance contracts liability (asset) resulting from premiums paid for reinsurance contracts held. [Refer: Insurance contracts liability (asset); Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughPremiumsReceivedForInsuranceContractsIssuedInsuranceContractsLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in insurance contracts liability (asset) resulting from premiums received for insurance contracts issued. [Refer: Insurance contracts liability (asset)]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughShadowAccountingDeferredAcquisitionCostsArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The increase (decrease) in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts that result from shadow accounting. Shadow accounting is a practice with the following two features: (a) a recognised but unrealised gain or loss on an asset affects the measurement of the insurance liability in the same way that a realised gain or loss does; and (b) if unrealised gains or losses on an asset are recognised directly in equity, the resulting change in the carrying amount of the insurance liability is also recognised in equity. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughSharebasedPaymentTransactions
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from share-based payment transactions. [Refer: Equity]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTimeValueOfMoneyAdjustmentOtherProvisions
description: The increase in other provisions through adjustments arising from the passage of time. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransactionsWithOwners
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from transactions with owners.

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransferBetweenRevaluationReserveAndRetainedEarnings
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from transfers between a revaluation surplus and retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings; Revaluation surplus]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransferToStatutoryReserve
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from transfers to a statutory reserve. [Refer: Statutory reserve]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesBiologicalAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in biological assets resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesEquity
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Equity]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in goodwill resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from transfers and changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from transfers and changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesOtherProvisions
description: The increase (decrease) in other provisions resulting from transfers and changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment resulting from transfers and changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersExposureToCreditRiskOnLoanCommitmentsAndFinancialGuaranteeContracts
description: The increase (decrease) in exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts resulting from transfers. [Refer: Exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersFinancialAssets
description: The increase (decrease) in financial assets resulting from transfers. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersFromConstructionInProgressPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment resulting from transfers from construction in progress. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Construction in progress]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersFromToInvestmentPropertyPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment resulting from transfers from (to) investment property. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Investment property]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from transfers. [Refer: Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from transfers. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment resulting from transfers. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTreasuryShareTransactions
description: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from treasury share transactions. [Refer: Equity; Treasury shares]

description: #N/A

description: #N/A

name: IncreaseThroughAdjustmentsArisingFromPassageOfTimeContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
description: The increase in contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination through adjustments arising from the passage of time. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Business combinations [member]]

name: IncreaseThroughBusinessCombinationsContractAssets
description: The increase in contract assets resulting from business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Contract assets]

name: IncreaseThroughBusinessCombinationsContractLiabilities
description: The increase in contract liabilities resulting from business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Contract liabilities]

name: IncreaseThroughItemsAssumedInBusinessCombinationRegulatoryDeferralAccountCreditBalances
description: The increase in regulatory deferral account credit balances resulting from items assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Regulatory deferral account credit balances]

name: IncreaseThroughNewLeasesLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivities
description: The increase in liabilities arising from financing activities resulting from new leases. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

name: IncreaseThroughOriginationOrPurchaseExposureToCreditRiskOnLoanCommitmentsAndFinancialGuaranteeContracts
description: The increase in exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts resulting from origination or purchase. [Refer: Exposure to credit risk on loan commitments and financial guarantee contracts]

name: IncreaseThroughOriginationOrPurchaseFinancialAssets
description: The increase in financial assets resulting from origination or purchase. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: IncrementalFairValueGrantedModifiedSharebasedPaymentArrangements
description: The difference, for modified share-based payment arrangements, between the fair value of the modified equity instrument and that of the original equity instrument, both estimated as at the date of the modification. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

name: IndemnificationAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for indemnification assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: InflowsOfCashFromInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from investing activities.

name: InsuranceContractsIssuedThatAreAssets
description: The amount of insurance contracts issued that are assets. [Refer: Assets; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

name: InsuranceContractsIssuedThatAreLiabilities
description: The amount of insurance contracts issued that are liabilities. [Refer: Liabilities; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

name: InsuranceContractsLiabilityAsset
description: The amount of insurance contracts liability (asset). [Refer: Assets; Liabilities; Insurance contracts [member]]

name: InsuranceContractsThatAreAssets
description: The amount of insurance contracts that are assets. [Refer: Assets; Insurance contracts [member]]

name: InsuranceContractsThatAreLiabilities
description: The amount of insurance contracts that are liabilities. [Refer: Liabilities; Insurance contracts [member]]

name: InsuranceExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from purchased insurance.

name: InsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
description: The amount of insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that is excluded from profit or loss and recognised in other comprehensive income that will be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

name: InsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that is recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

name: InsuranceRevenue
description: The amount of revenue arising from the groups of insurance contracts issued. Insurance revenue shall depict the provision of services arising from the group of insurance contracts at an amount that reflects the consideration to which the entity expects to be entitled in exchange for those services. [Refer: Insurance contracts issued [member]; Revenue]

name: InsuranceRevenueAllocationOfPortionOfPremiumsThatRelateToRecoveryOfInsuranceAcquisitionCashFlows
description: The amount of insurance revenue recognised in the period related to the allocation of the portion of the premiums that relate to the recovery of insurance acquisition cash flows. [Refer: Insurance revenue; Increase (decrease) through insurance acquisition cash flows, insurance contracts liability (asset)]

name: InsuranceServiceExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssued
description: The amount of expenses arising from a group of insurance contracts issued, comprising incurred claims (excluding repayments of investment components), other incurred insurance service expenses, amortisation of insurance acquisition cash flows, changes that relate to past service and changes that relate to future service. [Refer: Insurance contracts issued [member]]

name: IntangibleAssetFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
description: The amount of intangible assets for which fair value was used as their deemed cost in the opening IFRS statement of financial position. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The amount of intangible assets and goodwill held by the entity. [Refer: Goodwill; Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsMaterialToEntity
description: The amount of intangible assets that are material to the entitys financial statements. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The amount of identifiable non-monetary assets without physical substance. This amount does not include goodwill. [Refer: Goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillCarryingAmountAtCostOfRevaluedAssets
description: The amount of intangible assets other than goodwill that would have been recognised had the revalued intangible assets been measured using the cost model after recognition. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillCarryingAmountOfRevaluedAssets
description: The amount of intangible assets other than goodwill that are accounted for at revalued amounts. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsPledgedAsSecurityForLiabilities
description: The amount of intangible assets pledged as security for liabilities. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsUnderDevelopment
description: The amount of intangible assets representing such assets under development. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsWhoseTitleIsRestricted
description: The amount of intangible assets whose title is restricted. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleAssetsWithIndefiniteUsefulLife
description: The amount of intangible assets assessed as having an indefinite useful life. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: IntangibleExplorationAndEvaluationAssets
description: The amount of exploration and evaluation assets recognised as intangible assets in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. [Refer: Exploration and evaluation assets [member]]

name: InterestCostsCapitalised
description: The amount of interest costs that an entity incurs in connection with the borrowing of funds that are directly attributable to the acquisition, construction or production of a qualifying asset and which form part of the cost of that asset.

name: InterestCostsIncurred
description: The amount of interest costs that an entity incurs.

name: InterestExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from interest.

name: InterestExpenseForFinancialLiabilitiesNotAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of interest expense for financial liabilities that are not at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Interest expense; Financial liabilities]

name: InterestExpenseIncomeNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from the passage of time. [Refer: Interest expense; Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: InterestExpenseOnBankLoansAndOverdrafts
description: The amount of interest expense on bank loans and overdrafts. [Refer: Interest expense; Bank overdrafts]

name: InterestExpenseOnBonds
description: The amount of interest expense on bonds issued. [Refer: Interest expense; Bonds issued]

name: InterestExpenseOnBorrowings
description: The amount of interest expense on borrowings. [Refer: Interest expense; Borrowings]

name: InterestExpenseOnDebtInstrumentsIssued
description: The amount of interest expense on debt instruments issued. [Refer: Interest expense; Debt instruments issued]

name: InterestExpenseOnDepositsFromBanks
description: The amount of interest expense on deposits from banks. [Refer: Interest expense; Deposits from banks]

name: InterestExpenseOnDepositsFromCustomers
description: The amount of interest expense on deposits from customers. [Refer: Interest expense; Deposits from customers]

name: InterestExpenseOnFinanceLeases
description: #N/A

name: InterestExpenseOnFinancialLiabilitiesDesignatedAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of interest expense on financial liabilities designated at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Interest expense; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

name: InterestExpenseOnFinancialLiabilitiesHeldForTrading
description: The amount of interest expense on financial liabilities held for trading. [Refer: Interest expense; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading]

name: InterestExpenseOnLeaseLiabilities
description: The amount of interest expense on lease liabilities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

name: InterestExpenseOnLiabilitiesDueToCentralBanks
description: The amount of interest expense on liabilities due to central banks. [Refer: Interest expense; Liabilities due to central banks]

name: InterestExpenseOnOtherFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of interest expense on other financial liabilities. [Refer: Interest expense; Other financial liabilities]

name: InterestExpenseOnRepurchaseAgreementsAndCashCollateralOnSecuritiesLent
description: The amount of interest expense on repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities lent. [Refer: Interest expense; Repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities lent]

name: InterestIncomeExpenseRecognisedForAssetsReclassifiedIntoMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of revenue arising from interest recognised for assets reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category into amortised cost or fair value through other comprehensive income category. [Refer: Interest income (expense); Financial assets at amortised cost]

name: InterestIncomeExpenseRecognisedForFinancialLiabilitiesReclassifiedIntoMeasuredAtAmortisedCostFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
description: The amount of interest revenue (expense) recognised for financial liabilities that have been reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: InterestIncomeForFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of revenue arising from interest for financial assets that are measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Interest income; Financial assets at amortised cost]

name: InterestIncomeForFinancialAssetsNotAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of income arising from interest for financial assets that are not at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Interest income]

name: InterestIncomeOnAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
description: The amount of interest income on available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Interest income; Financial assets available-for-sale]

name: InterestIncomeOnCashAndBankBalancesAtCentralBanks
description: The amount of interest income on cash and bank balances at central banks. [Refer: Interest income; Cash and bank balances at central banks]

name: InterestIncomeOnCashAndCashEquivalents
description: The amount of interest income on cash and cash equivalents. [Refer: Interest income; Cash and cash equivalents]

name: InterestIncomeOnDebtInstrumentsHeld
description: The amount of interest income on debt instruments held. [Refer: Interest income; Debt instruments held]

name: InterestIncomeOnDeposits
description: The amount of interest income on deposits. [Refer: Interest income]

name: InterestIncomeOnFinancialAssetsDesignatedAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of interest income on financial assets designated at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Interest income; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

name: InterestIncomeOnFinancialAssetsHeldForTrading
description: The amount of interest income on financial assets held for trading. [Refer: Interest income; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading]

name: InterestIncomeOnHeldtomaturityInvestments
description: The amount of interest income on held-to-maturity investments. [Refer: Interest income; Held-to-maturity investments]

name: InterestIncomeOnImpairedFinancialAssetsAccrued
description: The amount of income arising from interest on impaired financial assets accrued after impairment using the rate of interest used to discount the future cash flows for the purpose of measuring the impairment loss. [Refer: Interest income]

name: InterestIncomeOnLoansAndAdvancesToBanks
description: The amount of interest income on loans and advances to banks. [Refer: Interest income; Loans and advances to banks]

name: InterestIncomeOnLoansAndAdvancesToCustomers
description: The amount of interest income on loans and advances to customers. [Refer: Interest income; Loans and advances to customers]

name: InterestIncomeOnLoansAndReceivables
description: The amount of interest income on loans and receivables. [Refer: Interest income; Loans and receivables]

name: InterestIncomeOnOtherFinancialAssets
description: The amount of interest income on other financial assets. [Refer: Interest income; Other financial assets]

name: InterestIncomeOnReverseRepurchaseAgreementsAndCashCollateralOnSecuritiesBorrowed
description: The amount of interest income on reverse repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities borrowed. [Refer: Interest income; Reverse repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities borrowed]

name: InterestIncomeReimbursementRights
description: The increase (decrease) in reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, resulting from income arising from interest on reimbursement rights. [Refer: Interest income; Reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, at fair value]

name: InterestPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow for interest paid, classified as financing activities.

name: InterestPaidClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow for interest paid, classified as investing activities.

name: InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
description: The cash outflow for interest paid, classified as operating activities.

name: InterestPayable
description: The amount of interest recognised as a liability.

name: InterestRateSignificantUnobservableInputsAssets
description: #N/A

name: InterestRateSignificantUnobservableInputsEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
description: #N/A

name: InterestReceivable
description: The amount of interest recognised as a receivable.

name: InterestReceivedClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from interest received, classified as investing activities.

name: InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
description: The cash inflow from interest received, classified as operating activities.

name: InterestRevenueCalculatedUsingEffectiveInterestMethod
description: The amount of interest revenue calculated using the effective interest method. Effective interest method is the method that is used in the calculation of the amortised cost of a financial asset or a financial liability and in the allocation and recognition of the interest revenue or interest expense in profit or loss over the relevant period. [Refer: Revenue]

name: InterestRevenueExpense
description: The amount of income or expense arising from interest. [Refer: Interest expense; Interest income]

name: InterestRevenueForFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of interest revenue arising on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Revenue; Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income]

name: IntrinsicValueOfLiabilitiesFromSharebasedPaymentTransactionsForWhichCounterpartysRightToCashOrOtherAssetsVested2011
description: The intrinsic value of liabilities arising from share-based transactions for which the counterparty's right to cash or other assets had vested by the end of the period (for example, vested share appreciation rights). The intrinsic value is the difference between the fair value of the shares to which the counterparty has the (conditional or unconditional) right to subscribe, or which it has the right to receive, and the price (if any) that the counterparty is (or will be) required to pay for those shares. Share-based payment transactions are transactions in which the entity: (a) receives goods or services from the supplier of those goods or services (including an employee) in a share-based payment arrangement; or (b) incurs an obligation to settle the transaction with the supplier in a share-based payment arrangement when another group entity receives those goods or services, for which the counterparty's right to cash or other assets had vested by the end of the period (for example, vested share appreciation rights).

name: Inventories
description: The amount of current inventories. [Refer: Inventories]

name: InventoriesAtFairValueLessCostsToSell
description: The amount of inventories carried at fair value less costs to sell. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: InventoriesAtNetRealisableValue
description: The amount of inventories carried at net realisable value. [Refer: Inventories]

name: InventoriesPledgedAsSecurityForLiabilities
description: The amount of inventories pledged as security for liabilities. [Refer: Inventories]

name: InventoriesTotal
description: The amount of assets: (a) held for sale in the ordinary course of business; (b) in the process of production for such sale; or (c) in the form of materials or supplies to be consumed in the production process or in the rendering of services. Inventories encompass goods purchased and held for resale including, for example, merchandise purchased by a retailer and held for resale, or land and other property held for resale. Inventories also encompass finished goods produced, or work in progress being produced, by the entity and include materials and supplies awaiting use in the production process. [Refer: Current finished goods; Current merchandise; Current work in progress; Land]

name: InventoryRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for inventory acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Inventories; Business combinations [member]]

name: InventoryWritedown2011
description: The amount of expense recognised related to the write-down of inventories to net realisable value. [Refer: Inventories]

name: InvestmentAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

name: InvestmentContractsLiabilities
description: The amount of liabilities relating to investment contracts that fall within the scope of IAS 39 or IFRS 9.

name: InvestmentFundsAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount investment funds contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]; Investment funds [member]]

name: InvestmentIncome
description: The amount of investment income, such as interest and dividends.

name: InvestmentProperty
description: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee as a right-of-use asset) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business.

name: InvestmentPropertyCompleted
description: The amount of investment property whose construction or development is complete. [Refer: Investment property]

name: InvestmentPropertyFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
description: The amount of investment property, for which fair value was used as deemed cost in the opening IFRS statement of financial position. [Refer: Investment property]

name: InvestmentPropertyUnderConstructionOrDevelopment
description: The amount of property that is being constructed or developed for future use as investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

name: InvestmentsForRiskOfPolicyholders
description: The amount of investments against insurance liabilities where all risk is borne by the policyholders.

name: InvestmentsInAssociates
description: The amount of investments in associates in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: InvestmentsInAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The amount of investments in associates accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method]

name: InvestmentsInJointVentures
description: The amount of investments in joint ventures in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: InvestmentsInJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The amount of investments in joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method]

name: InvestmentsInSubsidiaries
description: The amount of investments in subsidiaries in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: InvestmentsInSubsidiariesJointVenturesAndAssociates
description: The amount of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Associates [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries reported in separate financial statements]

name: InvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The amount of investments other than investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method]

name: IssueCostsNotRecognisedAsExpenseForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of issue costs not recognised as an expense for transactions recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: IssueOfConvertibleInstruments
description: The change in equity resulting from the issuing of convertible instruments.

name: IssueOfEquity
description: The increase in equity through the issue of equity instruments.

name: IssuedCapital
description: The nominal value of capital issued.

name: IssuedCapitalOrdinaryShares
description: The nominal value of capital arising from issuing ordinary shares. [Refer: Issued capital]

name: IssuesFairValueMeasurementAssets
description: The increase in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from issues of those assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: IssuesFairValueMeasurementEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
description: The increase in the fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments resulting from issues of those equity instruments. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Entity's own equity instruments [member]]

name: IssuesFairValueMeasurementLiabilities
description: The increase in fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from issues of those liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: ItemsInCourseOfCollectionFromOtherBanks
description: The amount of items that have been transmitted from other banks but not yet been received and processed by the entity.

name: ItemsInCourseOfTransmissionToOtherBanks
description: The amount of items that have been transmitted to but not yet received and processed by other banks.

name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensation
description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationOtherLongtermBenefits
description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of other long-term employee benefits. [Refer: Other long-term employee benefits; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationPostemploymentBenefits
description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of post-employment benefits. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationSharebasedPayment
description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of share-based payments. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationShorttermEmployeeBenefits
description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of short-term employee benefits. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationTerminationBenefits
description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of termination benefits. [Refer: Termination benefits expense; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

name: Land
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing land held by the entity for use in operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: LandAndBuildings
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing land and depreciable buildings and similar structures for use in operations. [Refer: Buildings; Land; Property, plant and equipment]

name: LeaseAndSubleasePaymentsRecognisedAsExpense
description: #N/A

name: LeaseCommitmentsForShorttermLeasesForWhichRecognitionExemptionHasBeenUsed
description: The amount of the lease commitments for short-term leases accounted for applying paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. Short-term lease is a lease that, at the commencement date, has a lease term of 12 months or less. A lease that contains a purchase option is not a short-term lease.

name: LeaseLiabilities
description: The amount of liabilities related to the entity's leases. Lease is a contract, or part of a contract, that conveys the right to use an underlying asset for a period of time in exchange for consideration.

name: LeasesAsLesseeRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of leases where the entity was the lessee in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: LeasesAsLessorRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of leases where the entity was the lessor in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: LegalProceedingsProvision
description: The amount of provision for legal proceedings. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: LevelOfParticipationOfEntityComparedWithOtherParticipatingEntities
description: The description of an indication of the level of participation of the entity in a defined benefit plan compared with other participating entities. Examples of measures that might provide such an indication include the entity's proportion of the total contributions to the plan or the entity's proportion of the total number of active members, retired members, and former members entitled to benefits, if that information is available. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: LevelOfPriceIndex
description: The value of the level of the general price index used to restate financial statement information of an entity whose functional currency is the currency of a hyperinflationary economy.

name: Liabilities
description: The amount of a present obligation of the entity to transfer an economic resource as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

name: LiabilitiesArisingFromExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResources
description: The amount of liabilities arising from the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource.

name: LiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivities
description: The amount of liabilities for which cash flows were, or future cash flows will be, classified in the statement of cash flows as cash flows from financing activities. [Refer: Cash flows from (used in) financing activities; Liabilities]

name: LiabilitiesArisingFromInsuranceContracts
description: The amount of liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: LiabilitiesDueToCentralBanks
description: The amount of liabilities due to central banks.

name: LiabilitiesForIncurredClaimsThatAriseFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS17
description: The amount of the liabilities for incurred claims that arise from contracts within the scope of IFRS 17. [Refer: Liabilities for incurred claims [member]]

name: LiabilitiesFromSharebasedPaymentTransactions2011
description: The amount of liabilities arising from share-based payment transactions. Share-based payment transactions are transactions in which the entity: (a) receives goods or services from the supplier of those goods or services (including an employee) in a share-based payment arrangement; or (b) incurs an obligation to settle the transaction with the supplier in a share-based payment arrangement when another group entity receives those goods or services. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

name: LiabilitiesInSubsidiaryOrBusinessesAcquiredOrDisposed2013
description: The amount of liabilities in subsidiaries or other businesses over which control is obtained or lost. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: LiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale
description: The amount of liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Liabilities; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: LiabilitiesIncurred
description: The fair value, at acquisition date, of liabilities incurred (for example, a liability for contingent consideration) as consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: LiabilitiesOrComponentsOfEquityRelatingToDiscretionaryParticipationFeatures
description: The amount of liabilities or components of equity relating to discretionary participation features. Discretionary participation features are contractual rights to receive, as a supplement to guaranteed benefits, additional benefits: (a) that are likely to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits; (b) whose amount or timing is contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and (c) that are contractually based on: (i) the performance of a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract; (ii) realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or (iii) the profit or loss of the company, fund or other entity that issues the contract.

name: LiabilitiesOtherThanActuarialPresentValueOfPromisedRetirementBenefits
description: The amount of liabilities other than the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits in retirement benefit plans. [Refer: Actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits]

name: LiabilitiesRecognisedInEntitysFinancialStatementsInRelationToStructuredEntities
description: The amount of liabilities recognised in the entity's financial statements relating to its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Liabilities; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

name: LiabilitiesToWhichSignificantRestrictionsApply
description: The amount in the consolidated financial statements of the liabilities of the group to which significant restrictions (for example, statutory, contractual and regulatory restrictions) apply on the entity's ability to settle the liabilities of the group.

name: LiabilityAssetOfDefinedBenefitPlans
description: The amount of deficit or surplus in a defined benefit plan, adjusted for any effect of limiting a net defined benefit asset to the asset ceiling. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: LicenceFeeIncome
description: The amount of income arising from licence fees.

name: LicencesAndFranchises
description: The amount of intangible assets representing the right to use certain intangible assets owned by another entity and the right to operate a business using the name, merchandise, services, methodologies, promotional support, marketing and supplies granted by another entity. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: LoansAndAdvancesToBanks
description: The amount of loans and advances the entity has made to banks.

name: LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers
description: The amount of loans and advances the entity has made to customers.

name: LoansAndReceivables
description: The amount of non-derivative financial assets with fixed or determinable payments that are not quoted in an active market, other than: (a) those that the entity intends to sell immediately or in the near term, which shall be classified as held for trading, and those that the entity, upon initial recognition, designates as at fair value through profit or loss; (b) those that the entity, upon initial recognition, designates as available for sale; or (c) those for which the holder may not recover substantially all of its initial investment, other than because of credit deterioration, which shall be classified as available for sale. An interest acquired in a pool of assets that are not loans or receivables (for example, an interest in a mutual fund or a similar fund) is not a loan or receivable. [Refer: Derivative financial assets]

name: LoansPayableInDefault
description: The amount of loans payable in default.

name: LoansReceived
description: The amount of loans received.

name: LoansToGovernment
description: The amount of loans to government made by the entity.

name: LongtermBorrowings
description: The non-current portion of non-current borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: LongtermDeposits
description: The amount of long-term deposits held by the entity.

name: LongtermLegalProceedingsProvision
description: The amount of non-current provision for legal proceedings. [Refer: Legal proceedings provision]

name: LongtermMiscellaneousOtherProvisions
description: The amount of miscellaneous non-current other provisions. [Refer: Miscellaneous other provisions]

name: LongtermOnerousContractsProvision
description: The amount of non-current provision for onerous contracts. [Refer: Onerous contracts provision]

name: LongtermProvisionForDecommissioningRestorationAndRehabilitationCosts
description: The amount of non-current provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs. [Refer: Provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs]

name: LongtermRestructuringProvision
description: The amount of non-current provision for restructuring. [Refer: Restructuring provision]

name: LongtermWarrantyProvision
description: The amount of non-current provision for warranties. [Refer: Warranty provision]

name: LossesArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
description: The loss recognised in the statement of comprehensive income arising from the derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

name: LossesOnChangeInFairValueOfDerivatives
description: The losses resulting from changes in the fair value of derivatives recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

name: LossesOnDisposalsOfInvestmentProperties
description: The losses on disposals of investment properties. [Refer: Investment property]

name: LossesOnDisposalsOfInvestments
description: The losses on the disposal of investments.

name: LossesOnDisposalsOfNoncurrentAssets
description: The losses on disposals of non-current assets. [Refer: Non-current assets]

name: LossesOnDisposalsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The losses on the disposal of property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: LossesOnLitigationSettlements
description: The losses on settlements of litigation.

name: Machinery
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing long-lived, depreciable machinery used in operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: MandatoryReserveDepositsAtCentralBanks
description: The amount of reserve that is kept in deposit at a central bank to fulfil regulatory reserve requirements.

name: MaximumExposureToCreditRisk
description: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk without taking into account any collateral held or other credit enhancements (for example, netting agreements that do not qualify for offset in accordance with IAS 32). [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskFinancialInstrumentsToWhichImpairmentRequirementsInIFRS9AreNotApplied
description: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk in relation to financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied. [Refer: Maximum exposure to credit risk]

name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
description: The maximum exposure to the credit risk of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskOfLoansOrReceivables
description: The maximum exposure to the credit risk of loans or receivables. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

name: MaximumExposureToLossFromContinuingInvolvement
description: The amount that best represents the entity's maximum exposure to loss from its continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets.

name: MaximumExposureToLossFromInterestsInStructuredEntities
description: The amount that best represents the entity's maximum exposure to loss from its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

name: MeasurementPeriodAdjustmentsRecognisedForParticularAssetsLiabilitiesNoncontrollingInterestsOrItemsOfConsideration
description: The amount of measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration if the initial accounting for a business combination is incomplete. The measurement period is the period after the acquisition date during which the acquirer may adjust the provisional amounts recognised for a business combination. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Business combinations [member]]

name: MediaProductionExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from media production.

name: Merchandise
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of goods acquired for resale. [Refer: Inventories]

name: MergerReserve
description: A component of equity that may result in relation to a business combination outside the scope of IFRS 3.

name: MinimumFinanceLeasePaymentsPayable
description: #N/A

name: MinimumFinanceLeasePaymentsPayableAtPresentValue
description: #N/A

name: MinimumFinanceLeasePaymentsReceivableAtPresentValue
description: #N/A

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsOfArrangementsThatIncludePaymentsForNonleaseElements
description: #N/A

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsOfOtherArrangementsThatDoNotIncludePaymentsForNonleaseElements
description: #N/A

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsPayableUnderNoncancellableOperatingLease
description: #N/A

name: MinimumLeasePaymentsReceivableUnderNoncancellableOperatingLease
description: #N/A

name: MinimumOperatingLeasePayments
description: #N/A

name: MiningAssets
description: The amount of assets related to mining activities of the entity.

name: MiscellaneousOtherOperatingExpense
description: The amount of miscellaneous other operating expenses. [Refer: Other operating income (expense)]

name: MiscellaneousOtherOperatingIncome
description: The amount of miscellaneous other operating income. [Refer: Other operating income (expense)]

name: MiscellaneousOtherProvisions
description: The amount of miscellaneous other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: MotorVehicles
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing self-propelled ground vehicles used in the entity's operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: NetAmountsForPayfloatingReceivefixedInterestRateSwapsForWhichNetCashFlowsAreExchanged
description: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to net amounts for pay-floating (receive-fixed) interest rate swaps for which net cash flows are exchanged. [Refer: Swap contract [member]]

name: NetAssetsLiabilities
description: The amount of assets less the amount of liabilities.

name: NetDebt
description: The amount of net debt of the entity.

name: NetDeferredTaxAssets
description: The amount of deferred tax assets net of deferred tax liabilities, when the absolute amount of deferred tax assets is greater than the absolute amount of deferred tax liabilities. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax liabilities]

name: NetDeferredTaxLiabilities
description: The amount of deferred tax liabilities net of deferred tax assets, when the absolute amount of deferred tax liabilities is greater than the absolute amount of deferred tax assets. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax liabilities]

name: NetEarnedPremium
description: The amount of premiums earned on insurance contracts net of reinsurance premiums. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: NetFinancialAssetsSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreements
description: The amount remaining after deducting the amounts subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement that were not set off against financial assets, from the net amount of financial assets subject to offsetting or subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement presented in the statement of financial position.

name: NetFinancialAssetsSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreementsInStatementOfFinancialPosition
description: The net amount of financial assets that are subject either to offsetting or to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement, presented in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: NetFinancialLiabilitiesSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreements
description: The amount remaining after deducting the amounts subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement that were not set off against financial liabilities, from the net amount of financial liabilities subject to offsetting or subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement presented in the statement of financial position.

name: NetFinancialLiabilitiesSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreementsInStatementOfFinancialPosition
description: The net amount of financial liabilities that are subject either to offsetting or to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement, presented in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: NetForeignExchangeGain
description: The net gain arising from exchange differences recognised in profit or loss, excluding those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Foreign exchange gain (loss)]

name: NetForeignExchangeLoss
description: The net loss arising from exchange differences recognised in profit or loss, excluding those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Foreign exchange gain (loss)]

name: NetInvestmentInFinanceLease
description: The gross investment in the finance lease discounted at the interest rate implicit in the lease. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset. Gross investment in the finance lease is the sum of: (a) the lease payments receivable by a lessor under a finance lease; and (b) any unguaranteed residual value accruing to the lessor. Interest rate implicit in the lease is the rate of interest that causes the present value of (a) the lease payments and (b) the unguaranteed residual value to equal to the sum of (i) the fair value of the underlying asset and (ii) the initial direct costs of the lessor.

name: NetMovementInDeferredTaxArisingFromRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of the net movement in deferred tax arising from regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss. [Refer: Deferred tax asset associated with regulatory deferral account balances; Deferred tax liability associated with regulatory deferral account balances; Profit (loss)]

name: NetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToProfitOrLossAndNetMovementInRelatedDeferredTax
description: The amount of the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and the net movement in related deferred tax. [Refer: Net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss; Net movement in deferred tax arising from regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss]

name: NetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToProfitOrLossDirectlyAssociatedWithDiscontinuedOperation
description: The amount of the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss that are directly associated with a discontinued operation. [Refer: Net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss; Discontinued operations [member]]

name: NewLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
description: The amount recognised for new contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination]

name: NewProvisionsOtherProvisions
description: The amount recognised for new other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: NominalAmountOfHedgingInstrument
description: The nominal amount of a hedging instrument. [Refer: Hedging instruments [member]]

name: NominalAmountOfHedgingInstrumentsInHedgingRelationshipsToWhichAmendmentsForInterestRateBenchmarkReformAreApplied
description: The nominal amount of the hedging instruments in hedging relationships to which the entity is applying the exceptions in the scope of the amendments for interest rate benchmark reform. [Refer: Nominal amount of hedging instrument]

name: NominalOrPrincipalAmountOfFinancialInstrumentOnDiscontinuationOfMeasurementAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossBecauseCreditDerivativeIsUsedToManageCreditRisk
description: The nominal or principal amount of a financial instrument on discontinuation of its measurement at fair value through profit or loss, because a credit derivative is used to manage the credit risk of that financial instrument. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Derivatives [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: NoncashAssetsDeclaredForDistributionToOwnersBeforeFinancialStatementsAuthorisedForIssue
description: The amount of non-cash assets declared for distribution as a dividend when the declaration date is after the end of the reporting period but before the financial statements are authorised for issue.

name: NoncashAssetsPledgedAsCollateralForWhichTransfereeHasRightByContractOrCustomToSellOrRepledgeCollateral
description: The amount of non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

name: NoncontrollingInterestInAcquireeRecognisedAtAcquisitionDate
description: The amount of non-controlling interest in the acquiree recognised at the acquisition date for business combinations in which the acquirer holds less than 100 per cent of the equity interests in the acquiree at the acquisition date. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: NoncontrollingInterests
description: The amount of equity in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to a parent. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: NoncurrentAccruedIncome
description: #N/A

name: NoncurrentAdvances
description: The amount of non-current advances received representing non-current contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at a point in time. [Refer: Advances received, representing contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at point in time]

name: NoncurrentAssets
description: The amount of assets that do not meet the definition of current assets. [Refer: Current assets]

name: NoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForDistributionToOwners
description: The amount of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Non-current assets]

name: NoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale
description: The amount of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

name: NoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners
description: The amount of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale]

name: NoncurrentAssetsOtherThanFinancialInstrumentsDeferredTaxAssetsPostemploymentBenefitAssetsAndRightsArisingUnderInsuranceContracts
description: The amount of non-current assets other than financial instruments, deferred tax assets, post-employment benefit assets and rights arising under insurance contracts.
