[Refer: Deferred tax assets; Financial instruments, class [member]; Non-current assets; Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: NoncurrentAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description:
Expiry date 2022-01-01: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for non-current assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]
Effective 2022-01-01: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for non-current assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Non-current assets; Business combinations [member]]

name: NoncurrentBiologicalAssets
description: The amount of non-current biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: NoncurrentContractAssets
description: The amount of non-current contract assets. [Refer: Contract assets]

name: NoncurrentContractLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current contract liabilities. [Refer: Contract liabilities]

name: NoncurrentDebtInstrumentsIssued
description: The amount of non-current debt instruments issued. [Refer: Debt instruments issued]

name: NoncurrentDeferredIncomeIncludingNoncurrentContractLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current deferred income including non-current contract liabilities. [Refer: Deferred income including contract liabilities]

name: NoncurrentDepositsFromCustomers
description: The amount of non-current deposits from customers. [Refer: Deposits from customers]

name: NoncurrentDerivativeFinancialAssets
description: The amount of non-current derivative financial assets. [Refer: Derivative financial assets]

name: NoncurrentDerivativeFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current derivative financial liabilities. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities]

name: NoncurrentDividendPayables
description: The amount of non-current dividend payables. [Refer: Dividend payables]

name: NoncurrentFinanceLeaseLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: NoncurrentFinanceLeaseReceivables
description: The amount of non-current finance lease receivables. [Refer: Finance lease receivables]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssets
description: The amount of non-current financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of non-current financial assets measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of non-current financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of non-current financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
description: The amount of non-current financial assets that are measured at fair value through profit or loss and that are classified as held for trading. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMandatorilyMeasuredAtFairValue
description: The amount of non-current financial assets mandatorily measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, mandatorily measured at fair value]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasuredAsSuchInAccordanceWithExemptionForReacquisitionOfOwnEquityInstruments
description: The amount of non-current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss measured as such in accordance with the exemption for reacquisition of own equity instruments. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, measured as such in accordance with exemption for reacquisition of own equity instruments]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasuredAsSuchInAccordanceWithExemptionForRepurchaseOfOwnFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss measured as such in accordance with the exemption for repurchase of own financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, measured as such in accordance with exemption for repurchase of own financial liabilities]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsAvailableforsale
description: The amount of non-current financial assets available-for-sale. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Non-current financial assets]

name: NoncurrentFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of non-current financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income]

name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. [Refer: Non-current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognition
description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

name: NoncurrentGovernmentGrants
description: The amount of non-current government grants recognised on the statement of financial position as deferred income. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

name: NoncurrentHeldtomaturityInvestments
description: The amount of non-current held-to-maturity investments. [Refer: Held-to-maturity investments]

name: NoncurrentInterestPayable
description: The amount of non-current interest payable. [Refer: Interest payable]

name: NoncurrentInterestReceivable
description: The amount of non-current interest receivable. [Refer: Interest receivable]

name: NoncurrentInventories
description: The amount of non-current inventories. [Refer: Inventories]

name: NoncurrentInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of non-current investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income]

name: NoncurrentInvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The amount of non-current investments other than investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Non-current assets; Investments other than investments accounted for using equity method]

name: NoncurrentLeaseLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current lease liabilities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

name: NoncurrentLeasePrepayments
description: The amount of non-current prepayments for leases. [Refer: Non-current prepayments]

name: NoncurrentLiabilities
description: The amount of liabilities that do not meet the definition of current liabilities. [Refer: Current liabilities]

name: NoncurrentLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description:
Expiry date 2022-01-01: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for non-current liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]
Effective 2022-01-01: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for non-current liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Non-current liabilities; Business combinations [member]]

name: NoncurrentLoansAndReceivables
description: The amount of non-current loans and receivables. [Refer: Loans and receivables]

name: NoncurrentNoncashAssetsPledgedAsCollateralForWhichTransfereeHasRightByContractOrCustomToSellOrRepledgeCollateral
description: The amount of non-current non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

name: NoncurrentOreStockpiles
description: A classification of non-current inventory representing the amount of ore stockpiles. [Refer: Inventories]

name: NoncurrentPayables
description: The amount of non-current trade payables and non-current other payables. [Refer: Other non-current payables; Non-current trade payables]

name: NoncurrentPayablesForPurchaseOfEnergy
description: The amount of non-current payables for the purchase of energy. [Refer: Payables for purchase of energy]

name: NoncurrentPayablesForPurchaseOfNoncurrentAssets
description: The amount of non-current payables for the purchase of non-current assets. [Refer: Payables for purchase of non-current assets]

name: NoncurrentPayablesOnSocialSecurityAndTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
description: The amount of non-current payables on social security and taxes other than incomes tax. [Refer: Payables on social security and taxes other than income tax]

name: NoncurrentPayablesToRelatedParties
description: The amount of non-current payables due to related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]; Payables to related parties]

name: NoncurrentPayablesToTradeSuppliers
description: The non-current amount of payment due to suppliers for goods and services used in the entity's business. [Refer: Trade payables]

name: NoncurrentPortionOfNoncurrentBondsIssued
description: The non-current portion of non-current bonds issued. [Refer: Bonds issued]

name: NoncurrentPortionOfNoncurrentLoansReceived
description: The non-current portion of non-current loans received. [Refer: Loans received]

name: NoncurrentPortionOfNoncurrentNotesAndDebenturesIssued
description: The non-current portion of non-current notes and debentures issued. [Refer: Notes and debentures issued]

name: NoncurrentPortionOfNoncurrentSecuredBankLoansReceived
description: The non-current portion of non-current secured bank loans received. [Refer: Secured bank loans received]

name: NoncurrentPortionOfNoncurrentUnsecuredBankLoansReceived
description: The non-current portion of non-current unsecured bank loans received. [Refer: Unsecured bank loans received]

name: NoncurrentPortionOfOtherNoncurrentBorrowings
description: The non-current portion of non-current other borrowings. [Refer: Other borrowings]

name: NoncurrentPrepayments
description: The amount of non-current prepayments. [Refer: Prepayments]

name: NoncurrentPrepaymentsAndNoncurrentAccruedIncome
description: #N/A

name: NoncurrentProvisions
description: The amount of non-current provisions, including provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

name: NoncurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits
description: The amount of non-current provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions for employee benefits]

name: NoncurrentReceivables
description: The amount of non-current trade receivables and non-current other receivables. [Refer: Non-current trade receivables; Other non-current receivables]

name: NoncurrentReceivablesDueFromAssociates
description: The amount of non-current receivables due from associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: NoncurrentReceivablesDueFromJointVentures
description: The amount of non-current receivables due from joint ventures. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: NoncurrentReceivablesDueFromRelatedParties
description: The amount of non-current receivables due from related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: NoncurrentReceivablesFromContractsWithCustomers
description: The amount of non-current receivables from contracts with customers. [Refer: Receivables from contracts with customers]

name: NoncurrentReceivablesFromRentalOfProperties
description: The amount of non-current receivables from rental of properties. [Refer: Receivables from rental of properties]

name: NoncurrentReceivablesFromSaleOfProperties
description: The amount of non-current receivables from sale of properties. [Refer: Receivables from sale of properties]

name: NoncurrentReceivablesFromTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
description: The amount of non-current receivables from taxes other than income tax. [Refer: Receivables from taxes other than income tax]

name: NoncurrentRecognisedAssetsDefinedBenefitPlan
description: The amount of non-current net defined benefit asset. [Refer: Net defined benefit asset]

name: NoncurrentRecognisedLiabilitiesDefinedBenefitPlan
description: The amount of non-current net defined benefit liability. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability]

name: NoncurrentRefundsProvision
description: The amount of non-current provision for refunds. [Refer: Refunds provision]

name: NoncurrentRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents
description: The amount of non-current restricted cash and cash equivalents. [Refer: Restricted cash and cash equivalents]

name: NoncurrentRetentionPayables
description: The amount of non-current retention payables. [Refer: Retention payables]

name: NoncurrentTradeReceivables
description: The amount of non-current trade receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables]

name: NoncurrentValueAddedTaxPayables
description: The amount of non-current value added tax payables. [Refer: Value added tax payables]

name: NoncurrentValueAddedTaxReceivables
description: The amount of non-current value added tax receivables. [Refer: Value added tax receivables]

name: NonderivativeFinancialLiabilitiesUndiscountedCashFlows
description: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to non-derivative financial liabilities.

name: NotesAndDebenturesIssued
description: The amount of notes and debentures issued by the entity.

name: NotionalAmount
description: The nominal or face amount of a financial instrument, used to calculate payments made on that instrument.

name: NumberOfEmployees
description: The number of personnel employed by the entity at a date.

name: NumberOfInstrumentsGrantedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of instruments granted in share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfInstrumentsOrInterestsIssuedOrIssuable
description: The number of instruments or interests issued or issuable at acquisition date for equity interests of the acquirer transferred as consideration in a business combination.

name: NumberOfInstrumentsOtherEquityInstrumentsGranted
description: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) granted in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsExercisableInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) exercisable in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsExercisedOrVestedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) exercised or vested in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsExpiredInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) expired in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsForfeitedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) forfeited in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsOutstandingInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) outstanding in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfOtherParticipantsOfRetirementBenefitPlan
description: The number of other participants in a retirement benefit plan.

name: NumberOfOutstandingShareOptions
description: The number of share options outstanding in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfParticipantsOfRetirementBenefitPlanReceivingBenefits
description: The number of participants in a retirement benefit plan receiving benefits.

name: NumberOfShareOptionsExercisableInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of share options exercisable in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfShareOptionsExercisedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of share options exercised in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfShareOptionsExpiredInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of share options expired in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfShareOptionsForfeitedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of share options forfeited in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfShareOptionsGrantedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
description: The number of share options granted in a share-based payment arrangement.

name: NumberOfSharesAuthorised
description: The number of shares authorised.

name: NumberOfSharesIssued
description: The number of shares issued by the entity.

name: NumberOfSharesIssuedAndFullyPaid
description: The number of shares issued by the entity, for which full payment has been received.

name: NumberOfSharesIssuedButNotFullyPaid
description: The number of shares issued by the entity, for which full payment has not been received.

name: NumberOfSharesOutstanding
description: The number of shares that have been authorised and issued, reduced by treasury shares held. [Refer: Treasury shares]

name: OccupancyExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from occupancy services received by the entity.

name: OfficeEquipment
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing equipment used to support office functions, not specifically used in the production process. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: OilAndGasAssets
description: The amount of assets related to the exploration, evaluation, development or production of oil and gas.

name: OnerousContractsProvision
description: The amount of provision for onerous contracts. An onerous contract is a contract in which the unavoidable costs of meeting the obligation under the contract exceed the economic benefits expected to be received under it. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: OperatingExpense
description: The amount of all operating expenses.

name: OperatingExpenseExcludingCostOfSales
description: The amount of operating expense excluding the cost of sales. [Refer: Cost of sales]

name: OperatingLeaseIncome
description: The amount of operating lease income. Operating lease is a lease that does not transfer substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

name: OriginalAssetsBeforeTransfer
description: The amount of the original assets before transfer for transferred assets that the entity continues to recognise to the extent of its continuing involvement.

name: OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems
description: Adjustments for non-cash items to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: OtherAdjustmentsForWhichCashEffectsAreInvestingOrFinancingCashFlow
description: Adjustments to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities for which cash effects are investing or financing cash flow, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss
description: Adjustments to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Adjustments to reconcile profit (loss)]

name: OtherAssets
description: The amount of assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherAssetsAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount other types of assets not separately disclosed contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: OtherBorrowings
description: The amount of borrowings that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: OtherCashAndCashEquivalents
description: The amount of cash and cash equivalents that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

name: OtherCashPaymentsFromOperatingActivities
description: The cash outflow for operating activities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherCashPaymentsToAcquireEquityOrDebtInstrumentsOfOtherEntitiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow to acquire equity or debt instruments of other entities (other than payments for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents or those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities.

name: OtherCashPaymentsToAcquireInterestsInJointVenturesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow to acquire interests in joint ventures (other than payments for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents or those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: OtherCashReceiptsFromOperatingActivities
description: The cash inflow from operating activities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherCashReceiptsFromSalesOfEquityOrDebtInstrumentsOfOtherEntitiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from sales of equity or debt instruments of other entities (other than receipts for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents and those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities.

name: OtherCashReceiptsFromSalesOfInterestsInJointVenturesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from sales of interests in joint ventures (other than receipts for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents and those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: OtherComponentsOfDeferredTaxExpenseIncome
description: The amount of components of deferred tax expense or income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Deferred tax expense (income)]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that is not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
description: The amount of other comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent
description: The amount of other comprehensive income attributable to owners of the parent.

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTax
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxCashFlowHedges
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangeInCreditRiskOfLiability
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to change in the fair value of financial liability attributable to change in the credit risk of the liability. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax; Credit risk [member]]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreads
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContracts
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptions
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of time value of options. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to exchange differences on translation of financial statements of foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 4.1.2A of IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnHedgingInstrumentsThatHedgeInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans, which comprise actuarial gains and losses; the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset); and any change in the effect of the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Defined benefit plans [member]; Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)] [Contrast: Decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from gain (loss) on remeasurement in other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRevaluation
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) in relation to changes in the revaluation surplus of property, plant and equipment, right-of-use assets and intangible assets. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax; Revaluation surplus]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToItemsThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances that is related to items that will be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToItemsThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances that is related to items that will not be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxApplicationOfOverlayApproach
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to the application of the overlay approach. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxCashFlowHedges
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangeInCreditRiskOfLiability
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to changes in the fair value of financial liabilities attributable to the changes in the credit risk of those liabilities. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreads
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreadsThatHedgeTimeperiodRelatedHedgedItems
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge time-period related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContracts
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContractsThatHedgeTransactionRelatedHedgedItems
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge transaction related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptions
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of time value of options. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptionsThatHedgeTimeperiodRelatedHedgedItems
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of time value of options that hedge time-period related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to exchange differences when financial statements of foreign operations are translated. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 4.1.2A of IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnHedgingInstrumentsThatHedgeInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans, which comprise actuarial gains and losses; the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset); and any change in the effect of the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Defined benefit plans [member]; Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)] [Contrast: Decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from gain (loss) on remeasurement in other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnRevaluation
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) in relation to changes in the revaluation surplus of property, plant and equipment, right-of-use assets and intangible assets. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Revaluation surplus]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will not be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
description: The amount of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
description: The amount of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
description: The amount of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
description: The amount of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherCurrentAssets
description: The amount of current assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Current assets]

name: OtherCurrentBorrowingsAndCurrentPortionOfOtherNoncurrentBorrowings
description: The amount of current other borrowings and the current portion of non-current other borrowings. [Refer: Other borrowings]

name: OtherCurrentFinancialAssets
description: The amount of current financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial assets; Current financial assets]

name: OtherCurrentFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities; Current financial liabilities]

name: OtherCurrentLiabilities
description: The amount of current liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Current liabilities]

name: OtherCurrentNonfinancialAssets
description: The amount of current non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: OtherCurrentNonfinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of current non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

name: OtherCurrentPayables
description: The amount of current payables that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherCurrentReceivables
description: The amount of current other receivables. [Refer: Other receivables]

name: OtherDebtInstrumentsHeld
description: The amount of debt instruments held by the entity that it does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Debt instruments held]

name: OtherDecreasesAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
description: The decrease in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: OtherDifferencesToCashAndCashEquivalentsInStatementOfCashFlows
description: The amount of differences between cash and cash equivalents in the statement of cash flows and the statement of financial position that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

name: OtherEmployeeExpense
description: The amount of employee expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherEquityInterest
description: The amount of equity interest of an entity without share capital that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherExpenseByFunction
description: The amount of expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note when the entity uses the 'function of expense' form for its analysis of expenses.

name: OtherExpenseByNature
description: The amount of expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note when the entity uses the 'nature of expense' form for its analysis of expenses. [Refer: Expenses, by nature]

name: OtherFeeAndCommissionExpense
description: The amount of fee and commission expense that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Fee and commission expense]

name: OtherFeeAndCommissionIncome
description: The amount of fee and commission income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Fee and commission income]

name: OtherFinanceCost
description: The amount of finance costs that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Finance costs]

name: OtherFinanceIncome
description: The amount of finance income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Finance income]

name: OtherFinanceIncomeCost
description: The amount of finance income or cost that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Finance income (cost)]

name: OtherFinancialAssets
description: The amount of financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: OtherFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

name: OtherGainsLosses
description: The gains (losses) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherIncome
description: The amount of operating income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherIncomeExpenseFromSubsidiariesJointlyControlledEntitiesAndAssociates
description: The amount of income or expense from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

name: OtherIncreasesAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
description: The increase in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: OtherIndividuallyImmaterialComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTax
description: The amount of individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income, before tax, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

name: OtherIndividuallyImmaterialComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax
description: The amount of individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income, net of tax, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: Inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as financing activities, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: Inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as investing activities, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
description: Inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as operating activities, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherIntangibleAssets
description: The amount of intangible assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: OtherInventories
description: The amount of inventory that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Inventories]

name: OtherLiabilities
description: The amount of liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherLiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
description: The amount of liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued]

name: OtherLongtermBenefits
description: The amount of long-term employee benefits other than post-employment benefits and termination benefits. Such benefits may include long-term paid absences, jubilee or other long-service benefits, long-term disability benefits, long-term profit-sharing and bonuses and long-term deferred remuneration. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

name: OtherLongtermProvisions
description: The amount of non-current provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Non-current provisions]

name: OtherMaterialActuarialAssumptions
description: Any other material assumption used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value]

name: OtherMaterialNoncashItems
description: The amount of material non-cash items other than depreciation and amortisation.

name: OtherNoncurrentAssets
description: The amount of non-current assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Non-current assets]

name: OtherNoncurrentFinancialAssets
description: The amount of non-current financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial assets]

name: OtherNoncurrentFinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

name: OtherNoncurrentLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Non-current liabilities]

name: OtherNoncurrentNonfinancialAssets
description: The amount of non-current non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: OtherNoncurrentNonfinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of non-current non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

name: OtherNoncurrentPayables
description: The amount of non-current payables that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherNoncurrentReceivables
description: The amount of non-current other receivables. [Refer: Other receivables]

name: OtherNonfinancialAssets
description: The amount of non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: OtherNonfinancialLiabilities
description: The amount of non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

name: OtherOperatingIncomeExpense
description: The amount of operating income (expense) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherPayables
description: Amounts payable that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: OtherProvisions
description: The amount of provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

name: OtherReceivables
description: The amount receivable by the entity that it does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OtherRegulatoryDeferralAccountCreditBalances
description: The amount of regulatory deferral account credit balances that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account credit balances]

name: OtherReserves
description: A component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings]

name: OtherRevenue
description: The amount of revenue arising from sources that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Revenue]

name: OtherReversalsOfProvisions
description: The amount of reversals of provisions that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Provisions]

name: OtherShorttermEmployeeBenefits
description: The amount of expense from employee benefits (other than termination benefits), which are expected to be settled wholly within twelve months after the end of the annual reporting period in which the employees render the related services, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

name: OtherShorttermProvisions
description: The amount of current provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

name: OtherTangibleOrIntangibleAssetsTransferred
description: The fair value, at acquisition date, of other tangible or intangible assets (including a business or subsidiary of the acquirer) transferred as consideration in a business combination, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same note. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Business combinations [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

name: OtherTaxEffectsForReconciliationBetweenAccountingProfitAndTaxExpenseIncome
description: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Accounting profit; Applicable tax rate]

name: OtherTaxRateEffectsForReconciliationBetweenAccountingProfitAndTaxExpenseIncome
description: Tax rate effects, in aggregate, on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate that the entity does not separately disclose in the reconciliation. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

name: OtherTradingIncomeExpense
description: The amount of trading income (expense) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Trading income (expense)]

name: OtherWorkPerformedByEntityAndCapitalised
description: The amount of the entity's own work capitalised from items originally classified as costs that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: OutflowsOfCashFromInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow for investing activities.

name: OutputOfAgriculturalProduce
description: The output of entity's agricultural produce.

name: OutstandingCommitmentsMadeByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of outstanding commitments made by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: OutstandingCommitmentsMadeOnBehalfOfEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of outstanding commitments made on behalf of the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: OwneroccupiedPropertyMeasuredUsingInvestmentPropertyFairValueModel
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing owner-occupied property measured using the investment property fair value model applying paragraph 29A of IAS 16. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: ParValuePerShare
description: The nominal value per share.

name: ParticipationInDefinedBenefitPlanThatSharesRisksBetweenGroupEntitiesRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of participation by the entity in a defined benefit plan that shares risks between group entities. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Related parties [member]]

name: PastServiceCostAndGainsLossesArisingFromSettlementsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: s

name: PastServiceCostNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from past service cost. Past service cost is the change in the present value of the defined benefit obligation for employee service in prior periods, resulting from a plan amendment (the introduction or withdrawal of, or changes to, a defined benefit plan) or a curtailment (a significant reduction by the entity in the number of employees covered by a plan). [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: PayablesForPurchaseOfEnergy
description: The amount of payables for the purchase of energy.

name: PayablesForPurchaseOfNoncurrentAssets
description: The amount of payables for the purchase of non-current assets. [Refer: Non-current assets]

name: PayablesOnSocialSecurityAndTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
description: The amount of payment due on social security and taxes other than income tax. Income taxes include all domestic and foreign taxes that are based on taxable profits. Income taxes also include taxes, such as withholding taxes, that are payable by a subsidiary, associate or joint arrangement on distributions to the reporting entity.

name: PaymentsForDebtIssueCosts
description: The cash outflow for debt issue costs.

name: PaymentsForDevelopmentProjectExpenditure
description: The cash outflow for expenditure related to development projects.

name: PaymentsForExplorationAndEvaluationExpenses
description: The cash outflow for expenses incurred by an entity in connection with the exploration for, and evaluation of, mineral resources before the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting a mineral resource are demonstrable.

name: PaymentsForPremiumsAndClaimsAnnuitiesAndOtherPolicyBenefits
description: The cash outflow for premiums and claims, annuities and other policy benefits.

name: PaymentsForShareIssueCosts
description: The cash outflow for share issue costs.

name: PaymentsFromChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiaries
description: The cash outflow for changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in a loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: PaymentsFromContractsHeldForDealingOrTradingPurpose
description: The cash outflow for contracts held for dealing or trading purposes.

name: PaymentsFromPlanNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from payments from the plan. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

name: PaymentsInRespectOfSettlementsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from payments from the plan in respect of settlements. [Refer: Decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from gains (losses) arising from settlements; Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: PaymentsInRespectOfSettlementsReimbursementRights
description: The decrease (increase) in reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, resulting from payments in respect of settlements. [Refer: Decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from gains (losses) arising from settlements; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: PaymentsOfFinanceLeaseLiabilitiesClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: #N/A

name: PaymentsOfLeaseLiabilitiesClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow for payment of lease liabilities, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

name: PaymentsOfOtherEquityInstruments
description: The cash outflow for payments for equity instruments that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: PaymentsToAcquireOrRedeemEntitysShares
description: The cash outflow to acquire or redeem entity's shares.

name: PaymentsToAndOnBehalfOfEmployees
description: The cash outflow to, and on behalf of, employees.

name: PaymentsToManufactureOrAcquireAssetsHeldForRentalToOthersAndSubsequentlyHeldForSale
description: The cash outflow to manufacture or acquire assets held for rental to others and subsequently held for sale.

name: PaymentsToSuppliersForGoodsAndServices
description: The cash outflow to suppliers for goods and services.

name: PaymentsToSuppliersForGoodsAndServicesAndToAndOnBehalfOfEmployees
description: The cash outflow for payments to suppliers for goods and services and to, and on behalf of, employees.

name: PercentageOfEntitysRevenue
description: The percentage of the entity's revenue. [Refer: Revenue]

name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleDecreaseInActuarialAssumption
description: The reasonably possible percentage of the decrease in the actuarial assumption used to determine the present value of defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]]

name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleDecreaseInUnobservableInputAssets
description: The percentage of a reasonably possible decrease in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of assets.

name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleDecreaseInUnobservableInputLiabilities
description: The percentage of a reasonably possible decrease in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of liabilities.

name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleIncreaseInActuarialAssumption
description: The reasonably possible percentage of the increase in the actuarial assumption used to determine the present value of defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]]

name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleIncreaseInUnobservableInputAssets
description: The percentage of a reasonably possible increase in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of assets.

name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleIncreaseInUnobservableInputLiabilities
description: The percentage of a reasonably possible increase in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of liabilities.

name: PercentageOfVotingEquityInterestsAcquired
description: The percentage of voting equity interests acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

name: PlanAssetsAtFairValue
description: The fair value of defined benefit plan assets. Plan assets comprise assets held by a long-term employee benefit fund and qualifying insurance policies. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: PortfolioAndOtherManagementFeeIncome
description: The amount of income recognised from portfolio and other management fees.

name: PortionOfConsiderationPaidReceivedConsistingOfCashAndCashEquivalents
description: The portion of consideration paid or received, consisting of cash and cash equivalents, in respect of both obtaining and losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Cash and cash equivalents; Consideration paid (received)]

name: PortionOfGainsLossesRecognisedWhenControlOfSubsidiaryIsLostAttributableToDerecognisingRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesInFormerSubsidiary
description: The portion of gains (losses) from losing control of a subsidiary that is attributable to derecognising regulatory deferral account balances in the former subsidiary. [Refer: Gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost; Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

name: PortionOfGainsLossesRecognisedWhenControlOfSubsidiaryIsLostAttributableToRecognisingInvestmentRetainedInFormerSubsidiary
description: The portion of gains (losses) from losing control of a subsidiary attributable to recognising any investment retained in the former subsidiary at its fair value at the date when control is lost. [Refer: Gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost; Subsidiaries [member]]

name: PostemploymentBenefitExpenseDefinedBenefitPlans
description: The amount of post-employment benefit expense included in profit or loss relating to defined benefit plans. [Refer: Profit (loss); Defined benefit plans [member]] [Contrast: Increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from expense (income) in profit or loss]

name: PostemploymentBenefitExpenseDefinedContributionPlans
description: The amount of post-employment benefit expense relating to defined contribution plans. Defined contribution plans are post-employment benefit plans under which an entity pays fixed contributions into a separate entity (a fund) and will have no legal or constructive obligation to pay further contributions if the fund does not hold sufficient assets to pay all employee benefits relating to employee service in the current and prior periods.

name: PremiumsWrittenNetOfReinsurance
description: The amount of premiums written, net of amounts reinsured with third parties.

name: Prepayments
description: Receivables that represent amounts paid for goods and services before they have been delivered.

name: PrepaymentsAndAccruedIncome
description: #N/A

name: PriceIndexMovements
description: The movements in the general price index used to restate financial statement information of an entity whose functional currency is the currency of a hyperinflationary economy.

name: PricesSpecifiedInForwardAgreementsToPurchaseFinancialAssetsForCash
description: Prices specified in forward agreements to purchase financial assets for cash.

name: ProbabilityOfDefaultSignificantUnobservableInputsAssets
description: #N/A

name: ProceedsFromBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: The cash inflow from borrowings obtained. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: ProceedsFromChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiaries
description: The cash inflow from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in a loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: ProceedsFromContributionsOfNoncontrollingInterests
description: The cash inflow from proceeds from contributions of non-controlling interests. [Refer: Non-controlling interests]

name: ProceedsFromCurrentBorrowings
description: The cash inflow from current borrowings obtained. [Refer: Current borrowings]

name: ProceedsFromDisposalOfExplorationAndEvaluationAssets
description: The cash inflow from the disposal of exploration and evaluation assets. [Refer: Exploration and evaluation assets [member]]

name: ProceedsFromDisposalOfMiningAssets
description: The cash inflow from the disposal of mining assets. [Refer: Mining assets]

name: ProceedsFromDisposalOfNoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleAndDiscontinuedOperations
description: The cash inflow from the disposal of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale and discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale]

name: ProceedsFromDisposalOfOilAndGasAssets
description: The cash inflow from disposal of oil and gas assets. [Refer: Oil and gas assets]

name: ProceedsFromDisposalOrMaturityOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
description: The cash inflow from the disposal or maturity of available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

name: ProceedsFromDisposalsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillInvestmentPropertyAndOtherNoncurrentAssets
description: The cash inflow from the disposal of property, plant and equipment, intangible assets other than goodwill, investment property and other non-current assets. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Investment property; Other non-current assets; Property, plant and equipment]

name: ProceedsFromExerciseOfOptions
description: The cash inflow from the exercise of options.

name: ProceedsFromExerciseOfWarrants
description: The cash inflow from the exercise of share purchase warrants.

name: ProceedsFromGovernmentGrantsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: The cash inflow from government grants, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

name: ProceedsFromGovernmentGrantsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from government grants, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

name: ProceedsFromIssueOfBondsNotesAndDebentures
description: The cash inflow from the issuing of bonds, notes and debentures.

name: ProceedsFromIssueOfOrdinaryShares
description: The cash inflow from the issuing of ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

name: ProceedsFromIssueOfPreferenceShares
description: The cash inflow from the issuing of preference shares. [Refer: Preference shares [member]]

name: ProceedsFromIssueOfSubordinatedLiabilities
description: The cash inflow from the issuing of subordinated liabilities. [Refer: Subordinated liabilities]

name: ProceedsFromIssuingOtherEquityInstruments
description: The cash inflow from issuing equity instruments that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

name: ProceedsFromIssuingShares
description: The cash inflow from issuing shares.

name: ProceedsFromNoncurrentBorrowings
description: The cash inflow from non-current borrowings obtained. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: ProceedsFromOtherLongtermAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from sales of long-term assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Assets]

name: ProceedsFromSaleOrIssueOfTreasuryShares
description: The cash inflow from the sale or issuing of treasury shares. [Refer: Sale or issue of treasury shares; Treasury shares]

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfBiologicalAssets
description: The cash inflow from sales of biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from sales of intangible assets, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfInterestsInAssociates
description: The cash inflow from sales of interests in associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentProperty
description: The cash inflow from sales of investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The cash inflow from sales of investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method]

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The cash inflow from sales of investments other than investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Investments other than investments accounted for using equity method]

name: ProceedsFromSalesOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from sales of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: ProceedsFromSalesOrMaturityOfFinancialInstrumentsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash inflow from sales or maturity of financial instruments, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: ProductionSupplies
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of supplies to be used for the production process. [Refer: Inventories]

name: ProfessionalFeesExpense
description: The amount of fees paid or payable for professional services.

name: ProfitLoss
description: The total of income less expenses from continuing and discontinued operations, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
description: The profit (loss) from continuing and discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss); Non-controlling interests]

name: ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity
description: The profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects
description: The profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity, adjusted for the effects of all dilutive potential ordinary shares. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent
description: The profit (loss) from continuing and discontinued operations attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossBeforeTax
description: The profit (loss) before tax expense or income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossBeforeTaxDiscontinuedOperations
description: #N/A

name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperations
description: The profit (loss) from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
description: The profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss) from continuing operations; Non-controlling interests]

name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity
description: The profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects
description: The profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity, adjusted for the effects of all dilutive potential ordinary shares. [Refer: Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperations
description: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
description: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations; Non-controlling interests]

name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity
description: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity. [Refer: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects
description: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity, adjusted for the effects of all dilutive potential ordinary shares. [Refer: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

name: ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities
description: The profit (loss) from operating activities of the entity. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossOfAcquiree
description: The profit (loss) of the acquiree, since the acquisition date, included in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossOfCombinedEntity
description: The profit (loss) of the combined entity as though the acquisition date for all business combinations that occurred during the year had been as of the beginning of the annual reporting period. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitLossRecognisedOnExchangingConstructionServicesForIntangibleAsset2011
description: The profit (loss) recognised on exchanging construction services for an intangible asset in service concession arrangements. [Refer: Service concession arrangements [member]; Profit (loss)]

name: ProfitsLossesOnDisposalOfInvestmentsAndChangesInValueOfInvestments
description: The profit (loss) on disposal of investments and changes in the value of investments. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

name: ProgressBillings
description: #N/A

name: PropertyAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount real estate contributes to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: PropertyDevelopmentAndProjectManagementExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from property development and project management.

name: PropertyDevelopmentAndProjectManagementIncome
description: The amount of income arising from property development and project management.

name: PropertyIntendedForSaleInOrdinaryCourseOfBusiness
description: The amount of property intended for sale in the ordinary course of business of the entity. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

name: PropertyManagementExpense
description: The amount of expense relating to property management. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount of tangible assets that: (a) are held for use in the production or supply of goods or services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes; and (b) are expected to be used during more than one period.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountAtCostOfRevaluedAssets
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment that would have been recognised had the revalued assets been carried under the cost model. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountOfAssetsRetiredFromActiveUse
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment retired from active use and not classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountOfRevaluedAssets
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment stated at revalued amounts. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentExpendituresRecognisedForConstructions
description: The amount of expenditures recognised in the carrying amount of an item of property, plant and equipment in the course of its construction. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment, for which fair value was used as their deemed cost in the opening IFRS statement of financial position. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossCarryingAmountFullyDepreciated
description: The gross carrying amount of fully depreciated property, plant and equipment that is still in use. [Refer: Gross carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentPledgedAsSecurity
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment pledged as security for liabilities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for plant, property and equipment acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Business combinations [member]]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRestrictionsOnTitle
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment subject to restrictions on title. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRevaluationSurplus
description: The amount of revaluation surplus that relates to property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Revaluation surplus]

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentTemporarilyIdle
description: The amount of temporarily idle property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: PropertyServiceChargeExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from charges related to servicing of property.

name: PropertyServiceChargeIncome
description: The amount of income arising from charges related to servicing of property.

name: PropertyServiceChargeIncomeExpense
description: The amount of income or expense arising from property service charge. [Refer: Property service charge expense; Property service charge income]

name: PropertyTaxExpense
description: The amount of tax expense levied on property. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestInAssociate
description: The proportion of ownership interest in an associate attributable to the entity. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestInJointOperation
description: The proportion of ownership interest in a joint operation attributable to the entity. [Refer: Joint operations [member]]

name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestInJointVenture
description: The proportion of ownership interest in a joint venture attributable to the entity. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestInSubsidiary
description: The proportion of ownership interest in a subsidiary attributable to the entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestsHeldByNoncontrollingInterests
description: The proportion of ownership interests in a subsidiary held by non-controlling interests. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Non-controlling interests]

name: ProportionOfVotingPowerHeldInAssociate
description: The proportion of the voting rights in an associate held by the entity. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: ProportionOfVotingPowerHeldInSubsidiary
description: The proportion of the voting rights in a subsidiary held by the entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

name: ProportionOfVotingRightsHeldByNoncontrollingInterests
description: The proportion of the voting rights in a subsidiary held by non-controlling interests. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Non-controlling interests]

name: ProportionOfVotingRightsHeldInJointVenture
description: The proportion of the voting rights in a joint venture held by the entity. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: ProvisionForDecommissioningRestorationAndRehabilitationCosts
