description: The amount of provision for costs related to decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: ProvisionOfGuaranteesOrCollateralByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of guarantees or collateral provided by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Guarantees [member]; Related parties [member]]

name: ProvisionOfGuaranteesOrCollateralToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of guarantees or collateral provided to the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Guarantees [member]; Related parties [member]]

name: ProvisionUsedOtherProvisions
description: The amount used (ie incurred and charged against the provision) for other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: Provisions
description: The amount of liabilities of uncertain timing or amount, including provisions for employee benefits.

name: ProvisionsForDoubtfulDebtsRelatedToOutstandingBalancesOfRelatedPartyTransaction
description: The amount of provisions for doubtful debts related to the amount of outstanding balances in related party transactions. [Refer: Provisions]

name: ProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits
description: The amount of provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Employee benefits expense; Provisions]

name: ProvisionsForFutureNonparticipatingBenefits
description: The amount of provisions for future non-participating benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

name: PurchaseOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

name: PurchaseOfBiologicalAssets
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

name: PurchaseOfExplorationAndEvaluationAssets
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of exploration and evaluation assets. [Refer: Exploration and evaluation assets [member]]

name: PurchaseOfFinancialInstrumentsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of financial instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: PurchaseOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow for the purchases of intangible assets, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: PurchaseOfInterestsInAssociates
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of interests in associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: PurchaseOfInterestsInInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of interests in investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method]

name: PurchaseOfInvestmentProperty
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

name: PurchaseOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of investments other than investments accounted for using equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Investments other than investments accounted for using equity method]

name: PurchaseOfMiningAssets
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of mining assets. [Refer: Mining assets]

name: PurchaseOfOilAndGasAssets
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of oil and gas assets. [Refer: Oil and gas assets]

name: PurchaseOfOtherLongtermAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow for the purchases of long-term assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Assets]

name: PurchaseOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
description: The cash outflow for the purchases of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: PurchaseOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillInvestmentPropertyAndOtherNoncurrentAssets
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of property, plant and equipment, intangible assets other than goodwill, investment property and other non-current assets. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Investment property; Other non-current assets; Property, plant and equipment]

name: PurchaseOfTreasuryShares
description: The decrease in equity resulting from the purchase of treasury shares. [Refer: Treasury shares]

name: PurchasesFairValueMeasurementAssets
description: The increase in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from purchases of those assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: PurchasesFairValueMeasurementEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
description: The increase in the fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments resulting from purchases of those equity instruments. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Entity's own equity instruments [member]]

name: PurchasesFairValueMeasurementLiabilities
description: The increase in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from purchases of those liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: PurchasesOfGoodsRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of goods purchased by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: PurchasesOfPropertyAndOtherAssetsRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of property and other assets purchased by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: RatedCreditExposures
description: The amount of credit exposure that has been rated by external rating agencies. [Refer: Credit exposure]

name: RawMaterials
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of assets to be consumed in the production process or in the rendering of services. [Refer: Inventories]

name: RawMaterialsAndConsumablesUsed
description: The amount of raw materials and consumables used in the production process or in the rendering of services. [Refer: Current raw materials]

name: ReceiptsFromPremiumsAndClaimsAnnuitiesAndOtherPolicyBenefits
description: The cash inflow from premiums and claims, annuities and other policy benefits.

name: ReceiptsFromRentsAndSubsequentSalesOfSuchAssets
description: The cash inflow from rents and subsequent sales relating to assets initially held for rental to others and subsequently held for sale.

name: ReceiptsFromRoyaltiesFeesCommissionsAndOtherRevenue
description: The cash inflow from royalties, fees, commissions and other revenue. [Refer: Other revenue]

name: ReceiptsFromSalesOfGoodsAndRenderingOfServices
description: The cash inflow from sales of goods and rendering of services.

name: ReceivablesAndPayablesRelatedToInsuranceContracts
description: The amount of receivables and payables related to insurance contracts (amounts currently due to and from agents, brokers and policyholders related to insurance contracts).

name: ReceivablesDueFromAssociates
description: The amount of receivables due from associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: ReceivablesDueFromJointVentures
description: The amount of receivables due from joint ventures. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: ReceivablesFromContractsWithCustomers
description: The amount of an entitys right to consideration in exchange for goods or services that the entity has transferred to a customer that is unconditional. A right to consideration is unconditional if only the passage of time is required before payment of that consideration is due.

name: ReceivablesFromRentalOfProperties
description: The amount of receivables arising from the rental of properties. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

name: ReceivablesFromSaleOfProperties
description: The amount of receivables arising from the sale of properties. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

name: ReceivablesFromTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
description: The amount of receivables from taxes other than income tax. Income taxes include all domestic and foreign taxes that are based on taxable profits. Income taxes also include taxes, such as withholding taxes, that are payable by a subsidiary, associate or joint arrangement on distributions to the reporting entity.

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnAvailableforsaleFinancialAssetsBeforeTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to available-for-sale financial assets, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnAvailableforsaleFinancialAssetsNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to available-for-sale financial assets, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnCashFlowHedgesBeforeTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to cash flow hedges, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnCashFlowHedgesForWhichHedgedFutureCashFlowsAreNoLongerExpectedToOccurNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which the hedged future cash flows are no longer expected to occur, net of tax. [Refer: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges, net of tax]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnCashFlowHedgesForWhichHedgedItemAffectedProfitOrLossNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which the hedged item affected profit or loss, net of tax. [Refer: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges, net of tax]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnCashFlowHedgesNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to cash flow hedges, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreadsBeforeTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreadsNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContractsBeforeTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContractsNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptionsBeforeTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to change in value of time value of options, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationBeforeTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to exchange differences when the financial statements of foreign operations are translated, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to exchange differences when the financial statements of foreign operations are translated, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnFinancialAssetsThatHaveBeenDedesignatedFromOverlayApproachNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to financial assets that have been de-designated from the overlay approach during the reporting period, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperationsBeforeTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperationsNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesNetOfTax
description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: ReclassificationIntoAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified into the available-for-sale category. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

name: ReclassificationIntoFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified into the at fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: ReclassificationIntoHeldtomaturityInvestments
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified into the held-to-maturity investments category. [Refer: Held-to-maturity investments; Financial assets]

name: ReclassificationIntoLoansAndReceivables
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified into the loans and receivables category. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Financial assets]

name: ReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsOutOfMeasuredAtAmortisedCostIntoMeasuredAtFairValue
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the amortised cost measurement category and into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets]

name: ReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsOutOfMeasuredAtAmortisedCostIntoMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the amortised cost measurement category and into the fair value through other comprehensive income measurement category. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: ReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsOutOfMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeIntoMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the fair value through other comprehensive income measurement category and into the amortised cost measurement category. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: ReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsOutOfMeasuredAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossIntoMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss measurement category and into the fair value through other comprehensive income measurement category. [Refer: Financial assets]

name: ReclassificationOutOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the available-for-sale category. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

name: ReclassificationOutOfFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the at fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

name: RecognisedAssetsDefinedBenefitPlan
description: The amount of surplus in a defined benefit plan, adjusted for any effect of limiting a net defined benefit asset to the asset ceiling. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: RecognisedAssetsRepresentingContinuingInvolvementInDerecognisedFinancialAssets
description: The amount of assets recognised in the statement of financial position representing the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets.

name: RecognisedFinanceLeaseAsAssets
description: #N/A

name: RecognisedLiabilitiesDefinedBenefitPlan
description: The amount of deficit in a defined benefit plan. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: RecognisedLiabilitiesRepresentingContinuingInvolvementInDerecognisedFinancialAssets
description: The amount of liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position representing the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets.

name: RecoverableAmountOfAssetOrCashgeneratingUnit
description: The higher of an assets (or cash-generating units) fair value less costs of disposal and its value in use. [Refer: Cash-generating units [member]]

name: RedesignatedFinancialAssetAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of financial assets redesignated to be measured at fair value through profit or loss on transition to IFRSs. [Refer: At fair value [member]; IFRSs [member]; Financial assets]

name: ReductionOfIssuedCapital
description: The decrease in equity resulting from a reduction in issued capital. [Refer: Issued capital]

name: RefundsProvision
description: The amount of provision for refunds to be made by the entity to its customers. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: RegulatoryDeferralAccountCreditBalances
description: The amount of regulatory deferral account credit balances. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]]

name: RegulatoryDeferralAccountCreditBalancesAndRelatedDeferredTaxLiability
description: The amount of regulatory deferral account credit balances and the related deferred tax liability. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account credit balances; Deferred tax liability associated with regulatory deferral account balances]

name: RegulatoryDeferralAccountDebitBalances
description: The amount of regulatory deferral account debit balances. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]]

name: ReimbursementRightsAtFairValue
description: The amount of the entity's rights to the reimbursement by another party of some or all of the expenditure required to settle a defined benefit obligation recognised as a separate asset and measured at fair value. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: ReinsuranceAssets
description: The amount of a cedants net contractual rights under a reinsurance contract.

name: ReinsuranceContractsHeldThatAreAssets
description: The amount of reinsurance contracts held that are assets. [Refer: Assets; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

name: ReinsuranceContractsHeldThatAreLiabilities
description: The amount of reinsurance contracts held that are liabilities. [Refer: Liabilities; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

name: RemainingAmortisationPeriodOfIntangibleAssetsMaterialToEntity
description: #N/A

name: RemainingUnamortisedGainsAndLossesArisingOnBuyingReinsurance
description: The amount of unamortised deferred gains (losses) arising from the purchase of reinsurance.

name: RentDeferredIncome
description: The amount of deferred income arising on rental activity. [Refer: Deferred income other than contract liabilities]

name: RentDeferredIncomeClassifiedAsCurrent
description: The amount of rent deferred income classified as current. [Refer: Rent deferred income]

name: RentDeferredIncomeClassifiedAsNoncurrent
description: The amount of rent deferred income classified as non-current. [Refer: Rent deferred income]

name: RentalExpense
description: The amount of expense recognised on rental activities.

name: RentalIncome
description: The amount of income recognised from rental activities.

name: RentalIncomeFromInvestmentProperty
description: The amount of rental income arising from investment property recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Investment property]

name: RentalIncomeFromInvestmentPropertyNetOfDirectOperatingExpense
description: The amount of rental income arising from investment property, net of direct operating expense from such property. [Refer: Direct operating expense from investment property; Rental income from investment property]

name: RepairsAndMaintenanceExpense
description: The amount of expenses incurred for the day-to-day servicing of assets, which may include the cost of labour, consumables or small parts.

name: RepaymentsOfBondsNotesAndDebentures
description: The cash outflow for repayments of bonds, notes and debentures.

name: RepaymentsOfBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
description: The cash outflow to settle borrowings, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: RepaymentsOfCurrentBorrowings
description: The cash outflow for repayments of current borrowings. [Refer: Current borrowings]

name: RepaymentsOfNoncurrentBorrowings
description: The cash outflow for repayments of non-current borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: RepaymentsOfSubordinatedLiabilities
description: The cash outflow for repayments of subordinated liabilities. [Refer: Subordinated liabilities]

name: RepurchaseAgreementsAndCashCollateralOnSecuritiesLent
description: The amount of instruments sold with the intent to reacquire in repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities lent.

name: ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense
description: The amount of expenditure directly attributable to research or development activities, recognised in profit or loss.

name: ReserveForEqualisation
description: A component of equity representing resources to cover random fluctuations of claim expenses around the expected value of claims for some types of insurance contract.

name: ReserveOfCashFlowHedges
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated portion of gain (loss) on a hedging instrument that is determined to be an effective hedge for cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

name: ReserveOfCashFlowHedgesContinuingHedges
description: A component of equity representing the reserve of cash flow hedges in relation to continuing hedges. [Refer: Reserve of cash flow hedges]

name: ReserveOfCashFlowHedgesHedgingRelationshipsForWhichHedgeAccountingIsNoLongerApplied
description: A component of equity representing the reserve of cash flow hedges in relation to hedging relationships for which hedge accounting is no longer applied. [Refer: Reserve of cash flow hedges]

name: ReserveOfChangeInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangeInCreditRiskOfLiability
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in fair value of financial liabilities attributable to change in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

name: ReserveOfChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreads
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of foreign currency basis spreads of financial instruments when excluding them from the designation of these financial instruments as hedging instruments.

name: ReserveOfChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContracts
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the forward elements of forward contracts when separating the forward element and spot element of a forward contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the spot element.

name: ReserveOfChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptions
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the time value of options when separating the intrinsic value and time value of an option contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the intrinsic value.

name: ReserveOfDiscretionaryParticipationFeatures
description: A component of equity resulting from discretionary participation features. Discretionary participation features are contractual rights to receive, as a supplement to guaranteed benefits, additional benefits: (a) that are likely to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits; (b) whose amount or timing is contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and (c) that are contractually based on: (i) the performance of a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract; (ii) realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or (iii) the profit or loss of the company, fund or other entity that issues the contract.

name: ReserveOfEquityComponentOfConvertibleInstruments
description: A component of equity representing components of convertible instruments classified as equity.

name: ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
description: A component of equity representing exchange differences on translation of financial statements recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationContinuingHedges
description: A component of equity representing the reserve of exchange differences on translation in relation to continuing hedges. [Refer: Reserve of exchange differences on translation]

name: ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationHedgingRelationshipsForWhichHedgeAccountingIsNoLongerApplied
description: A component of equity representing the reserve of exchange differences on translation in relation to hedging relationships for which hedge accounting is no longer applied. [Refer: Reserve of exchange differences on translation]

name: ReserveOfGainsAndLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
description: A component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses from investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

name: ReserveOfGainsAndLossesOnFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: A component of equity representing the reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

name: ReserveOfGainsAndLossesOnHedgingInstrumentsThatHedgeInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

name: ReserveOfGainsAndLossesOnRemeasuringAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
description: A component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

name: ReserveOfOverlayApproach
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated overlay approach adjustments.

name: ReserveOfRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated remeasurements of defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: ReserveOfSharebasedPayments
description: A component of equity resulting from share-based payments.

name: RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents
description: The amount of cash and cash equivalents whose use or withdrawal is restricted. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

name: RestructuringProvision
description: The amount of provision for restructuring, such as the sale or termination of a line of business; closure of business locations in a country or region or relocation of activities from one country or region to another; changes in management structure; and fundamental reorganisations that have a material effect on the nature and focus of the entity's operations. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: RetainedEarnings
description: A component of equity representing the entity's cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit.

name: RetentionForContractsInProgress
description: #N/A

name: RetentionPayables
description: The amount of payment that is withheld by the entity, pending the fulfilment of a condition.

name: RetirementsIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets and goodwill resulting from retirements. [Refer: Intangible assets and goodwill]

name: RetirementsIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The decrease in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from retirements. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: RetirementsPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment resulting from retirements. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: ReturnOnPlanAssetsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAsset
description: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in interest income or expense. The return on plan assets is interest, dividends and other revenue derived from the plan assets, together with realised and unrealised gains or losses on the plan assets, less any costs of managing plan assets and less any tax payable by the plan itself, other than tax included in the actuarial assumptions used to measure the present value of the defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset); Actuarial assumptions [member]; Increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from interest expense (income)]

name: ReturnOnReimbursementRights
description: The increase (decrease) in reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, resulting from the return on those rights, excluding amounts included in interest income or expense. [Refer: Reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, at fair value; Increase in reimbursement rights related to defined benefit obligation, resulting from interest income]

name: RevaluationIncreaseDecreaseIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The increase (decrease) in intangible assets other than goodwill resulting from revaluations to fair value. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Revaluation surplus]

name: RevaluationIncreaseDecreasePropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment resulting from revaluations to fair value. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Revaluation surplus]

name: RevaluationSurplus
description: A component of equity representing the accumulated revaluation surplus on the revaluation of assets recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

name: Revenue
description: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities. Income is increases in assets, or decreases in liabilities, that result in increases in equity, other than those relating to contributions from holders of equity claims.

name: RevenueAndOperatingIncome
description: The aggregate amount of the entity's revenue and other operating income. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueArisingFromExchangesOfGoodsOrServices
description: #N/A

name: RevenueArisingFromExchangesOfGoodsOrServicesConstructionContracts
description: #N/A

name: RevenueDiscontinuedOperations
description: #N/A

name: RevenueFromConstructionContracts
description: The amount of revenue arising from construction contracts. Construction contracts are contracts specifically negotiated for the construction of an asset or a combination of assets that are closely interrelated or interdependent in terms of their design, technology and function or their ultimate purpose or use. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromContractsWithCustomers
description: The amount of revenue from contracts with customers. A customer is a party that has contracted with an entity to obtain goods or services that are an output of the entitys ordinary activities in exchange for consideration.

name: RevenueFromDividends
description: The amount of dividends recognised as income. Dividends are distributions of profits to holders of equity investments in proportion to their holdings of a particular class of capital.

name: RevenueFromGovernmentGrants
description: The amount of income recognised in relation to government grants. [Refer: Government grants]

name: RevenueFromHotelOperations
description: The amount of revenue arising from hotel operations. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromInsuranceContractsIssuedWithoutReductionForReinsuranceHeld
description: The amount of revenue from insurance contracts issued, without any reduction for reinsurance held. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromInterest
description: The amount of income arising from interest.

name: RevenueFromPerformanceObligationsSatisfiedOrPartiallySatisfiedInPreviousPeriods
description: The amount of revenue from performance obligations satisfied (or partially satisfied) in previous periods. [Refer: Performance obligations [member]; Revenue from contracts with customers]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfAdvertisingServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of advertising services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfCargoAndMailTransportServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of cargo and mail transport services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfDataServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of data services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfInformationTechnologyConsultingServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of consulting services relating to information technology. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfInformationTechnologyMaintenanceAndSupportServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of maintenance and support services relating to information technology. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfInformationTechnologyServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of information technology services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfInterconnectionServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of interconnection services for other operators. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfInternetAndDataServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of internet and data services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfInternetServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of internet services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfLandLineTelephoneServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of land line telephone services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfMobileTelephoneServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of mobile telephone services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfOtherTelecommunicationServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of telecommunication services that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfPassengerTransportServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of passenger transport services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfServicesRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of services in related party transactions. [Refer: Revenue; Related parties [member]]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfTelecommunicationServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of telecommunication services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfTelephoneServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of telephone services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRenderingOfTransportServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of transport services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRoomOccupancyServices
description: The amount of revenue arising from room occupancy services. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromRoyalties
description: The amount of income arising from royalties.

name: RevenueFromSaleOfAgriculturalProduce
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of agricultural produce. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfCopper
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of copper. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfCrudeOil
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of crude oil. [Refer: Current crude oil; Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfElectricity
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of electricity. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfGold
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of gold. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfGoods
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of goods. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfGoodsRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of goods in related party transactions. [Refer: Revenue; Related parties [member]]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfNaturalGas
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of natural gas. [Refer: Current natural gas; Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfOilAndGasProducts
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of oil and gas products. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfPetroleumAndPetrochemicalProducts
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of petroleum and petrochemical products. [Refer: Current petroleum and petrochemical products; Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfSilver
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of silver. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfSugar
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of sugar. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueFromSaleOfTelecommunicationEquipment
description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of telecommunication equipment. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueOfAcquiree
description: The amount of revenue of the acquiree since the acquisition date included in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income. [Refer: Revenue]

name: RevenueOfCombinedEntity
description: The revenue of the combined entity as though the acquisition date for all business combinations that occurred during the year had been as of the beginning of the annual reporting period. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Revenue]

name: RevenueRecognisedOnExchangingConstructionServicesForIntangibleAsset
description: The amount of revenue recognised when construction services are exchanged for an intangible asset in service concession arrangements. [Refer: Service concession arrangements [member]; Revenue from contracts with customers]

name: RevenueThatWasIncludedInContractLiabilityBalanceAtBeginningOfPeriod
description: The amount of revenue that was included in the contract liability balance at the beginning of the period. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Revenue from contracts with customers]

name: ReversalAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
description: The decrease in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the reversal of impairment. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLoss
description: The amount recognised as an increase of the carrying amount of an asset or cash-generating unit to its recoverable amount when an impairment loss had been previously recognised. [Refer: Impairment loss]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncome
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss; Impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income for intangible assets other than goodwill. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income; Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomePropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income for property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income; Property, plant and equipment]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss; Profit (loss)]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossBiologicalAssets
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for biological assets. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Biological assets]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for intangible assets other than goodwill. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossInvestmentProperty
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for investment property. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Investment property]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossLoansAndAdvances
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for loans and advances. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Property, plant and equipment]

name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossTradeReceivables
description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for trade receivables. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Trade receivables]

name: ReversalOfInventoryWritedown
description: The amount recognised as a reduction in the amount of inventories recognised as an expense due to the reversal of any write-down of inventories resulting from an increase in net realisable value. [Refer: Inventories; Inventory write-down]

name: ReversalOfProvisionsForCostOfRestructuring
description: The amount of reversals of provisions for the cost of restructuring. [Refer: Restructuring provision]

name: ReverseRepurchaseAgreementsAndCashCollateralOnSecuritiesBorrowed
description: The amount of instruments purchased for resale in reverse repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities borrowed. [Refer: Repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities lent]

name: ReversedUnsettledLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination that were unsettled and subsequently reversed. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Business combinations [member]]

name: RightofuseAssetFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
description: The amount of right-of-use assets for which fair value was used as their deemed cost in the opening IFRS statement of financial position. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

name: RightofuseAssets
description: The amount of assets that represent a lessee's right to use an underlying asset for the lease term. Underlying asset is an asset that is the subject of a lease, for which the right to use that asset has been provided by a lessor to a lessee.

name: RightofuseAssetsIncreaseDecreaseInRevaluationSurplus
description: The increase (decrease) in the revaluation surplus that relates to right-of-use assets. [Refer: Revaluation surplus; Right-of-use assets]

name: RightofuseAssetsRevaluationSurplus
description: The amount of the revaluation surplus that relates to right-of-use assets. [Refer: Revaluation surplus; Right-of-use assets]

name: RightofuseAssetsRevaluedAssetsAtCost
description: The amount of right-of-use assets that would have been recognised had the revalued assets been carried under the cost model. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

name: RightofuseAssetsThatDoNotMeetDefinitionOfInvestmentProperty
description: The amount of right-of-use assets that do not meet the definition of investment property. [Refer: Right-of-use assets; Investment property]

name: RiskExposureAssociatedWithInstrumentsSharingCharacteristic
description: The amount of risk exposure associated with financial instruments with a shared characteristic that identifies a concentration of risks. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

name: RoyaltyExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from royalties.

name: SaleOrIssueOfTreasuryShares
description: The increase in equity resulting from the sale or issue of treasury shares. [Refer: Treasury shares]

name: SalesAndMarketingExpense
description: The amount of expense relating to the marketing and selling of goods or services.

name: SalesFairValueMeasurementAssets
description: The decrease in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from sales. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: SalesFairValueMeasurementLiabilities
description: The decrease in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from sales. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: SalesOfPropertyAndOtherAssetsRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of property and other assets sold by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: SecuredBankLoansReceived
description: The amount of loans received from banks that have been secured by collateral. [Refer: Loans received]

name: SellingExpense
description: The amount of expense relating to selling activities of the entity.

name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
description: The amount of expense relating to selling, general and administrative activities of the entity.

name: SellingProfitLossOnFinanceLeases
description: The selling profit (loss) on finance leases. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

name: ServicesExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from services.

name: ServicesReceivedRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of services received in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: SettledLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination that were settled. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination]

name: SettlementOfLiabilitiesByEntityOnBehalfOfRelatedPartyRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of liabilities settled by the entity on behalf of a related party in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: SettlementOfLiabilitiesOnBehalfOfEntityByRelatedPartyRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of liabilities settled on behalf of the entity by a related party in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: SettlementsFairValueMeasurementAssets
description: The decrease in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from settlements. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: SettlementsFairValueMeasurementEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
description: The decrease in the fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments resulting from settlements. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Entity's own equity instruments [member]]

name: SettlementsFairValueMeasurementLiabilities
description: The decrease in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from settlements. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

name: ShareIssueRelatedCost
description: The amount of cost related to the issuance of shares.

name: ShareOfContingentLiabilitiesIncurredJointlyWithOtherVenturers
description: The entity's share of contingent liabilities incurred jointly with other investors with joint control of the joint ventures. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

name: ShareOfContingentLiabilitiesOfAssociatesIncurredJointlyWithOtherInvestors
description: The entity's share of contingent liabilities incurred jointly with other investors with significant influence over associates. [Refer: Associates [member]; Contingent liabilities [member]]

name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, net of tax. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodBeforeTax
description: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, before tax. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax.

name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax.

name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax.

name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax.

name: ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Profit (loss)]

name: ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

name: ShareOfProfitLossOfContinuingOperationsOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The entity's share of the profit (loss) from continuing operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Continuing operations [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

name: ShareOfProfitLossOfDiscontinuedOperationsOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The entity's share of the post-tax profit (loss) from discontinued operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Discontinued operations [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

name: ShareOfProfitLossOfJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

name: ShareOfTotalComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
description: The entity's share of the total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method]

name: SharePremium
description: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value.

name: SharesInEntityHeldByEntityOrByItsSubsidiariesOrAssociates
description: The number of shares in the entity held by the entity or by its subsidiaries or associates. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

name: SharesReservedForIssueUnderOptionsAndContractsForSaleOfShares
description: The number of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for the sale of shares.

name: Ships
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing seafaring or other maritime vessels used in the entity's operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: ShorttermBorrowings
description: The amount of current borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

name: ShorttermDepositsClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
description: A classification of cash equivalents representing short-term deposits. [Refer: Cash equivalents]

name: ShorttermDepositsNotClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
description: The amount of short-term deposits held by the entity that are not classified as cash equivalents. [Refer: Cash equivalents]

name: ShorttermEmployeeBenefitsAccruals
description: The amount of accruals for employee benefits (other than termination benefits) that are expected to be settled wholly within twelve months after the end of the annual reporting period in which the employees render the related services. [Refer: Accruals classified as current]

name: ShorttermEmployeeBenefitsExpense
description: The amount of expense from employee benefits (other than termination benefits) that are expected to be settled wholly within twelve months after the end of the annual reporting period in which the employees render the related services.

name: ShorttermInvestmentsClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
description: A classification of cash equivalents representing short-term investments. [Refer: Cash equivalents]

name: ShorttermLegalProceedingsProvision
description: The amount of current provision for legal proceedings. [Refer: Legal proceedings provision]

name: ShorttermMiscellaneousOtherProvisions
description: The amount of miscellaneous current other provisions. [Refer: Miscellaneous other provisions]

name: ShorttermOnerousContractsProvision
description: The amount of current provision for onerous contracts. [Refer: Onerous contracts provision]

name: ShorttermProvisionForDecommissioningRestorationAndRehabilitationCosts
description: The amount of current provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs. [Refer: Provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs]

name: ShorttermRestructuringProvision
description: The amount of current provision for restructuring. [Refer: Restructuring provision]

name: ShorttermWarrantyProvision
description: The amount of current provision for warranties. [Refer: Warranty provision]

name: SignificantUnobservableInputAssets
description: The value of significant unobservable input used in the measurement of the fair value of assets.

name: SignificantUnobservableInputLiabilities
description: The value of significant unobservable input used in the measurement of the fair value of liabilities.

name: SocialSecurityContributions
description: A class of employee benefits expense that represents social security contributions. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

name: SpareParts
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of interchangeable parts that are kept in an inventory and are used for the repair or replacement of failed parts. [Refer: Inventories]

name: StatutoryReserve
description: A component of equity representing reserves created based on legal requirements.

name: StructuredDebtAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
description: The amount debt that has been structured to meet a particular investment objective contributes to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

name: SubleasePaymentsRecognisedAsExpense
description: #N/A

name: SubordinatedLiabilities
description: The amount of liabilities that are subordinate to other liabilities with respect to claims.

name: SubscriptionCirculationRevenue
description: The amount of circulation revenue derived from subscriptions. [Refer: Revenue; Circulation revenue]

name: SubsequentRecognitionOfDeferredTaxAssetsGoodwill
description: The decrease in goodwill resulting from the subsequent recognition of deferred tax assets during the measurement period for a business combination. [Refer: Goodwill; Deferred tax assets; Business combinations [member]]

name: SupportProvidedToStructuredEntityWithoutHavingContractualObligationToDoSo
description: The amount of financial or other support (for example, purchasing assets of, or instruments issued by, the structured entity) provided to a structured entity without having a contractual obligation to do so, including assistance in obtaining financial support. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

name: SurplusDeficitInPlan
description: The fair value of any plan assets, less the present value of the defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Plan assets [member]]

name: TangibleExplorationAndEvaluationAssets
description: The amount of exploration and evaluation assets recognised as tangible assets in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. [Refer: Exploration and evaluation assets [member]]

name: TaxBenefitArisingFromPreviouslyUnrecognisedTaxLossTaxCreditOrTemporaryDifferenceOfPriorPeriodUsedToReduceCurrentTaxExpense
description: The amount of benefit arising from a previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of a prior period that is used to reduce current tax expense. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax losses [member]; Unused tax credits [member]]

name: TaxBenefitArisingFromPreviouslyUnrecognisedTaxLossTaxCreditOrTemporaryDifferenceOfPriorPeriodUsedToReduceDeferredTaxExpense
description: The amount of benefit arising from a previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of a prior period that is used to reduce deferred tax expense. [Refer: Deferred tax expense (income); Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax losses [member]; Unused tax credits [member]]

name: TaxEffectFromChangeInTaxRate
description: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to changes in the tax rate. [Refer: Accounting profit]

name: TaxEffectOfExpenseNotDeductibleInDeterminingTaxableProfitTaxLoss
description: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to expenses not deductible in determining taxable profit (tax loss). [Refer: Accounting profit]

name: TaxEffectOfForeignTaxRates
description: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to foreign tax rates. [Refer: Accounting profit]

name: TaxEffectOfImpairmentOfGoodwill
description: The amount representing the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to impairment of goodwill. [Refer: Accounting profit; Goodwill]

name: TaxEffectOfRevenuesExemptFromTaxation2011
description: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to revenues that are exempt from taxation. [Refer: Accounting profit]

name: TaxEffectOfTaxLosses
description: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to tax losses. [Refer: Accounting profit]

name: TaxExpenseIncomeAtApplicableTaxRate
description: The product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s). [Refer: Accounting profit; Applicable tax rate]

name: TaxExpenseIncomeRelatingToChangesInAccountingPoliciesAndErrorsIncludedInProfitOrLoss
description: The amount of tax expense or income relating to changes in accounting policies and errors that are included in profit or loss in accordance with IAS 8, because they cannot be accounted for retrospectively.

name: TaxExpenseOtherThanIncomeTaxExpense
description: The amount of tax expense exclusive of income tax expense.

name: TaxExpenseRelatingToGainLossOnDiscontinuance
description: The tax expense (income) relating to the gain (loss) on discontinuance when operations are discontinued. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]]

name: TaxExpenseRelatingToProfitLossFromOrdinaryActivitiesOfDiscontinuedOperations
description: The tax expense (income) relating to the profit (loss) arising from ordinary activities of discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

name: TaxRateEffectFromChangeInTaxRate
description: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from a change in tax rate. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

name: TaxRateEffectOfAdjustmentsForCurrentTaxOfPriorPeriods
description: Tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from adjustments for the current tax of prior periods. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate; Adjustments for current tax of prior periods]

name: TaxRateEffectOfExpenseNotDeductibleInDeterminingTaxableProfitTaxLoss
description: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from the expenses not deductible in determining taxable profit. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

name: TaxRateEffectOfForeignTaxRates
description: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from the application of foreign tax rates. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

name: TaxRateEffectOfImpairmentOfGoodwill
description: Tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from the impairment of goodwill. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate; Goodwill]

name: TaxRateEffectOfRevenuesExemptFromTaxation
description: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from revenue that is exempt from taxation. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

name: TaxRateEffectOfTaxLosses
description: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from tax losses. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

name: TechnologybasedIntangibleAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for technology-based intangible assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Technology-based intangible assets [member]; Business combinations [member]]

name: TemporaryDifferencesAssociatedWithInvestmentsInSubsidiariesBranchesAndAssociatesAndInterestsInJointVentures
description: The aggregate amount of temporary differences associated with investments in subsidiaries, branches and associates and interests in joint arrangements, for which deferred tax liabilities have not been recognised as a result of satisfying both of the following conditions: (a) the parent, investor, joint venturer or joint operator is able to control the timing of the reversal of the temporary difference; and (b) it is probable that the temporary difference will not reverse in the foreseeable future. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Temporary differences [member]; Investments in subsidiaries reported in separate financial statements]

name: TerminationBenefitsExpense
description: The amount of expense in relation to termination benefits. Termination benefits are employee benefits provided in exchange for the termination of an employee's employment as a result of either: (a) an entity's decision to terminate an employee's employment before the normal retirement date; or (b) an employee's decision to accept an offer of benefits in exchange for the termination of employment. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayables
description: The amount of current trade payables and current other payables. [Refer: Current trade payables; Other current payables]

name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayablesToRelatedParties
description: The amount of current payables due to related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]; Payables to related parties]

name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayablesToTradeSuppliers
description: The current amount of payment due to suppliers for goods and services used in entity's business. [Refer: Current liabilities; Trade payables]

name: TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivables
description: The amount of current trade receivables and current other receivables. [Refer: Current trade receivables; Other current receivables]

name: TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivablesDueFromRelatedParties
description: The amount of current receivables due from related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TradeAndOtherPayables
description: The amount of trade payables and other payables. [Refer: Trade payables; Other payables]

name: TradeAndOtherPayablesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for trade and other payables assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Trade and other payables; Business combinations [member]]

name: TradeAndOtherPayablesToRelatedParties
description: The amount of payables due to related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TradeAndOtherPayablesToTradeSuppliers
description: The amount of payment due to suppliers for goods and services used in the entity's business.

name: TradeAndOtherPayablesUndiscountedCashFlows
description: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to trade and other payables. [Refer: Trade and other payables]

name: TradeAndOtherReceivables
description: The amount of trade receivables and other receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables; Other receivables]

name: TradeAndOtherReceivablesDueFromRelatedParties
description: The amount of receivables due from related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TradeReceivables
description: The amount due from customers for goods and services sold.

name: TradingIncomeExpense
description: The amount of income (expense) relating to trading assets and liabilities.

name: TradingIncomeExpenseOnDebtInstruments
description: The amount of trading income (expense) relating to debt instruments. [Refer: Debt instruments held; Trading income (expense)]

name: TradingIncomeExpenseOnDerivativeFinancialInstruments
description: The amount of trading income (expense) relating to derivative financial instruments. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Trading income (expense)]

name: TradingIncomeExpenseOnEquityInstruments
description: The amount of trading income (expense) relating to equity instruments. [Refer: Equity instruments held; Trading income (expense)]

name: TradingIncomeExpenseOnForeignExchangeContracts
description: The amount of trading income (expense) relating to foreign exchange contracts. [Refer: Trading income (expense)]

name: TransactionPriceAllocatedToRemainingPerformanceObligations
description: The amount of the transaction price allocated to the performance obligations that are unsatisfied (or partially unsatisfied) as of the end of the reporting period. The transaction price is the amount of consideration to which an entity expects to be entitled in exchange for transferring promised goods or services to a customer, excluding amounts collected on behalf of third parties (for example, some sales taxes). [Refer: Performance obligations [member]]

name: TransferBetweenFinancialLiabilitiesAndEquityAttributableToChangeInRedemptionProhibition
description: The amount transferred between financial liabilities and the equity attributable to a change in the redemption prohibition.

name: TransferFromInvestmentPropertyUnderConstructionOrDevelopmentInvestmentProperty
description: The amount transferred from investment property under construction or development to completed investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

name: TransferFromToInventoriesAndOwnerOccupiedPropertyInvestmentProperty
description: The amount transferred from (to) inventories and owner-occupied property to (from) investment property. [Refer: Inventories; Investment property]

name: TransfersIntoLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyAssets
description: The amount of transfers of assets into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

name: TransfersIntoLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyLiabilities
description: The amount of transfers of liabilities into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

name: TransfersOfCumulativeGainLossWithinEquity
description: The amount of transfers within equity of the cumulative gain (loss) on financial liabilities designated as at fair value through profit or loss for which changes in the liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

name: TransfersOfResearchAndDevelopmentFromEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of transfers of research and development from the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TransfersOfResearchAndDevelopmentToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of transfers of research and development to the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TransfersOutOfLevel1IntoLevel2OfFairValueHierarchyAssets
description: The amount of transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

name: TransfersOutOfLevel1IntoLevel2OfFairValueHierarchyLiabilities
description: The amount of transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

name: TransfersOutOfLevel2IntoLevel1OfFairValueHierarchyAssets
description: The amount of transfers out of Level 2 and into Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy of assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

name: TransfersOutOfLevel2IntoLevel1OfFairValueHierarchyLiabilities
description: The amount of transfers out of Level 2 and into Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

name: TransfersOutOfLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyAssets
description: The amount of transfers of assets out of Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

name: TransfersOutOfLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyLiabilities
description: The amount of transfers of liabilities out of Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

name: TransfersUnderFinanceAgreementsFromEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of transfers under finance agreements from the entity in related party transactions, including loans and equity contributions in cash or in kind. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TransfersUnderFinanceAgreementsToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of transfers under finance agreements to the entity in related party transactions, including loans and equity contributions in cash or in kind. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TransfersUnderLicenseAgreementsFromEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of transfers under licence agreements from the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TransfersUnderLicenseAgreementsToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
description: The amount of transfers under licence agreements to the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

name: TransportationExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from transportation services.

name: TravelExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from travel.

name: TreasuryShares
description: An entitys own equity instruments, held by the entity or other members of the consolidated group.

name: UnallocatedGoodwill
description: The amount of goodwill acquired in a business combination that has not been allocated to a cash-generating unit (group of units). [Refer: Goodwill; Cash-generating units [member]; Business combinations [member]]

name: UndatedSubordinatedLiabilities
description: The amount of subordinated liabilities that do not have a specified repayment date. [Refer: Subordinated liabilities]

name: UndiscountedCashOutflowRequiredToRepurchaseDerecognisedFinancialAssets
description: The undiscounted cash outflows that would, or may be, required to repurchase derecognised financial assets (for example, the strike price in an option agreement). [Refer: Financial assets]

name: UndiscountedExpectedCreditLossesAtInitialRecognitionOnPurchasedOrOriginatedCreditimpairedFinancialAssetsInitiallyRecognised
description: The amount of undiscounted expected credit losses at initial recognition on financial assets initially recognised during the reporting period as purchased or originated credit-impaired.

name: UndiscountedFinanceLeasePaymentsToBeReceived
description: The amount of undiscounted finance lease payments to be received. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

name: UndiscountedOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived
description: The amount of undiscounted operating lease payments to be received. Operating lease is a lease that does not transfer substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

name: UndrawnBorrowingFacilities
description: The amount of undrawn borrowing facilities that may be available for future operating activities and to settle capital commitments. [Refer: Capital commitments]

name: UnearnedFinanceIncomeOnFinanceLease
description: #N/A

name: UnearnedFinanceIncomeRelatingToFinanceLeasePaymentsReceivable
description: The amount of unearned finance income relating to the finance lease payments receivable. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset. [Refer: Finance income]

name: UnearnedPremiums
