description: The amount of liability for written premiums on insurance contracts that have not yet been earned. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

name: UnratedCreditExposures
description: The amount of credit exposure that has not been rated by external rating agencies. [Refer: Credit exposure]

name: UnrecognisedShareOfLossesOfAssociates
description: The amount of the unrecognised share of associates' losses if the entity has stopped recognising its share of losses when applying the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]]

name: UnrecognisedShareOfLossesOfJointVentures
description: The amount of the unrecognised share of joint ventures' losses if the entity has stopped recognising its share of losses when applying the equity method. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

name: UnsecuredBankLoansReceived
description: The amount of loans received from banks that have not been secured by collateral. [Refer: Loans received]

name: UnusedProvisionReversedOtherProvisions
description: The amount reversed for unused other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions]

name: UnusedTaxCreditsForWhichNoDeferredTaxAssetRecognised
description: The amount of unused tax credits for which no deferred tax asset is recognised in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Unused tax credits [member]]

name: UnusedTaxLossesForWhichNoDeferredTaxAssetRecognised
description: The amount of unused tax losses for which no deferred tax asset is recognised in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Unused tax losses [member]]

name: UsefulLifeMeasuredInProductionOrOtherSimilarUnitsIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
description: The useful life, measured in production or other similar units, used for intangible assets other than goodwill. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

name: UtilisationAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
description: The decrease in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the utilisation of the allowance. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

name: UtilitiesExpense
description: The amount of expense arising from purchased utilities.

name: ValueAddedTaxPayables
description: The amount of payables related to a value added tax.

name: ValueAddedTaxReceivables
description: The amount of receivables related to a value added tax.

name: ValueAtRisk
description: The measure of a potential loss exposure as a result of future market movements, based on a specified confidence interval and measurement horizon.

name: Vehicles
description: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing vehicles used in the entity's operations, specifically to include aircraft, motor vehicles and ships. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: WagesAndSalaries
description: A class of employee benefits expense that represents wages and salaries. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

name: WarrantLiability
description: The amount of warrant liabilities.

name: WarrantReserve
description: A component of equity resulting from issuing share purchase warrants, other than those resulting from share-based payment arrangements. [Refer: Reserve of share-based payments]

name: WarrantyProvision
description: The amount of provision for estimated costs of making good under warranties for products sold. [Refer: Provisions]

name: WeightedAverageCostOfCapitalSignificantUnobservableInputsAssets
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageCostOfCapitalSignificantUnobservableInputsEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageCostOfCapitalSignificantUnobservableInputsLiabilities
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageDurationOfDefinedBenefitObligation
description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageLesseesIncrementalBorrowingRateAppliedToLeaseLiabilitiesRecognisedAtDateOfInitialApplicationOfIFRS16
description: The weighted average lessee's incremental borrowing rate applied to lease liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position at the date of initial application of IFRS 16. The incremental borrowing rate is the rate of interest that a lessee would have to pay to borrow over a similar term, and with a similar security, the funds necessary to obtain an asset of a similar value to the right-of-use asset in a similar economic environment.

description: #N/A

name: WeightedAverageSharePriceShareOptionsGranted2019
description: The weighted average share price used as input to the option pricing model to calculate the fair value of share options granted. [Refer: Option pricing model [member]; Weighted average [member]]

name: WeightedAverageShares
description: The number of ordinary shares outstanding at the beginning of the period, adjusted by the number of ordinary shares bought back or issued during the period multiplied by a time-weighting factor.

name: WorkInProgress
description: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of assets currently in production, which require further processes to be converted into finished goods or services. [Refer: Current finished goods; Inventories]

name: WritedownsReversalsOfInventories
description: The amount recognised resulting from the write-down of inventories to net realisable value or reversals of those write-downs. [Refer: Inventories]

name: WritedownsReversalsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
description: The amount recognised resulting from the write-down of property, plant and equipment to its recoverable amount or reversals of those write-downs. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

name: YieldUsedToDiscountCashFlowsThatDoNotVaryBasedOnReturnsOnUnderlyingItems
description: The yield used to discount cash flows that do not vary based on the returns on underlying items, applying paragraph 36 of IFRS 17. Underlying items are items that determine some of the amounts payable to a policyholder. Underlying items can comprise any items; for example a reference portfolio of assets, the net assets of the entity, or a specified subset of the net assets of the entity.
